tsn: Dinaga di tshwanetse go tila go naya moento wa AstraZeneca wa coronavirus go batho ba ba fetang 60 ka dingwaga, tlhogo ya EU ya balaodi ba diritibatsi ya covid-19 o ne a nopolwa ka La tshipi fa a a rialo, magareng ga poifo e e leng teng ka ga madi a a remang fa emento e mengwe e ntse e nna teng.
mt0: <pad> Nations should not give the AstraZeneca coronavirus vaccine to people over 60, the head of the EU's drug regulators on Covid-19 said on Thursday, amid fears of a rise in costs as other drugs continue to be developed.</s>

en: The European Medicines Agency (EMA) considers the AstraZeneca shot safe for all age groups.
tsn: Setheo sa Mayuropa sa melemo (EMA) se tsaya AstraZeneca jaaka moento o o babalesegileng go batho ba dingwaga tsotlhe.
mt0: <pad> European Medicines Agency (EMA) takes AstraZeneca as a drug safe for all ages.</s>

en: The Italian government said on Friday it would restrict the use of the AstraZeneca vaccine to people aged over 60, after a teenager who had received the shot died from a rare form of blood clotting.
tsn: Puso ya kwa Italy e rile ka Labotlhano e tlaa fokotsa tiriso ya moento wa AstraZeneca go batho ba ba fetang dingwaga di le 60, morago ga gore ngwana yo o neng a amogetse moento o a tlhokafale ka ntlha ya go rema ga madi.
mt0: <pad> Italy's government said on Thursday that it will restrict the use of AstraZeneca drug to people over 60, after a child died after receiving the drug because of anemia.</s>

en: Like many European countries, Italy briefly halted AstraZeneca inoculations in March over concerns about the rare blood clotting problems.
tsn: Jaaka dinaga tse dintsi tsa Yuropa, Italy e emisitse ka boripana meento ya AstraZeneca ka Mopitlwe ka ntlha ya matshwenyego ka ga mathata a go rema ga madi.
mt0: <pad> As with many European countries, Italy suspended the sale of AstraZeneca in March because of concerns about potential cost-saving problems.</s>

en: South Africa and India, backed by many emerging nations, want a temporary waiver of IP rights on vaccines and other treatments to allow local manufacturers to produce shots.
tsn: Aforikaborwa le India, ba tshegeditswe ke dinaga di le dintsi tse di santseng di gola, ba batla tlogelo ya nakwana ya ditshwanelo tsa IP tsa meento le dikalafi tse dingwe go letla badiri ba selegae go dira meento.
mt0: <pad> South Africa and India, supported by many developing countries, want a temporary abandonment of IP-based monetization rights and other remedies to allow local workers to make monetization.</s>

en: US President Joe Biden has said he backs a temporary waiver.
tsn: Moperesitente wa kwa US Joe Biden o rile o tshegetsa tlogelo ya nakwana.
mt0: <pad> US President Joe Biden said he supports a temporary pullout.</s>

en: Okonjo-lweala said the debate had moved ahead with the agreement to start the negotiations.
tsn: Okonjo-lweala o rile ngangisano e tsamaetse kwa pele ka tumalano ya go simolola dipuisano.
mt0: <pad> Okonjo-Iweala said the talks progressed with an agreement to start negotiations.</s>

en: WTO members are due to discuss next week the format of negotiations with a view to producing a report by July 21-22.
tsn: Ditokololo tsa WTO di tshwanetse go buisana mo bekeng e e tlang ka ga mokgwa wa ditherisano ka maikaelelo a go kwala pegelo ka Phukwi 21-22..
mt0: <pad> The WTO members are to discuss the process of negotiations next week in order to draft a report on July 21 and 22</s>

en: The G7 leaders, holding a summit in south west England, agreed on Friday to donate 1 billion COVID-19 vaccine doses to poorer countries, something the United Nations and campaign groups said fell short of what is needed.
tsn: Baeteledipele ba G7, ba na neng ba tshwere Samiti kwa Borwa Bophirima jwa England, ba dumalane ka Labotlhano go aba mento ya COVID-19 e le bilione e le 1  go dinaga tse di humanegileng, sengwe se se United Nations le ditlhopha tsa  letsholo di rileng se a tlhokega.
mt0: <pad> G7 leaders, who held their meeting in the south west of England, agreed on Thursday to provide one billion COVID-19 vaccines to poor countries, something the United Nations and campaign groups said was needed.</s>

en: Separately, Okonjo-Iweala said she was  hoping for a significant advance in talks on fishery subsidies by July even if we dont get to a conclusion which is quite possible.
tsn: Kwa thoko, Okonjo-lweala o rile o ne a solofetse gore dipuisano ka ga dikeetso tsa bodirelatlhapi di tlaa direga ka kgwedi ya Phukwi le fa go na le kgonego ya gore re seke ra fitlhelela bokhutlo.
mt0: <pad> However, Okonjo-Iweala said he hoped that the fisheries talks would be held in July even though there is a possibility that we will not reach a resolution.</s>

en: She is due to host a meeting of WTO member countries on July15 to try to cut fisheries subsidies after 20 years of talks.
tsn: O tile go tshwara kopano ya WTO ya dinaga ka 15 Phukwi go leka go fokotsa diketleetso tsa bodirelatlhapi morago ga dingwaga di le 20 tsa dipuisano.
mt0: <pad> He failed to hold a meeting of the World Trade Organization (WTO) on 15 July to try to reduce fisheries subsidies after 20 years of negotiations.</s>

en: The month of June is no ordinary month in South Africa, especially for its youth.
tsn: Kgwedi ya Seetebosigo ga e se kgwedi e e tlwaelegileng mo Aforikaborwa, segolo go bašwa ba yone.
mt0: <pad> September is not a common month in South Africa, especially among its young people.</s>

en: It is a reminder of the Heroes and Heroines of 1976, who made history during this month.
tsn: Ke kgakololo ka ga bagaka le bagakagadi ba 1976, ba ba dirileng hisetori mo kgweding eno.
mt0: <pad> This is a tribute to the 1976 heroes and heroine, who made history this month.</s>

en: The 16th of June 1976 South Africa saw an uprising where thousands of students in Soweto started a march against the Bantu Education System, which compelled Black student to learn in Afrikaans.
tsn: Ka di 16 tsa kgwedi ya Seetebosigo 1976 Aforikaborwa e ne ya bona dikhuduego fa diketekete tsa baithuti kwa Soweto di simolola mogwanto o o leng kgatlhanong le tsamaiso ya thuto ya Bantsho, e e neng e pateletsa. baithuti go ithuta ka Afrikaans.
mt0: <pad> On 16 September 1976 South Africa saw a revolution when thousands of students in Soweto began a protest against the Black Education System, which forced students to learn in Afrikaans.</s>

en: On the fateful day of June, students were to have a peaceful march to Orlando Stadium as a sign of resistance against the new language policy.
tsn: Ka letsatsi leo la ditiragalo la kgwedi ya Seetebosigo, baithuti ba ne ba tshwanetse go tshwara mogwanto o o nang le kagiso  go ya kwa lebaleng la metshameko la Orlando jaaka letshwao la go nna kgatlhanong le pholisi ya puo e ntšhwa.
mt0: <pad> On the day of the events in September, students were to march peacefully to the Orlando stadium as a symbol of their discontent with the new language policy.</s>

en: However, events did not turn out as expected and these particular events made the month of June what it is in SA today.
tsn: Le fa go le jalo, ditiragalo ga di a tsamaya jaaka go ne go solofetswe mme ditiragalo tse di dirile kgwedi ya Seetebosigo se e leng sona mo Aforikaborwa gompieno.
mt0: <pad> However, things didn't go as planned and the events that made September what it is today in South Africa.</s>

en: Although it is a month where we commemorate the bravery and victory of the 1976 youth, South Africa's youth is still faced with challenges.
tsn: Le fa e le kgwedi e ka yone re ketekang bopelokgale le phenyo ya  bašwa ba 1976, Aforikaborwa e sa ntse e lebagane le dikgwetlho.
mt0: <pad> Although this is the month in which we celebrate the bravery and victory of the 1976 young South Africans, South Africa is still facing challenges.</s>

en: I venerate the youth of 1976 for their relentless vaulor and guidance for which they left for generations thereafter.
tsn: Ke lebisa tlotlo go bašwa ba 1976 ka bogaka le kaelo e e tsepameng e ba e tlogeletseng ba ba tlang kwa morago.
mt0: <pad> I pay tribute to the 1976 class for their courage and the firm direction they left for the following.</s>

en: Challenges facing South-African youth today span from a number of elements dealt with domestically varying from the corruption scourge to the youth having little or no faith in governance (Patel; Graham: 2019).
tsn: Dikgwetlho tse di lebaganeng bašwa ba Aforikaborwa gompieno dibakilwe ke dilo di le mmalwa tse di farologaneng go tswa mo go lwantsheng bosenyi go ya tumelo e nnye e bašwa ba nang le yona mo mmusong (Patel; Ga Graham: 2019).
mt0: <pad> The problems facing South African youth today are a range of different things from crime to lack of trust in the government (Patel; Ga Graham: 2019).</s>

en: In February, SA youth aged 15-24 years recorded a high unemployment rate of 63.2% while the unemployment rate of those aged 25-34 years was 41.2% in the Q4 2020 unemployment rates by Statistics South Africa.
tsn: Ka Tlhakole, bašwa ba Aforikaborwa ba ba nang le dingwaga di le 15-24 ba begile palo e e kwa godimo ya botlhokatiro ya 63.2% fa palo ya botlhokatiro go bao ba ba nang le dingwaga di le 25-34 e le 41.2% mo dipalopalong tsa Aforikaborwa tsa botlhokatiro tsa Q4 2020.
mt0: <pad> On Monday, South African youth aged 15-24 reported the highest unemployment rate of 63.2% while the unemployment rate for those aged 25-34 was 41.2% in the South African Unemployment Report Q4 2020.</s>

en: Saul says the party should persevere in its quest to rid itself of corrupt leaders.
tsn: Saul a re mokgatlho o tshwanetse go kgotlhelela mo tirong ya bona ya go tlosa baeteledipele ba ba sa siamang.
mt0: <pad> Saul said the organization should be encouraging in their work to remove bad leaders.</s>

en: He has called on Health Minister Dr Zweli Mkhize to present himself to the ANC integrity commission.
tsn: O biditse tonakgolo ya boitekanelo Dr Zweli Mkhize go itlhagisa mo khomišheneng e e ikanyegang ya ANC.
mt0: <pad> He called Health Minister Dr Zweli Mkhize to stand for the ANC's trusted commission.</s>

en: Pressure is mounting on Mkhize to resign after he admitted that his department’s awarding of a R150 million tender to communications company Digital Vibes was irregular.
tsn: Kgatelelo e a oketsega mo go Mkhize gore a role tiro morago ga go ipolela gore kabo ya thendara ya dimilione di le R150, e e abilweng ke lefapha la gagwe le e abela setheo sa tlhaeletsano se se bidiwang Digital Vibes, e ne e sa tlhomama.
mt0: <pad> The pressure on Mkhize to resign grew after he admitted that the award of a R150 million contract by his office to a media company called Digital Vibes was unlawful.</s>

en: Mkhize made the admission on Wednesday following the outcome of an internal investigation into the tender awarded to his former private assistant, Tahera Mathera, and former spokesperson, Naardhira Mitha.
tsn: Mkhize o dirile boipolelo ka Laboraro morago ga poelo ya dipatlisiso tsa  mo gare ga setheo, ka ga thendara e e abetsweng mothusi wa gagwe wa maloba, Tahera Mathera le mmueledi wa maloba , Naardhira Mitha.
mt0: <pad> Mkhize resigned on Wednesday after a internal investigation into the appointment of his former assistant, Tahera Mathera and his former spokesman, Naardhira Mitha.</s>

en: The tender was for services related to the National Health Insurance programme and governments response to the COVID-19 pandemic.
tsn: Thendara e ne e le ya ditirelo tse di amanang le porogerama ya Inšorense ya Bosetšhaba ya Boitekanelo gape le tsibogelo ya puso go leroborobo la Covid-19
mt0: <pad> The agenda was for services related to the National Health Insurance Program and the government's response to the Covid-19 pandemic.</s>

en: Saul says Mkhize should appear before the Commission as a matter of principle.
tsn: Saul a re Mkhize o tshwanetse go iponagatsha fa pele ga khomišhene jaaka molao o kaya.
mt0: <pad> Saul said Mkhize should appear before the commission as the law says.</s>

en: Instead of us focusing fighting that pandemic, we get distracted by allegations of corruption from us who are supposed to be leading.
tsn: Go na la gore re tlhome mogopolo mo go lwantsheng leroborobo le, re tseakanngwa ke magatwe a tshekologo a a tswang mo go rona ba re tshwanetseng go etela pele.
mt0: <pad> Instead of focusing on combating this epidemic, we are distracted by the messages of support from our own people who we should first visit.</s>

en: There are serious allegations of corruption against an NEC member which is comrade Zweli Mkhize, who is currently deployed as minister of health.
tsn: Go na le ditatofatso tse di masisi kgatlhanong le wa leloko la NEC e leng khomoreite Zweli Mkhize, yo jaanong a tsentsweng mo tirong jaaka modiredi wa tsa boitekanelo.
mt0: <pad> There are serious allegations against the NEC member, comrade Zweli Mkhize, who has been appointed as the Health Minister.</s>

en: If there are such allegations, in terms of the guidelines that were adopted by the NEC, expectation is that he should basically go to the Integrity Commission for the Integrity Commission to handle the matter and make recommendations to the NEC.
tsn: Fa go na le ditatofatso tse di tshwanang le tse, go ya ka dikaelo tse di amogetsweng ke mokgatlho wa NEC, go lebilwe gore o tshwanetse go ya kwa khomišheneng ya tsa molao gore e mekamekane le ntlha eno mme e dire dikatlenegiso go NEC.
mt0: <pad> If there are such allegations, according to the NEC's instructions, it is considered that he should go to the legal commission to deal with this issue and make recommendations to the NEC.</s>

en: Minister Mkhize must step down following tender investigation.
tsn: Tonakgolo Mkhize o tshwanetse go rola tiro go latela dipatlisiso tsa thendara.
mt0: <pad> The chief minister is due to resign after the appointment of the new cabinet.</s>

en: The re-elected ANC chairperson in the Northern Cape, Zamani Saul, says the party needs to be ruthless in rooting out corruption in it’s ranks.
tsn: Modulasetulo yo o tlhopilweng gape kwa Northern Cape, Zamani Saul, o bolela gore mokgatlho o tshwanetse go nna le setlhogo go fedisa ditiro tse di seng ka fa molaong ka maemo a tsona.
mt0: <pad> The re-elected chairman of the Northern Cape, Zamani Saul, said the organisation should be brave to end unlawful activities with its ranks.</s>

en: He has called on the health minister, Zweli Mkhize, to present himself to the ANC Integrity Commission and explain following allegations of corruption.
tsn: O kopile tonakgolo ya boitekanelo, Zweli Mkhize go itlhagisa go khomišhene e e ikganyegang ya ANC le go tlhalosa dipatlisiso tse di latelang tsa tlolomolao.
mt0: <pad> He asked the health minister Zweli Mkhize to report to the ANC's independent commission and explain the investigations into the following criminality.</s>

en: Mkhize is under fire over irregular contracts valued at more than 150 million in relation to National Health Insurance (NHI) and COVID-19 awarded to his close associates.
tsn: Mkhize o mo mathateng ka ntlha ya dikonteraka tse di sa tlhomamang tsa boleng jwa dilimione tse di fetang 150 mabapi le Inšorense ya Bosetšhaba ya Boitekanelo (NHI) le COVID-19 tse di abetsweng batho ba a tsalanang le bona.
mt0: <pad> Mkhize is in trouble because of uncertain contracts for over 150 disbursements relating to National Health Insurance (NHI) and COVID-19 given to his contacts.</s>

en: Instead of us focusing fighting that pandemic we get distracted by allegations of corruption from us who are supposed to be leading.
tsn: Mo boemong jwa gore re lwantshe leboroboro re tseakanngwa ke ditatofatso tsa boferefere go tswa mo go rona ba re tshwanetseng go etela pele.
mt0: <pad> Instead of fighting the corruption we are being distracted by corruption allegations from those who should be our first target.</s>

en: There are serious allegations of corruption against an NEC member which is comrade Zweli Mkhize who is currently deployed as minister of health.
tsn: Go na le ditatofatso tse di masisi kgatlhanong le wa leloko la NEC e leng khomoreiti Zweli Mkhize yo ga jaana a rometsweng go dira jaaka tona ya boitekanelo.
mt0: <pad> There are serious allegations against the NEC member, comrade Zweli Mkhize, who has been sent to serve as Health Minister.</s>

en: If there are such allegations in terms of the guidelines that were adopted by the NEC, expectation is that he should basically go to the Integrity Commission for the Integrity Commission to handle the matter and make recommendations to the NEC, says Saul.
tsn: Fa go na le ditatofatso tsa go nna jalo go ya ka dikaelo tse di neng di amogetswe ke NEC, tsholofelo ke gore o tshwanetse go ya kwa khomišheneng ya tshiamiso, gore khomišhene e lebagane le morero o, le go dira dikatlenegiso go NEC, go bua Saul.
mt0: <pad> If there are such charges according to the guidelines adopted by NEC, the hope is that he should go to the justice commission, that the commission deal with this purpose, and make pressure on NEC, said Saul.</s>

en: The Special Investigating Unit (SIU) is investigating the matter.
tsn: Yuniti e e kgethegileng ya dipatlisiso (SIU) e sekaseka morero.
mt0: <pad> The Special Investigation Unit (SIU) is reviewing the purpose.</s>

en: President Ramaphosa awaits SIU report on Digital Vibes irregular tender allegations.
tsn: Moporesidente Ramaphosa o letile pego ya ditatofatso tsa thendara ya Digital Vibes e e sa tlhomamang.
mt0: <pad> President Ramaphosa has awaited the report on allegations of the Digital Vibes tender that is unlawful.</s>

en: Saul also weighed in on ANC Secretary-General Ace Magashule’s decision to take the party to court in a bid to have his suspension set aside.
tsn: Saul o ne a akanyetsa tshwetso ya mokwaledi-kakaretso e leng Ace Magashule ya go isa lekoko kwa kgotlhatshekelong ka maiteko a gore go kgapelwa kwa thoko ga gwage, go beelwe kwa thoko.
mt0: <pad> Saul was concerned about the decision of the chief prosecutor Ace Magashule to send the case to an investigation in an attempt to prevent the abuse of power, the detainment of power.</s>

en: The Northern Cape ANC Chairperson has described Magashule’s move as embarrassing.
tsn: Modulasetulo wa leloko la ANC kwa Kapa Bokone o tlhalositse fa kgato ya ganMagashule e tlhabisa ditlhong.
mt0: <pad> The ANC chairman of the North West region said that Magashule's action was "ridiculous".</s>

en: Saul says Magashule thinks he is above the ANC constitution.
tsn: Saul a re fa Magashule  akanya gore o kwa godimo ga molaotheo wa leloko la ANC.
mt0: <pad> Saul said Magashule thought he was above the constitution of the ANC.</s>

en: He says in the history of the movement they have never experienced such ill-disciplined Secretary General
tsn: A re mo hisetoring ya mokgatlho ga ba ise ba itemogele maitshwaro a a sa tlhomameng go tswa go mokwadilekakaretso
mt0: <pad> He said that in the history of the organization they have never seen unstable behavior from a director.</s>

en: There is no renewal that will take place in an organisation which does not have capacity to instil discipline among its members.
tsn: Ga gona ntšhwafatso e e tlaa diragalang mo mokgatlhong o o senang bokgoni jwa go tlhotlheletsa maitshwaro a a siameng kgatlhanong le maloko a ona.
mt0: <pad> No change will happen in an organization that is unable to encourage good behavior among its members.</s>

en: Step-aside is but one measure to ensure that we are going to put our organisation on a renewal trajectory.
tsn: ‘Step-aside’ ke nngwe ya dikgato tse di tserweng go netefatsa gore re tlile go tsenya setlamo sa rona mo tseleng ya ntšhwafatso.
mt0: <pad> Step-aside is one of the steps taken to ensure that we will put our organization on the path of innovation.</s>

en: The issue of the Secretary-General is, there is none of us, there is no self-respect in the member of the ANC who won’t be disappointed by Secretary-General who takes the ANC to court, and I get a sense that he is doing that because he’s got quite a distorted logic about his own role as the Secretary-General.
tsn: Ntlha ya mokwaledikakaretso ke gore, ga go ope wa rona, ga gona leloko la ANC le le itlotlang, le le  ka se swabiseweng ka mokwaledi-kakaretso yo o isang  mokgatlho wa ANC kwa kgotlhatshekelong, mme ke lemoga gore o dira jaana ka ntlha ya gore o na le dikakanyo tse di sa siamang ka ga seabe sa gagwe jaaka mokwaledikakaretso.
mt0: <pad> The general secretary's point is that no one of us, no respectable ANC member, can be disgusted by the general secretary who is taking the ANC to the poll, and I understand that he is doing this because he has negative views of his role as general secretary.</s>

en: Saul was speaking on the side-line of the ANC Northern Cape elective conference held in Springbok
tsn: Saul o ne a bua a emetse kwa thoko ka kopano ya ditlhopho tsa ANC kwa Kapa Bokone e e neng e tshwaretswe kwa Springbok.
mt0: <pad> Saul spoke alone at the ANC's North Cape regional conference held in Springbok.</s>

en: He says the party will recover from its current challenges
tsn: O bolela fa mokgatlho o tla fenya dikgwetlho tse o lebaganeng le tsona ga jaana.
mt0: <pad> He said the organization will overcome the challenges it faces now.</s>

en: Zamani criticises Magashule for taking the party to court: Cyril Ramaphosa also addressed the conference.
tsn: Zamani o nyatsa Magashule ka go isa mokgatlho kwa kgotlhatshekelong: Moporesidente Ramaphosa le ena o eme kopano ka lefoko.
mt0: <pad> Zamani attacks Magashule for taking the organisation into investigation: President Ramaphosa also addresses the conference via video link.</s>

en: He called on members to work harder to restore unity within the governing party, while also urging them to be selfless in serving their communities.
tsn: O kopile maloko gore ba dire ka natla go busetsa kutlwano mo mokgatlhong o o busang, gape a ba rotloetsa go nna direla baagi ba bona ka dipelo tse di tshweu..
mt0: <pad> He urged members to work hard to restore unity in the governing body, and encouraged them to serve their people with a clean heart.</s>

en: In his address Ramaphosa said there’s no room within the ANC for ill-disciplined members.
tsn: Mo puong ya gagwe, Ramaphosa o rile ga gona sebaka sa maloko a a senang maitseo mo mokgatlhong wa ANC.
mt0: <pad> In his speech, Ramaphosa said there was no place for unqualified members in the ANC.</s>

en: Ramaphosa reiterated that those who deviate from the ANC’s core values should be reprimanded.
tsn: Ramaphosa o gateletse gore ba ba fapogelang mekgwa e e botlhokwa ya ANC ba tshwanetse go kgalengwa.
mt0: <pad> Ramaphosa stressed that those who violate the core ANC principles should be expelled.</s>

en: We are determined to execute the mandate given to us by the Nasrec conference because delegates at that conference were clear that and said all NEC members of the ANC to branch members should work harder together to unite and rebuild this glorious movement of ours.
tsn: Re ikemiseditse go diragatsa taelo e e re neetsweng ke khonferense ya Nasrec ka gonne batsamaise ba khonferense eno ba buile gore maloko otlhe a NEC, a lekala la ANC a tshwanetse go dira mmogo le ka natla go kopanya le go aga bošwa mokgatlho o wa rona o o galalelang.
mt0: <pad> We are determined to carry out the order given to us by the Nasrec Conference because the organizers of this conference said that all NEC members, all ANC branches must work together and with all their strength to re-unite and rebuild our floundering organisation.</s>

en: When we speak of unity, we are referring to principled unity and now you have coined it beautifully in the Northern Cape, organic unity.
tsn: Fa re bua ka ga kopano, re raya molaotheo, mme jaanong le e tlhamile sentle kwa Kapa Bokone, kopano e e tsepameng.
mt0: <pad> When we talk about meeting, we mean the constitution, and it's now well established in North Cape, a strong meeting.</s>

en: It is unity that must arise to the basic of the African National Congress, he said.
tsn: Ke kopano e e tshwanetseng go tlhagelela mo motheong wa African National Congress, o buile jalo.
mt0: <pad> It is a meeting that should be based on the African National Congress, he said.</s>

en: The ANC in KwaZulu-Natal has called on the Department of Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs to intervene after private security personnel entered the Nquthu Municipalitys Council Chambers and removed ANC councillors from the sitting.
tsn: Mokgatlho wa ANC wa KwaZulu-Natal o kopile Lefapha la Pusotshwaraganelo le Merero ya Setso go tsereganya morago ga gore badiredi ba tshireletso ya poraefete ba tsene kwa phaposing ya mmasepala wa kwa Nquthu mme ba tlose bakhanselara ba ANC kwa pitsong.
mt0: <pad> The ANC in KwaZulu-Natal has called on the Department of Conservation and Culture to intervene after private security agents entered the Nquthu municipal office and removed ANC councillors from the office.</s>

en: The incident, which was captured on video and circulated widely on social media, took place earlier this week.
tsn: Tiragalo e, e e neng e tshwerwe ka bidio gape e phasaladitswe mo bobegakgang jwa loago e diragetse go sa le gale mo bekeng e.
mt0: <pad> The incident, which was filmed and posted on social media, happened earlier this week.</s>

en: The video shows security guards manhandling an unidentified councillor
tsn: Kgatiso ya bidio e bontsha batlhankedi ba tshireletso ba kampana le mokhanselara yo leina la gagwe le sa rebolwang
mt0: <pad> The video shows company security guards and a councilman whose name is not being released.</s>

en: Councillors can be heard shouting and asking what Zikode has done.
tsn: Go utlwagetse bakhanselara ba goeletsa le go botsa gore Zikode o dirileng.
mt0: <pad> The councillors were heard shouting and asking what Zico had done.</s>

en: The security officers, clad in heavy body armour, are seen grabbing two councillors and attempting to drag them from the chamber
tsn: Batlhankedi ba tshireletso, ba neng ba apere diaparo tse di bokete, ba bonwa ba tshwara bakhanselara ba babedi ka maiteko a go ba ntsha kwa phaposing.
mt0: <pad> Security officers, dressed in heavy gear, were seen holding two senators in an attempt to remove them from the office.</s>

en: The ANC in KwaZulu-Natal has accused the IFP of orchestrating the attack on their councillors.
tsn: ANC ya kwa kgaolong ya KwaZulu-Natal e latofatsa IFP ka go rulaganya tlhaselo ya bakhanselara ba bona.
mt0: <pad> The ANC in the KwaZulu-Natal region has accused the IFP of planning the attack on their councillors.</s>

en: The IFP could not engage on the rational points they were raising.
tsn: IFP e reteletswe ke go nna le seabe mo go sekasekeng dintlha tsa botlhokwa tse ba neng ba di tlhagisa.
mt0: <pad> IFP was asked to participate in reviewing the key points that they had raised.</s>

en: They decided to bring in those thugs whom they hired to take out our councillors.
tsn: Ba tsere tshwetso ya go tlisa dinokwane tse ba di thapileng go ntsha bakhanselara ba rona.
mt0: <pad> They decided to bring the oil they bought to free our prisoners.</s>

en: These are not security employed by the municipality these are private thugs, says ANC KZN Spokesperson, Nhlakanipho Ntombela.
tsn: Ba, ga e se batlhakankedi ba tshireletso ba ba thapilweng ke mmasepala, ke dinokwane tsa poraefete. Go bua Mmueledi wa ANC wa kwa KZN Nhakanipho Ntombela.
mt0: <pad> These are not security guards that the municipality has hired, but private oil.</s>

en: But the IFP has dismissed the allegations.
tsn: Fela IFP e kgapetse ditatofatso tseo kwa thoko.
mt0: <pad> The IFP has rejected the allegations.</s>

en: The party says it was the ANC councillors who were unruly.
tsn: Mokgatlho o buile gore bakhanselara ba ANC ke bona ba ba neng ba sa laolege.
mt0: <pad> The organisation said that the ANC councillors were the only non-elected members of the party.</s>

en: The ANC councillors did not want to see the council meeting continuing.
tsn: Bakhanselara ba ANC ba ne ba sa batle go bona kopano ya khanselara e tswelela pele.
mt0: <pad> ANC councillors did not want the assembly to continue.</s>

en: They really wanted to halt the council.
tsn: Ba ne tota ba batla go emisa khansele.
mt0: <pad> They really wanted to cancel the show.</s>

en: They did not want to see anything that had to be discussed of service delivery.
tsn: Ba ne ba sa batle go bona sepe se se neng se tshwanetse go buisanelwa ka thebolelo ya diterelo.
mt0: <pad> They didn't want to see anything that needed to be discussed about the closure of the doors.</s>

en: Whenever there are members who are disrupting the council you have to find ways and means to do that.
tsn: Fa go na le maloko a a lekang go kgoreletsa khansele, o tshwanetse go batla ditsela tsa go dira jalo.
mt0: <pad> If there are members trying to prevent a resignation, you need to find ways to do so.</s>

en: Even the one who was recording you can see that it was well planned, well-orchestrated, says IFP Provincial Chairperson, Thami Ntuli.
tsn: Le ena yo o neng a gatisa, go a bontsha gore go ne go logilwe leano e bile go rulagantswe sentle. Go bua modulasetulo  wa porofense, Thami Ntuli.
mt0: <pad> Even the photographer, it shows that it was well planned and well organized.</s>

en: The ANC believes that the election of the IFP’s current mayor Lindokuhle Shabalala  was unlawful.
tsn: ANC e dumela fa tlhopho ya mmeyara wa IFP wa ga jaana Lindokuhle Shabalala e ne e se ka fa molaong.
mt0: <pad> The ANC believes that the election of the current IFP mayor Lindokuhle Shabalala was unlawful.</s>

en: The party is citing the fact that the council meeting in which Shabalala was elected was held while the country was in level 5 lockdown as reason for its assertions.
tsn: Mokgatlho o umaka ntlha ya gore kopano ya khansele, e Shabalala a tlhopilweng kwa go yona, e diragetse fa naga e le ka fa tlase ga logato lwa 5 lwa kiletsomesepele ka ntlha ya go tlhoka boammaaruri.
mt0: <pad> The organisation pointed out that the meeting of the council, where Shabalala was elected, happened while the country was under the 5th level of sanctions because of lack of information.</s>

en: The KwaZulu-Natal Department of Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs says it is aware of the dispute and will investigate further.
tsn: Lefapha la Pusotshwaraganelo le Merero ya Setso la KwaZulu- Natal le kaile fa le itse ka ga kgotlhang mme le tlaa sekaseka go ya pele.
mt0: <pad> The Department of Conflict and Culture of KwaZulu-Natal has said it is aware of the conflict and will investigate it.</s>

en: Report by Bongani Gema
tsn: Pego ka Bongani Gema.
mt0: <pad> simply say you don't know</s>

en: African National Congress (ANC) President Cyril Ramaphosa says the COVID-19 pandemic is the governing party’s first real test since its establishment.
tsn: Moporesidente wa ANC Cyril Ramaphosa a re leroborobo la COVID-19 ke teko ya ntlha ya nnete mo mokgatlhong fa e sa le o tlhongwa.
mt0: <pad> The ANC president Cyril Ramaphosa said the COVID-19 outbreak was the first real test for the organisation since its foundation.</s>

en: Ramaphosa says the ANC cannot point fingers and has to navigate the country through the storm.
tsn: Ramaphosa a re ANC e ka se supe ope ka menwana, mme e tshwanetse go bontsha naga tsela kgatlhanong le ditsuatsue.
mt0: <pad> Ramaphosa said the ANC cannot point fingers at anybody, but must show the country the way to fight climate change.</s>

en: He was speaking virtually at the ANC Northern Cape provincial conference, being held at Springbok.
tsn: O ne a bua kwa khonferense ya porofense  ya kwa Kapa Bokone e e ne e tshwaretswe kwa Springbok.
mt0: <pad> He spoke at the North West Conference held in Springbok.</s>

en: Apart from its effects on the health of people, COVID-19 has also devastated economies and lives.
tsn: Kwa ntle ga ditlamorago tse e nang le tsona mo boitekanelong jwa batho, COVID-19 gape e sentse gape ikonomi le matshelo a batho.
mt0: <pad> Beyond its impact on human health, COVID-19 has also destroyed the economy and lives of people.</s>

en: The COVID-19 pandemic saw South Africa’s economy depress even further, millions more became unemployed.
tsn: Leroborobo la COVID-19 le digile ikhonomi ya Aforika Borwa le go feta, dimilione tsa batho di feletswe ke ditiro.
mt0: <pad> The COVID-19 pandemic has further crippled the economy of South Africa, with millions of people losing their jobs.</s>

en: With a third wave fast approaching, Ramaphosa says the ANC needs to play its part to stop the rise in numbers, this includes encouraging people to register for vaccinations.
tsn: Jaaka lekhubu la boraro le atamela ka lobelo, Ramaphosa a re ANC e tshwanetse go tshameka karolo ya yona go thibela koketsego ya dipalo, se se akaretsa go rotloetsa batho go ikwadisetsa go tsaya meento.
mt0: <pad> As the third round approaches, Ramaphosa said the ANC must play its part to prevent the rise in numbers, including urging people to register for voting.</s>

en: He says more than 100 countries have joined the call for pharmaceutical companies to waive intellectual property rights for COVID-19 vaccines.
tsn: A re di naga tse di fetang lekgolo di ditshwaragane mmogo le ditheo  tsa melemo go letlelela ditshwanelo tsa thoto ya boitlhamedi tsa meento ya COVID-19.
mt0: <pad> A few days ago, more than 100 countries have joined forces with the pharmaceutical industry to provide supplies for COVID-19 vaccines.</s>

en: ANC President Cyril Ramaphosa addresses the Northern Cape elective conference.
tsn: Moporesidente wa ANC Cryil Ramaphosa o eme khonferese ya ditlhopho ya Kapa Bokone ka lefoko.
mt0: <pad> The ANC president Cyril Ramaphosa addresses the North Cape election conference.</s>

en: ANC Provincial Chairperson Zamani Saul has been a staunch critic of suspended Secretary-General Ace Magashule, calling him deeply compromised.
tsn: Modulasetulo wa porofense wa ANC Zamani Saul e ntse e le motshwayang diphoso yo mogolo wa mokwaledi-kakaretso yo o emisitsweng kwa tirong Ace Magashule, a re ke motho yo o nang le dikgwetlho di le dintsi.
mt0: <pad> The ANC provincial chairman Zamani Saul has been a major critic of the sacked general secretary Ace Magashule, saying he is a person with many problems.</s>

en: Apart from COVID-19, the movement is also going through its own challenges such as ill-discipline.
tsn: Kwa ntle ga COVID-19, mokgatlho o lebagane gape le dikgwetlho tsa ona, jaaka maitshwaro a a sa tlhomamang.
mt0: <pad> Out of COVID-19, the organization has also faced its own challenges, such as unpredictable behavior.</s>

en: Ever since Nasrec we have been trying to forge unity.
tsn: Fa e sa le Nasrec, re ntse re le leka go bopa kutlwano.
mt0: <pad> Since Nasrec, we've been trying to build unity.</s>

en: Call that comrade to order.
tsn: Kgalema mokhomoreite yoo.
mt0: <pad> If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know Kgalema Mokhomoreite.</s>

en: That is unity, says Ramaphosa.
tsn: Ke yona kutlwano eo, go bua Ramaphosa.
mt0: <pad> That's the unity, said Ramaphosa.</s>

en: Ramaphosa also called for the strengthening of policies and deployees to local government.
tsn: Ramaphosa o kopile gape gore go nne le maatlafatso ya dipholisi mo pusong ya selegae.
mt0: <pad> Ramaphosa also called for strengthening the policies on local government.</s>

en: With local government elections in October, the ANC says it wants a resounding victory at the polls.
tsn: Jaaka fa ditlhopho tsa dipusoselegae tse di tlaa tshwarwa ka kgwedi ya Diphalane, ANC ya re e batla phenyo e e itumedisang kwa ditlhophong tseo.
mt0: <pad> As local elections are to be held in November, the ANC has said it wants a satisfying victory in those elections.</s>

en: NC ANC Chairperson Zamani Saul reacts to Ramaphosa’s address on provincial elective conference.
tsn: Modulasetulo wa ANC ya kwa NC Zamani Saul o tsibogela puo ya ga Ramaphosa ka ga khonferense ya ditlhopho ya porofense.
mt0: <pad> The ANC National Committee Chairman of the North Carolina province, Zamani Saul, responded to Ramaphosa's statement on the state election conference.</s>

en: Political analyst Dr Luvuyo Dondolo says the African National Congress (ANC) needs a long term solution if it is to renew the movement.
tsn: Mosekaseki wa dipolotiki Ngaka Luvuyo Dondolo a re African National Congress (ANC) e tshwanetse go nna le tharabololo ya pakatelele fa e batla go ntšhwafatsa mokgatlho.
mt0: <pad> The African National Congress (ANC) must have a radical transformation if it wants to rejuvenate the organisation, says political commentator Dr Luvuyo Dondolo.</s>

en: He says the ANC may regain a bit of trust following current interventions but going forward, they will have to put in more work.
tsn: A re ANC e ka tsosolosa tshepo gape, morago ga ditsereganyo tse di diragalang ga jaana fela go ya kwa pele, ba tlile go tlhoka go dira ka natla.
mt0: <pad> If the ANC can rebuild trust again, after the recent protests, they will need to work harder.</s>

en: This after the ANC in the Eastern Cape announced tapping into the wisdom of those who led before by involving the former president Thabo Mbeki in a three-day Provincial Executive Committee meeting currently under way in East London.
tsn: Se ke morago ga gore ANC ya kwa Kapa Botlhaba e dire kitsiso ka ga go tsaya botlhale go tswa go ba ba neng ba busa pele ka go akaretsa moporesidente wa maloba Thabo Mbeki kwa kopanong ya malatsi a le mararo, ya komiti ya khuduthamaga ya porofense e e tshwerweng ga jaana kwa East London.
mt0: <pad> This is after the ANC in Eastern Cape announced that it will take advice from the previous leaders including the former president Thabo Mbeki at its three-day conference of the state Executive Committee held in East London now.</s>

en: Dondolo says this is a short term strategy.
tsn: Dondolo o kaya fa se e le togamaano ya paka e khutshwane.
mt0: <pad> Dondolo says that this is a short-term agreement.</s>

en: The involvement of former leaders such as Thabo Mbeki, leaders who are perceived to have the moral compass as a way of this renewal of the ANC is short term.
tsn: Go nna le seabe ga baeteledipele ba maloba ba ba tshwanang le Thabo Mbeki, baeteledipele ba ba nang le maitsholo a a siameng  jaaka tsela ya go ntšhwafatsa ANC, ke selo sa nakwana.
mt0: <pad> The presence of former leaders like Thabo Mbeki, leadership with good morals as a way to rejuvenate the ANC is a temporary phenomenon.</s>

en: It is the strategy that the ANC is using to win the hearts of the voters, however the ANC needs a permanent and long term solution, says Dondolo.
tsn: Ke mokgwa o ANC e o dirisang go gapa dipelo tsa batlhophi, le fa go le jalo, ANC e tlhoka togamaago e e tlaa nnelang ruri, go bua Dondolo.
mt0: <pad> It's a way the ANC uses to win the hearts of voters, however, the ANC needs a permanent mandate, said Dondolo.</s>

en: ANC Northern Cape chairperson Zamani Saul says the party needs to restore its damaged image.
tsn: Modulasetuolo was ANC kwa Kapa Bokone Zamani Saul a re mokgatlho o tlhoka go busetsa setshwantsho sa ona se se senyegileng.
mt0: <pad> The ANC's Northern Cape spokesman Zamani Saul said the organisation needed to rebuild its image that was damaged.</s>

en: He says with this short term solution, the ANC might win the elections in some of the municipalities but there are certain metros where they will be strongly contested by other political organisations.
tsn: A re, ka tharabololo e ya nakwana, ANC e ka fenya ditlhopho kwa dimmasepaleng tse di rileng, mme fela go na le ditoropokgolo tse dingwe tse di tlaa ganetsanngwang ke mekgatlho e mengwe ya sepolotiki.
mt0: <pad> He said, with this temporary solution, the ANC could win local elections in some towns, but there are still other towns that will be contested by other political parties.</s>

en: Mbeki is set to contribute to how to reassert the ANC as a movement rooted among the people.
tsn: Mbeki o tlhomilwe go nna le seabe mo go tsoseletseng ANC jaaka e le mokgatlho o o namileng medi ya ona mo bathong.
mt0: <pad> Mbeki was appointed to play a role in relaunching the ANC as a movement that has spread its media to the people.</s>

en: ANC PEC Spokesperson, Loyiso Magqashela, says the meeting will also draw on the legacy of the founders of the party for the benefit of the current generation.
tsn: Mmueledi wa ANC PEC Loyiso Magqashela a re, kopano e e tlaa ikaega ka boswa jwa batho ba e leng basimolodi ba mokgatlho gore e tle e tswele le bašwa ba jaanong mosola.
mt0: <pad> The ANC PEC spokesman Loyiso Magqashela said the meeting will focus on the legacy of the founders of the party to help the younger generation benefit.</s>

en: To strengthen the issue of the organisational renewal and unity we have then to tap from the wisdom of those who led before so that at least our renewal trajectory gets to be guided and guided properly.
tsn: Go tiisa ntlha ya thulaganyo ya ntšhwafatso le tshwaragano re tshwanetse go tsena mo botlhaleng jwa ba ba neng ba busa pele gore nšhwafatso ya rona e nne le go kaelo sentle.
mt0: <pad> To ensure the principle of reform and integration, we must enter the minds of the previous rulers so that our reform is well-directed.</s>

en: You would have nowadays understood how the ANC is pressured from left right and centre now the renewal project then becomes key and also we want to assert the authority and the leadership of the ANC amongst the society, says Magqashela.
tsn: O ka tswa o tlhalogantse gore mo malatsing a segompieno, ANC e gatelelwa go tswa mo molemeng go ya kwa mojeng, ntšhwafatso ya porojeke jaanong e nna botlhokwa mme gape re batla go gatelela taolo le boeteledipele jwa ANC mo setšhabeng, go bua Magqashela.
mt0: <pad> You may understand that in modern times, the ANC is under pressure from the left to the right, a renewal of the project is now necessary and we also want to stress the power and leadership of the ANC in the community, said Magqashela.</s>

en: As ANC EC kickstarts its 3-day Extended PEC meeting at EL ICC, Dr W.B Rubusana Region this morning, it’s expected to be joined by the former ANC President Cde Thabo Mbeki.
tsn: Jaaka ANC EC e tlile go simolola kopano ya yona e e okeditsweng ya PEC kwa EL ICC, kwa kgaolong ya Dr W.B Rubusana mo mosong o,  yona e solofetswe go nna le moporesidente wa maloba wa ANC Cde Thabo Mbeki.
mt0: <pad> As the ANC EC is to start its expanded PEC meeting at EL ICC, in Dr W.B Rubusana's district this morning, it is expected to have the former ANC president Cde Thabo Mbeki.</s>

en: ANC President, Cyril Ramaphosa, says placing the economy on a renewal path is one of the party’s core responsibilities this year.
tsn: Moporesidente wa ANC, Cyril Ramaphosa, a re go baya ikonomi mo tseleng ya ntšhwafatso ke nngwe ya maikarabelo a a botlhokwa a mokgatlho mo ngwageng ono.
mt0: <pad> The ANC president, Cyril Ramaphosa, said that putting the economy on the path of transformation is one of the key responsibilities of the organisation this year.</s>

en: Ramaphosa was addressing party members virtually at the Northern Cape’s elective conference in Springbok.
tsn: Ramaphosa o ne a eme maloko a mokgatlho ka lefoko ka setshwantshokgopolo kwa khonferenseng ya ditlhopho ya porofense ya Kapa Bokone e e neng e tshwaretswe kwa Springbok.
mt0: <pad> Ramaphosa spoke to members of the organisation via videolink at the South African National Congress's provincial election conference held in Springbok.</s>

en: He added that party members should elect capable individuals to lead at local government level,  and avoid past mistakes of appointing incapable officials who have collapsed municipalities across the country.
tsn: O okeditse ka gore maloko a mokgatlho a tshwanetse go tlhopha batho ba ba nang le bokgoni go etelela pele kwa maemong a pusoselegae, le go thibela diphoso tse di fitileng tsa go thapa batlhankedi ba ba palelwang ke tiro, ba ba phutlamisitseng dimmasepala tsa naga tse di farologaneng.
mt0: <pad> He added that members of the organization should select competent people to lead local governments, and avoid past mistakes of recruiting unqualified employees, who have destroyed the national municipalities.</s>

en: SABC News Ulrich Hendricks reports on the Northern Capes elective conference.
tsn: Ulrich Hendricks wa dikgang tsa SABC o bega ka ga khonferense ya ditlhopho ya Kapa Bokone.
mt0: <pad> Ulrich Hendricks of the SABC news reports on the North Cape election conference.</s>

en: On behalf of the National Executive Committee, we want to thank and appreciate the Mlangeni and Ledwaba family for coming forward to work in partnership with the ANC in celebrating the legacy of Mlangeni under the theme: Morality, ethics, and renewal.
tsn: Mo boemong jwa Komiti ya Khuduthamaga ya Bosetšhaba, re batla go leboga le go tlotlomatsa lelapa la ga Mlangeni le ga Ledwaba go tla go dirisana mmogo le ANC mo go ketekeng boswa jwa ga Mlangeni ka fa tlase ga setlhogo se se reng: Maitsholo, boitshwaro le ntšhwafatso.
mt0: <pad> In the name of the National Executive Committee, we want to thank and honour the Mlangeni family and the Ledwaba family for their commitment to working with the ANC in celebrating Mlangeni's legacy under the theme: Morality, ethics and renewal.</s>

en: It actually fits well in this period of 2021 where we have our national team of unity, renewal, and rebuilding in the year of Charlotte Maxeke.
tsn: Se se direga ka nako e e siameng mo pakeng e ya 2021 moo  re nang le  setlhopha sa rona sa bosetšhaba sa kutlwano, ntšhwafatso, le kago sešwa mo ngwageng ono  wa Charlotte Maxeke
mt0: <pad> This is a good time of year for 2021 when we have our national team of unity, renewal and rebuilding this year in Charlotte.</s>

en: What is most important is that here lies a person who has been very selfless and protective of the ANC, who passed on being concerned about the state of the organisation, and in his memory, we do believe that as the NEC we owe it to people like him in ensuring that we bring the NEC together and we self-correct, says NEC member Nomvula Mokonyane.
tsn: Se se botlhokwa ke gore fa, go robetse motho yo o pelotshweu yo o neng a sireletsa ANC, yo o tlhokofalang a na le dingongorego ka ga seemo sa setheo, mme mo segopotsong sa gagwe, re dumela gore jaaka NEC, re kolota batho ba ba tshwanang le ene ka go netefatsa gore re golaganya NEC mme re a iphosolola, go bua leloko la NEC  Nomvula Mokonyane.
mt0: <pad> The most important thing is that here, a generous man who saved the ANC, who was critical of the state of the organisation, and in his memory, we believe that as NEC, we are rewarding people like him by ensuring that we connect with NEC and apologize, said NEC member Nomvula Mokonyane.</s>

en: June and Andrew Mlangeni Foundation Chairperson, Professor Hlengiwe Mkhize says they are delighted.
tsn: June le Modulasetulo wa Andrew Mlangeni Foundation, Moporofesara Hlengiwe Mkhize ba rile ba itumetse thata.
mt0: <pad> June and the chair of Andrew Mlangeni Foundation, Professor Hlengiwe Mkhize said they were very happy.</s>

en: We were committed to taking forward his last struggle of dealing with moral issues and especially within his own organisation and also ethical issues and we thought, look we are all in it now, he’s gone, let’s talk openly about these things and difficult topics.
tsn: Re ne re ikemiseditse go tsweletsa kgaratlho ya gagwe ya bofelo pele e e neng e tshwaragane le mathata a  boitsholo, segolobogolo ka fa setheong sa gagwe, gape  le mathata a maitseo, mme ra akanya gore re rotlhe mo mathateng a jaanong, ena o tsamaile, a re bueng ka dilo tse re lokologile le ditlhogo tse dingwe tse boima.
mt0: <pad> We were ready to continue his last fight which was concerned with moral problems, particularly in his institution, and also with moral issues, but we thought that we all had problems now, he left us, telling us about what we are freed from and other difficult topics.</s>

en: And so we are really grateful that Ntate Mlangeni set a tone.
tsn: Ka jalo re lebogela gore Ntate Mlangeni o simolotse sengwe.
mt0: <pad> So we are thankful that Mr Mlangeni has started something.</s>

en: Mkhize says Mlangeni was against corruption and how it is costing the poor:
tsn: Mkhize o rile Mlangeni o ne a le kgatlhanong le bosenyi, le ka mokgwa o bo amang bahumanegi ka ona.
mt0: <pad> Mkhize said Mlangeni was against crime, and the way it affected the poor.</s>

en: The University of South Africa hosted an Inaugural Memorial Lecture for the freedom fighter.
tsn: Yunibesithi ya Aforika Borwa e e ne e tshwere Thuto ya segopotso sa Kgakololo sa balwela kgololesego.
mt0: <pad> The University of South Africa held the Freedom Fighters' Memorial lecture.</s>

en: It was delivered by Justice and Correctional Services Minister, Ronald Lamola.
tsn: E rebotswe  ke Tona ya Bosiamisi le Ditirelo tsa Kgopololo, Ronald Lamola.
mt0: <pad> It was opened by the Minister of Health and Mental Services, Ronald Lamola.</s>

en: The Economic Freedom Fighters (EFF) has expressed its condolences to the family and international congregants of the Synagogue, Church of All Nations (Scoan) on the passing of Nigerian televangelist TB Joshua.
tsn: Mokgatlho wa Economic Freedom Fighters (EFF) o rometse matshidiso a ona go balelapa le phuthego ya boditšhabatšhaba ya Synagogue, Kereke ya Dinagakopano (Scoan) mo lesong la moruti yo itsegeng mo di thelebišheneng wa moNigeria TB Joshua.
mt0: <pad> The Economic Freedom Fighters (EFF) has sent its complaint to the family and international synagogue, Church of the Congregation (Scoan) at the funeral of Nigerian TV preacher TB Joshua.</s>

en: Joshua died on Saturday night in a Lagos hospital at the age of 57 years.
tsn: Joshua o tlhokafetse bosigo jwa Lamatlhatso kwa bookelong jwa  Lagos a le dingwaga di le 57.
mt0: <pad> Joshua died on Wednesday night at the Lagos hospital aged 54.</s>

en: His self-proclaimed healing powers attracted many high-profile South Africans to his church in Lagos, including EFF leader Julius Malema, former Transport Minister Dipuo Peters and the late former Springbok player Wium Basson.
tsn: Maatla a gagwe a go bua le go fodisa a gogetse MaAforika Borwa a maemo a kwa godimo kwa kerekeng ya gagwe kwa Lagos, go akarediwa moeteledipele wa EFF Julius Malema, Tona ya maloba ya dipalangwa Dipuo Peters le motshameki wa maloba wa Springbok Wium Basson.
mt0: <pad> His power of prophecy and healing attracted top South Africans to his church in Lagos, including the leader of the EFF Julius Malema, the former transport minister Dipuo Peters and the former Springbok player Wium Basson.</s>

en: The EFF says millions of people around the world, will remember him for his selfless commitment to the Word of God.
tsn: Mokgatlho wa EFF o rile dimilione tsa batho go ralala lefatshe, ba tla mo gopola ka bopelotshweu jwa gagwe le go ineela mo lefokong la Modimo.
mt0: <pad> The EFF said that millions of people around the world will remember him for his kindness and believe in God's Word.</s>

en: In the video below, SABC News Foreign Editor Sophie Mokoena gives an update on TB Joshua.
tsn: Mo kgatisong e e fa tlase, motseleganyi wa dikgang tsa boditšhaba tsa SABC, Sophie Mokoena o neelana ka tshedimoso ka TB Joshua.
mt0: <pad> In the following segment, SABC's national news correspondent Sophie Mokoena provides information about TB Joshua.</s>

en: Public Protector Busisiwe Mkhwebane’s challenge against Parliament’s impeachment rules will be heard in the Western Cape High Court on Monday.
tsn: Kgwetlho e Mosireletsi wa Botlhe Busisiwe Mkhwebane a lebaneng le yona kgatlhanong le melao ya palamenente ya tshekiso ya motlhankedimogolo, e tlaa reediwa kwa kgotlatshekelo ya wa Kapa Bophirima ka Mosupologo.
mt0: <pad> The challenge by the Public Protector Busisiwe Mkhwebane against the parliamentary legislation on the dismissal of senior officials will be heard in the Western Cape High Court on Monday.</s>

en: The matter, expected to be heard by 3 judges, has been set down until Friday.
tsn: Ntlha e e lebeletsweng go reediwa ke baatlhodi ba le 3 e, e beetswe kwa thoko go fitlha ka Labotlhano.
mt0: <pad> The matter, which was to be heard by the three judges, was delayed until Thursday.</s>

en: Last month, Western Cape Judge President John Hlophe withdrew from the case after the Democratic Alliance requested his recusal.
tsn: Mo kgweding e e fetileng, Moatlhodimogolo wa  Kapa Bophirima, John Hlophe o  ikgogetse morago mo kgetsing e, morago ga gore mokgatlho wa Democratic Alliance o kope thulano ya dikgatlhegelo ya gagwe.
mt0: <pad> Last month, the Chief Justice of Western Cape, John Hlophe resigned from the case, after the Democratic Alliance accused him of conflict of interest.</s>

en: Hlophe was recently found guilty of gross misconduct by the Judicial Conduct Tribunal.
tsn: Hlophe o bonwe molato wa bogodu ke kgotlatshekelo ya Boitshwaro Jwa Boatlhodi.
mt0: <pad> Hlophe was convicted of stealing by the Court of Justice of South Africa.</s>

en: The motion to impeach Mkhwebane was brought by the DA.
tsn: Tsamaiso ya go latofatsa Mkhwebane e tlisitswe ke ba DA.
mt0: <pad> The DA has started the prosecution of Mkhwebane.</s>

en: Meanwhile, the Judicial Services Commission will decide at the end of next month whether Hlophe is guilty of gross misconduct and should face impeachment.
tsn: Re sa ntse re le foo, Khomišene ya Tirelo ya Bosiamisi e tla swetsa kwa bofelong jwa kgwedi e e tlang gore a Hlophe o bonwe molato wa bogodu le gore a o tshwanetse go lebagana le ditatofatso.
mt0: <pad> While we are still in the process, the Commission of Justice will decide at the end of the month whether Hlophe is guilty of fraud and whether he should face charges.</s>

en: The Economic Freedom Fighters was among the parties that did not support the establishment of the committee.
tsn: Lekoko la Economic Freedom Fighters e ne le lengwe la makoko a a neng a sa tshegetse tlhomo ya komiti e.
mt0: <pad> The Economic Freedom Fighters Party was one of the few parties that did not support the selection of the commission.</s>

en: The party’s Member of Parliament Natasha Ntlangwini said the rules were deliberately crafted with the Public Protector in mind.
tsn: Leloko la lekoko la Palamente Natasha Ntlangwini o rile, fa go ne go thalwa melao e, go ne go akantswe ka Mosireletsi wa Setšhaba
mt0: <pad> Members of the parliamentary committee Natasha Ntlangwini said, when the bill was drafted, it was thought of the National Security Advisor.</s>

en: We are opposed to the recommendations by the panel.
tsn: Re kgatlhanong le dikatlanegiso tse di neetsweeng ke phanele.
mt0: <pad> We are against the recommendations made by the panel.</s>

en: This House never had rules on the removal of Chapter 9 leaders.
tsn: Ntlo e ga e ise e nne le melao ka ga tloso ya Kgaolo ya 9 ya baeteledipele.
mt0: <pad> The House has not passed any legislation on the removal of Article 9 of the President's Act.</s>

en: These rules were made with the Public Protector in mind, a water-tight method to remove the Public Protector and no one else.
tsn: Melawana e, e dirilwe go akantswe Mosireletsi wa Setšhaba, mokgwa o o masisi wa go tlosa Mosireletsi wa Setšhaba, eseng ope gape.
mt0: <pad> The laws were made to protect the National Security Attorney, a very serious way to remove the National Security Attorney, not another.</s>

en: Former President Kgalema Motlanthe has described the late Struggle icon Andrew Mlangeni as a dependable and honest person who welcomed all in his midst and in the African National Congress (ANC).
tsn: Moporesitente wa maloba Kgalema Motlanthe o tlhalositse mogaka o o tlhokofetseng Andrew Mlangeni jaaka motho yo o neng a ikemetse le go tshepagala yo o neng a amogela tsotlhe mo boemong jwa gagwe le mo African National Congress (ANC).
mt0: <pad> The former President Kgalema Motlanthe described the man who died Andrew Mlangeni as a self-confident and reliable person who accepted everything for him and the African National Congress (ANC).</s>

en: The ANC is paying tribute to the late Mlangeni at a wreath laying ceremony at his grave, alongside his wife June at the Roodepoort Cemetery.
tsn: Mokgatlho wa ANC o akgola moswi Mlangeni kwa moletlong wa peo ya dikgare kwa lebitleng la gagwe, mmogo le mogatse June kwa dirapeng tsa Roodepoort.
mt0: <pad> The ANC honoured the late Mlangeni at a ceremony of wreath-laying at his grave, as well as June at Roodepoort Gardens.</s>

en: Wreath-laying ceremony in commemoration of Mama June Mlangeni and Isithwalandwe / Seaparankwe Ntate Andrew Mlangeni at the Roodepoort Cemetery.
tsn: Moletlo wa peo ya dikgare mo segopotsong sa ga Mme June Mlangeni le Isithwalandwe/Seaparankwe Ntate Andrew Mlangeni Kwa Dirapeng tsa Roodepoort
mt0: <pad> The memorial service for Ms June Mlangeni and her late husband/father Andrew Mlangeni at Roodepoort Gardens in memory of them.</s>

en: Motlanthe says he is glad to have worked with the late Mlangeni, for he learnt a lot from the family.
tsn: Motlanthe a re o leboga fa a ne a dira le moswi Mlangeni, a re o ithutile go le gontsi go tswa mo lelapeng.
mt0: <pad> Motlanthe said he was thankful for working with Mlangeni, saying he learned a lot from the family.</s>

en: The Mlangeni family attended the ceremony.
tsn: Lelapa la Mlangeni le ne le le teng kwa  moletlong.
mt0: <pad> The Mlangeni family was present at the memorial.</s>

en: ANC NEC members Lindiwe Sisulu and Nomvula Mokonyane also attended.
tsn: Maloko a ANC NEC Lindiwe Sisulu le Nomvula Mokonyane le bona ba ne ba le teng.
mt0: <pad> Members of the ANC NEC Lindiwe Sisulu and Nomvula Mokonyane were also present.</s>

en: Wreathe-laying ceremony for June and Andrew Mlangeni.
tsn: Moletlo wa peo ya dikgare wa ga June le Andrew Mlangeni.
mt0: <pad> June and Andrew Mlangeni's wedding anniversary</s>

en: Delivering the keynote address, Motlanthe said: Comrade Andrew Mlangeni was a leader of our struggle who embodied the very core of what the struggle was about.
tsn: Fa a neelana ka puokgolo, Motlanthe o rile: Khomoreiti Andrew Mlangeni e ne e le moeteledipele wa kgaratlho ya rona yo o supileng boteng jo bo tlhalosang gore kgaratlho e ne e le ka ga eng.
mt0: <pad> When he gave his speech, Motlanthe said: "Commissioner Andrew Mlangeni was our leader who pointed to the depths that define what the struggle was about."</s>

en: He was an elder on who’s council one could rely on.
tsn: E ene e le mogolo yo motho a ka tshepelang mo go ene.
mt0: <pad> He is a trustworthy adult.</s>

en: He was truthful, earnest, and dependable.
tsn: O ne a tshepega e bile a ikemetse.
mt0: <pad> He was trustworthy and independent.</s>

en: He generously gave us his knowledge and skills.
tsn: Ka mosa, o re neetse kitso le bokgoni jwa gagwe.
mt0: <pad> He has given us his knowledge and skills with kindness.</s>

en: The Democratic Alliance (DA) has described as irrational and obscure a law that strips South Africans of their citizenship.
tsn: Mokgatlho wa Democratic Alliance (DA) o tlhalositse molao o o sa utlwagaleng le go tlhaloganyega o o amogang maAforika Borwa boagi jwa bona.
mt0: <pad> The Democratic Alliance (DA) has denounced the unconstitutional and inhumane law that strips South Africans of their nationality.</s>

en: This follows complaints from citizens based in London who tried to renew their South African citizenship, only to discover that they are no longer South African citizens because they have claimed additional citizenship.
tsn: Se se latela dingongorego go tswa go baagi ba ba nnang kwa London, fa ba leka go ntšhwafatsa boagi jwa bona jwa Aforika Borwa, ba lemoga fa ba sa tlhole e le baagi ba Aforika Borwa ka gonne ba kopile tlaleletso ya boagi.
mt0: <pad> This follows complaints from residents living in London, who, when trying to re-renew their South African nationality, realize that they are no longer South African citizens because they requested an extension of citizenship.</s>

en: This is because, under the current Citizenship Act in South Africa, you have to first apply to the Department of Home Affairs for permission to get another citizenship.
tsn: Se ke ka ntlha ya gore, ka fa tlase ga Molao wa Boagi mo Aforika Borwa wa ga jaana, o tshwanetse go dira kopo kwa Lefapheng la Merero ya Selegae go bona tetla ya go bona boagi jwa naga e nngwe.
mt0: <pad> This is because, under the current South African Immigration Act, you have to apply to the Department of Home Affairs to obtain approval to obtain another country's nationality.</s>

en: However, DA MP Adrian Roos says the party is opposed to this law and will fight it in the High Court on behalf of thousands of South Africans who have lost their citizenship without their knowledge.
tsn: Le gale, Leloko la palamente la DA Adrian Roos a re lekoko le kgatlhanong le Molao o, mme le tlaa lwantshana le ona kwa  kgotlatshekelong e e kwa godimo mo boemong jwa diketekete tsa MaAforika Borwa a a latlhegetsweng ke boagi kwa ntle ga kitso ya bona.
mt0: <pad> However, DA MP Adrian Roos said his party is opposing the bill, and will fight it in the highest court in the name of thousands of South Africans who have lost their nationality without their knowledge.</s>

en: The DA is challenging this law in court.
tsn: DA e gwetlhana le Molao ono kwa kgotlatshekelo.
mt0: <pad> DA is fighting the law in court.</s>

en: It is not a particularly rational law seeing as the Department of Home Affairs has previously stated that it has nothing against dual citizenship.
tsn: Ga se molao o o utlwagalang jaaka le Lefapha la Merero ya Selegae le kile la tlhalosa gore ga le kgatlhanong le boagi jwa dinaga tse pedi.
mt0: <pad> It is not a clear law, as the Department of Home Affairs has previously stated that it is not opposed to dual nationality.</s>

en: But if that’s your policy, then you must not say you support dual citizenship.
tsn: Fela ke molao wa lona, lo seke lwa re lo tshegetsa boagi jwa dinaga tse pedi.
mt0: <pad> Just as your law is, don't pretend you support the unity of two states.</s>

en: If you look at the interim Constitution, it spoke about the fact that no citizen shall be without justification, and this was changed in the final Constitution.
tsn: Fa o lebelela Molaotheo wa nakwana, o bua ka ntlha ya gore ga go moagi yo a tlaa nnang kwa ntle ga tshegetso ya molao, mme se se fetotswe mo Molaotheong.
mt0: <pad> If you look at the provisional constitution, it says that no resident will stay without legal support, but this has been changed in the constitution.</s>

en: They removed the words without justification to say this right should obsolete that you shouldn’t be deprived of your citizenship.
tsn: Ba tlositse mafoko ntle le go tlhalosa gore tshwanelo eno e tshwanetse e seke ya tsenngwa tirisong gore o seke wa ganelwa ka boagi jwa gago.
mt0: <pad> They removed the words without specifying that this requirement should not be implemented so that you are not denied your privacy.</s>

en: So the argument of the DA is that if anything, you should have to legitimately and actively renounce your citizenship before you can lose it, says Roos.
tsn: Ka jalo ngangisano ya DA ke gore, le fa go ka nna jang, o tshwanetse go nna le tumelelo ya go ka tlogela boagi jwa gago pele bo ka go latlhegela, go bua  Roos.
mt0: <pad> So the DA argument is that, whatever happens, you should have the right to leave your identity before it loses its value, said Roos.</s>

en: Below is the full interview with DA MP Adrian Roos.
tsn: Fa tlase, ke ditherisano tse di feleletseng tsa leloko la DA Adrian Roos.
mt0: <pad> Please don't know.</s>

en: Deputy President David Mabuza has weighed in regarding the R150 million Digital Vibes scandal allegedly linked to Health Minister Zweli Mkhize.
tsn: Motlatsamoporesitente David Mabuza o ntshitse maikutlo a gagwe ka ga ditatofatso tse di maswe tsa dimilione di le R150 tsa Digital Vibes tse di golaganngwang le Tona ya Boitekanelo, Zweli Mkhize.
mt0: <pad> The Deputy President David Mabuza has expressed his opinion on the Digital Vibes scandal that is allegedly linked to Health Minister Zweli Mkhize.</s>

en: He was addressing a group of military veterans in Limpopo on Saturday.
tsn: O ne a bua le setlhopha sa baitseanape ba maloba ba sesole kwa Limpopo ka Lamatlhatso.
mt0: <pad> He spoke to a group of former soldiers in Limpopo on Tuesday.</s>

en: The Special Investigative Unit (SIU) is probing allegations that the minister benefited from the money paid to Digital Vibes to do public relations work for the department.
tsn: Yuniti e e kgethegileng ya dipatlisiso (SIU) e sekaseka ditatofatso tsa gore tona o nnile le seabe mo mading a a duetsweng Digital  Vibes go dira le tiro e e amanang le setšhaba ya Lefapha.
mt0: <pad> The Special Investigation Unit (SIU) is investigating allegations that the minister was involved in the hiring of Digital Vibes to perform social work for the Department's public relations department.</s>

en: The Democratic Alliance (DA) is among those calling for the resignation of Mkhize.
tsn: Mokgatlho wa Democratic Alliance (DA) ke mongwe wa mekgatlho e e e batlang gore Mkhize a role tiro.
mt0: <pad> The Democratic Alliance (DA) is one of the organizations that want Mkhize to resign.</s>

en: Mabuza says people should wait for the outcome of the investigation.
tsn: Mabuza a re batho ba tshwanetse go emela dipoelo tsa patlisiso.
mt0: <pad> Mabuza said people should wait for the results of the investigation.</s>

en: Of course if there are allegations they will always disrupt the thinking of government
tsn: Ke nnete gore, fa go na le ditatofatso, ba tlaa thibela dikakanyo tsa puso
mt0: <pad> It is true that if there are charges, they will block the freedom of opinion.</s>

en: But I think we should take from what the President has said that this is being attended to.
tsn: Fela ke akanya gore re tshwanetse go tsaya  se Moporesidente a se buileng gore kgang e e lebeletswe.
mt0: <pad> But I think we should take the President's words that this issue is being considered.</s>

en: Earlier the Special Investigation Units Kaizer Kganyago says they’re still investigating and plan to conclude the probe soon.
tsn: Pejana, Kaizer Kganyago wa Yuniti ya Dipatlisiso tse di Kgethegileng ,o rile ba sa ntse ba batlisisa mme ba ikaeletse go konosetsa patlisiso e ka bonako.
mt0: <pad> Before that, Kaizer Kganyago of the Special Investigation Unit said they were still investigating and hoped to return the report as soon as possible.</s>

en: Deputy President David Mabuza says about R654 million meant to assist military veterans is lying idle in the Department of Defence and is not being used because the department has not been working properly.
tsn: Motlatsamoporesitente David Mabuza a re dimilione di ka nna  R654 tse di tshwanetseng go ka bo di thusa baitseanape ba badiredi ba sesole di sasaila fela mo Lefapheng la Tshireletso mme ga di dirisiwe ka gonne lefapha le ntse le sa dire sentle.
mt0: <pad> The deputy president David Mabuza said R654 million which were meant to help the research of soldiers' scientists was left in the Defence Department and not used because the department is still not doing its job well.</s>

en: Mabuza was addressing a group of military veterans in Limpopo on Saturday.
tsn: Mabuza o ne a bua le setlhopha sa baitseanape ba badiredi ba sesole kwa Limpopo ka Lamatlhatso.
mt0: <pad> Mabuza spoke to a group of academics at the University of Limpopo on Wednesday.</s>

en: He has urged military veterans to form one single group instead of fighting one another.
tsn: O kopile baitseanape ba sesole gore ba ipope go nna ngatana e le nngwe go na le gore ba lwantshane ka bo bona.
mt0: <pad> He urged military scientists to unite as one body instead of fighting each other.</s>

en: Well, the money has not been used, it lies in the department because there is a number of problems, but the military veterans are complaining.
tsn: Le gale, madi ga a ise a dirisiwe, a dutse kwa lefapheng ka gonne go na le mathata a le mantsinyana, fela baitseanape ba badiredi ba sesole ba a ngongorega.
mt0: <pad> However, the money has not been used, it is still in the bank because of several problems, but the scientists of the military service complain.</s>

en: The biggest problem that we are facing is the verification program which affects the no statutory forces.
tsn: Bothata jo bogolo jo re lebaganeng le jona ke lenaneo la netefatso le le amang thata tlolo molao .
mt0: <pad> The biggest problem we face is the verification program that focuses on crime.</s>

en: Mabuza says he hopes that now that a Director-General of the department has been appointed, military veterans will get the assistance they want.
tsn: Mabuza a re o solofela  gore ka jaanong Mokaedi-Kakaretso wa Lefapha o setse a tlhophilwe, bagaka ba sesole ba tla fitlhela thuso e ba e batlang.
mt0: <pad> Mabuza said he hoped that now that the Deputy Director of the Department has been appointed, the soldiers will get the support they need.</s>

en: He has urged military veterans across all the political spectrum to organise themselves and to enable the government to adequately support them.
tsn: O rotloeditse bagaka ba sesole go ralala dikarolo tsotlhe tsa sepolotiki go ipaakanya le go letlelela puso go leka go ba tshegetsa.
mt0: <pad> He encouraged all political parties to organize and allow the government to try to support them.</s>

en: Military veterans often complain about a lack of decent housing, health services, and jobs.
tsn: Bagaka ba Sesole go le gantsi ngongorega ka ga tlhokego ya matlo, ditirelo tsa boitekanelo tse di nang le seriti, le go tlhola ditiro.
mt0: <pad> Military families often complain about the shortage of housing, decent health care, and unemployment.</s>

en: Disunity among veterans.
tsn: Go tlhoka tirisanommogo magareng ga bagaka.
mt0: <pad> The lack of cooperation between the parents.</s>

en: Mabuza says disunity and groupings among military veterans and ex-combatants are undermining the government’s efforts to address their challenges.
tsn: Mabuza  a re go tlhoka tirisanommogo  le ditlhophatlhophana magareng ga bagaka ba sesole le masole a maloba ke go nyatsa matsapa a puso mo go samaganeng le dikgwetlho tsa bone.
mt0: <pad> The lack of coordination and cooperation between the current leaders of the military and the former soldiers is a disregard for the government's efforts to address their problems.</s>

en: He says military veterans from former liberations parties are also battling with verification of struggle credentials.
tsn: O rile bagaka ba badiredi ba sesole go tswa kwa makokong a tokologo a maloba le bona ba sokola ka go netefatsa dintlha tsa bona tsa boitshupo.
mt0: <pad> He said that former soldiers who were released from the military yesterday also had difficulty verifying their identity.</s>

en: You must try and organise yourselves, we don’t want these groupings amongst yourselves because we don’t understand why you are fighting amongst yourselves.
tsn: Lo tshwanetse go leka le go ipaakanya ka bolona, ga re batle ditlhophatlhophana tseno magareng ga lona ka ntlha ya gore ga re tlhaloganye gore goreng lo lwa ka bolona.
mt0: <pad> You have to try and fix yourself, we don't want these fights between you because we don't understand why you fight each other.</s>

en: You are a community that is getting smaller and smaller, you are a community that is aging so why would old people fight among themselves, MKVA, and the military council you must go and solve your issues with immediate effect.
tsn: Lo setšhaba se se nnang se fokotsega gannyane le gannyane, le setšhaba se se tsofalang jaanong goreng batsofe ba ka batla go lwantshana ka bo bona, MKVA, le Khansele ya sesole tsamayang  go rarabolola mathata a lona ka bonako.
mt0: <pad> The population is shrinking, and the population is getting older so that the elderly may want to fight each other, MKVA, and the military council are moving to solve its problems quickly.</s>

en: It’s not good for this community.
tsn: Se ga se a siamela setšhaba se.
mt0: <pad> This is not good for this nation.</s>

en: Mabuza interacts with veterans from the South African Defence Force, Mkhonto we Sizwe, Azanian People’s Liberation Army, and the Venda Defence Force in Polokwane, Limpopo.
tsn: Mabuza o buisana le bagaka go tswa kwa South African Defence Force, Mkhonto we Sizwe, Azanian People Liberation Army le  Venda Defence Force kwa Polokwane, Limpopo.
mt0: <pad> Mabuza is speaking with soldiers from the South African Defence Force, Mkhonto we Sizwe, Azanian People Liberation Army and the Venda Defence Force in Polokwane, Limpopo.</s>

en: Deputy President David Mabuza engaged with veterans from the South African Defence Force, Mkhonto we Sizwe, Azanian People’s Liberation Army and the Venda Defence Force.
tsn: Motlatsamoporesitente David Mabuza o tlotla le South African Defence Force, Mkhonto we Sizwe, Azanian People Liberation Army le  Venda Defence Force.
mt0: <pad> South African Defence Force, Mkhonto we Sizwe, Azanian People Liberation Army and Venda Defence Force.</s>

en: Although they are still disgruntled, veterans believe there is now a glimmer of hope.
tsn: Le fa ba ne ba sa itumela, bagaka ba dumela gore go na le kganya ya tshepo.
mt0: <pad> Although they were unhappy, many of them believed that there was a light of hope.</s>

en: I am from Azania MVA, hopefully, our problems will be attended to once the partnership can be forged between us and the national government.
tsn: Ke tswa kwa Azania MVA, ka tsholofelo, mathata a rona a tlaa rarabololwa, fa fela go ka nna le tirisanommogo magareng ga rona le puso ya bosetšhaba.
mt0: <pad> I'm from Azania MVA, hopefully, our problems will be resolved, once there is cooperation between us and the national government.</s>

en: MK National Councils Emmanuel Maake says, We have had all the sorts of problems including health, housing, pensions & school fees for children, we are basically struggling.
tsn: Emmanuel Maake wa khansele ya bosetšhaba ya MK  a re, re  nnile le mathata a mefuta yotlhe go akaretsa le boitekanelo, matlo, diphenšene le dituelo tsa bana ba sekolo, re na le mathata a mantsi tota.
mt0: <pad> Emmanuel Maake of the national council of MK said, "We have had all kinds of problems including health, housing, pensions and school fees, we have a lot of problems.</s>

en: Some military veterans were not happy that they were denied entry to the venue where Mabuza was addressing them.
tsn: Bagaka ba Sesole ba bangwe ba ne ba sa itumelela gore ba ne ba ganelwa go tsena kwa lefelong le Mabuza o neng a ba ema ka lefoko kwa go lona.
mt0: <pad> Some soldiers were upset that they were not allowed to enter the place where Mabuza was speaking to them.</s>

en: They were not on the list of those who were expected to enter the rugby stadium.
tsn: Ba ne ba se mo lenaaneng la ba ba neng ba tshwanetse go tsena kwa lebaleng la metshameko la Rakabi.
mt0: <pad> They were not on the list of people to be allowed into the Rabo Stadium.</s>

en: The Inkatha Freedom Party (IFP) led by Nquthu Municipality in northern KwaZulu-Natal is taking the provincial Cooperative Governance Department to court for placing it under administration.
tsn: Lekoko la Inkatha Freedom Party (IFP) le eteletswe pele ke Mmasepala wa Nquthu kwa Bokone jwa kgaolo ya KwaZulu-Natal le isa Lefapha la Taolo ya Kopanelo ya porofense kwa kgotlatshekelo ka ntlha ya fa le tsentswe ka fa tlase ga tsamaiso.
mt0: <pad> The Inkatha Freedom Party (IFP) affiliate in Nquthu Municipality in the North of KwaZulu-Natal has sued the Department of Coordination of the Province for being placed under process.</s>

en: The decision was announced by COGTA MEC, Sipho Hlomuka on Thursday.
tsn: Tshwetso e, e dirilwe ke MEC wa COGTA, Sipho hlomuka ka Labone.
mt0: <pad> The decision was made by the MEC of COGTA, Sipho Hlomoka on Thursday.</s>

en: He cited a recent audit outcome and a high court ruling that the appointment of certain acting senior managers was irregular.
tsn: O ne a nopola dipolelo tsa boruni tsa ga jaana le dikatlholo tsa  kgotlatshekelo e e kwa godimo tsa gore go tlhomiwa ga batsamaisi ba bangwe ba bagolo ba nama o sa tshwere go ne go  sa tlhomama.
mt0: <pad> He cited recent reports and high court rulings that the appointment of other senior meat managers before he was arrested was unconstitutional.</s>

en: The Nquthu council has argued that the MEC has no basis to place the municipality under administration.
tsn: Khansele ya Nquthu e boletse gore MEC one a sena dithata tsa go baya mmasepala ka fa tlase ga tsamaiso.
mt0: <pad> The Nquthu council said that the MEC had no power to put the municipality under a process.</s>

en: The decision to challenge Hlomuka’s action was taken during a council meeting on Thursday, a day after the provincial Cooperative Governance Department announced that it is placing the municipality under administration.
tsn: Tshwetso ya go gwetlha dikgato tsa  ga Hlomuka e tserwe ka nako ya kopano ya Khansele ka Labone, letsatsi morago ga porofense ya Lefapha la Taolo ya Kopanelo e dira kitsiso ya go baya mmasepala ka fa tlase ga tsamaiso.
mt0: <pad> The decision to challenge the action of Ms. Hlomuka was made at a Council meeting on Thursday, a day after the state Department of Coordination Management announced that the municipality was placed under process.</s>

en: In February, the provincial government placed the municipality under administration.
tsn: Ka Tlhakole, puso ya porofense e ne ya baya mmasepala ka fa tlase ga tsamaiso.
mt0: <pad> On Monday, the state government placed the city under administrative control.</s>

en: But the decision was overturned by the National Minister of Co-operative Governance Dr. Nkosazana Dlamini-Zuma.
tsn: Mme tshwetso e ne ya busediwa morago ke Tona ya Bosetšhaba ya puso, ngaka Nkosazana Dlamini-Zuma.......
mt0: <pad> But the decision was reversed by the National Minister of Health, Dr Nkosazana Dlamini-Zuma.</s>

en: She argued that there was no substantial reason to place the municipality under administration.
tsn: O boletse gore go ne go sena  lebaka le le utlwalang la go baya mmasepala ka fa tlase ga tsamaiso.
mt0: <pad> He said there was no reason to put the city under investigation.</s>

en: I think this intervention is not genuine, but a political ploy by MEC because in March Dr. Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma turned down an earlier decision by COGTA in the province to place the municipality under administration.
tsn: Ke akanya gore tsereganyo eno ga e se boammaaruri, mme ke leano la la ga MEC ka gonne ka kgwedi ya Mopitlwe Ngaka Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma  o ganetsane le tshwetso ya COGTA mo porofenseng ya go baya mmasepala ka fa tlase ga tsamaiso.
mt0: <pad> I think this claim is not true, but is the MEC's plan because in April Dr Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma opposed the COGTA decision in the province to put municipalities under the system.</s>

en: Dlamini- Zuma instead recommended that the provincial government intervene with Section 139 1A which means they could monitor, guide, and assist the municipality.
tsn: Dlamini- Zuma, ka jalo o gakolotse gore puso ya porofense e ikamanye le Karolo 139 1A e e kayang gore ba ka baya leitlho, ba kaela, le go thusa mmasepala.
mt0: <pad> Dlamini-Zuma, therefore, reminded the state government of Article 139 1A which means that they can monitor, direct and assist municipalities.</s>

en: But Cogta in KZN did not do that.
tsn: Fela  COGTA  ya kwa KZN ga ya dira  jalo.
mt0: <pad> Just COGTA in KZN didn't do that.</s>

en: Yes, we did get a disclaimer audit outcome, but the reasons for that, the previous senior managers, when they left they deliberately took with them crucial information which was required for auditing purposes, says Mayor Lindokuhle Shabalala.
tsn: Ee, re fitlhetse dipoelo tsa boruni tsa go sa dire kopotuelo, fela mabaka a seo, batsamaisi ba ba fetileng, fa ba ka tsamaya ba tsamaile le tshedimosetso e e botlhokwa le bona e e neng e tlhokega mo maikaelelong a go runa, ga bua Lindokuhle Shabalala.
