mt0: <pad> No, we found the results of a lack of compilation, but the reasons for that, the previous management, when they left, they also left with important information that was needed in the purpose of planning, said Lindokuhle Shabalala.</s>

en: Nquthu municipality threatens to take COGTA to court
tsn: Mmasepala wa Nquthu o dira matshosetsi a go isa COGTA kwa kgotlatshekelo
mt0: <pad> The Nquthu Municipality is threatening to sue COGTA in court.</s>

en: The IFP in KwaZulu-Natal has accused Hlomuka of helping the African National Congress (ANC) to run the municipality through the back door by placing it under administration.
tsn: IFP  ya kwa KwaZulu-Natal e latofaditse Hlomuka ka go thusana le African National Congress (ANC) go tsamaisa mmasepala ka tsela e e sa siamang, ka go e tsenya ka fa tlase ga tsamaiso.
mt0: <pad> The IFP of KwaZulu-Natal accused Hlamuka of collusion with the African National Congress (ANC) to run the municipality in a corrupt way, by putting it under the control of the ANC.</s>

en: Provincial party chairperson, Thamsanqa Ntuli says the ANC is hell-bent on running the Nquthu Municipality even though they lost elections in the area.
tsn: Modulasetulo wa Lekoko la Porofense, Thamsanqa Ntuli o rile ANC e batla go tsamaisa Mmasepala wa Nquthu le fa ba latlhegetswe ke ditlhopho mo lefelong leo.
mt0: <pad> The ANC wants to run the Nquthu Municipality despite losing the election in the area.</s>

en: We are all quite aware that the IFP and the ANC are working well in the City of Johannesburg but here in KZN it’s a different story.
tsn: Rotlhe re itse gore sentle gore IFP le ANC ba dira sentle mo Toropong ya Johannesburg fela  mo KZN ke kgang e e farologaneng.
mt0: <pad> We all know that the IFP and ANC have done well in Johannesburg but in KZN it is a different story.</s>

en: Hence you see the agenda against all our municipalities in the province of KZN.
tsn: Ke ka foo o bonang lenaanetema le le kgatlhanong  le bommasepala ba rona botlhe mo porofenseng ya KZN.
mt0: <pad> That's why you see the threat against all our municipalities in KZN.</s>

en: We are quite very concerned with the behaviour of COGTA and MEC for COGTA who actually is allowing the narrow agenda of ANC councillors in Nquthu to be guiding the activities of COGTA, it’s quite very unfortunate.
tsn: Re tshwenyegile thata ka maitshwaro a COGTA le Mokhuduthamaga wa COGTA  yo a letlelelang lenaanetema la bakhansela ba ANC  mo Nquthu go kaela ditiro tsa COGTA, se se swabisa thata.
mt0: <pad> We are very worried about the behavior of COGTA and its Executive Committee that allowed the ANC councillors in Nquthu to direct the activities of COGTA, which is very disgraceful.</s>

en: The IFP is also unhappy with the ANC after it named one of its regional structures in the far north of the province after its late freedom fighter, Nobleman Mzala Nxumalo.
tsn: IFP e swabisitse gape ke ANC morago ga go neela leina la nngwe ya ditheo tsa kgaolo mo porofenseng go ya kwa bokone, leina la molwela kgololesego, moswi Nobleman Mzala Nxumalo.
mt0: <pad> The IFP was again disillusioned by the ANC after giving the name of one of the regional institutions in the north of the province, the name of a freedom fighter, the late Nobleman Mzala Nxumalo.</s>

en: It also says the move would regress reconciliatory talks between the two parties spearheaded by leaders of both parties at the national level.
tsn: E rile, kgato e, e tlaa busetsa kwa morago dipuisano tsa itshwarelano magareng ga makoko a mabedi a a neng a bolotswa ke baeteledipele ba makoko a ka bobedi kwa maemong a bosetšhaba.
mt0: <pad> He said, the move would bring back the peace talks between the two sides that were initiated by both national leaders of the two sides at the international level.</s>

en: Deputy President David Mabuza has assured military veterans that government does not have hard cash to give to military veterans but has money to take care of their social and health needs.
tsn: Motlatsamoporesitente David Mabuza o netefaditse bagaka ba sesole gore puso ga e na madi  mo seatleng go neela bagaka ba Sesole fela puso e na le madi a go tlhokomela ditlhokego  tsa bona tsa loago le ditlhokego tsa boitekanelo.
mt0: <pad> The deputy president David Mabuza has told the veterans of the armed forces that the government does not have money to provide them with a pension but it has money to meet their social and medical needs.</s>

en: He says the problem was with the Department of Defence and Military Veterans which lacked direction to attend to their plight.
tsn: A re bothata bo ne bo na le Lefapha la Tshireletso le Bagaka ba Sesole, ka go tlhoka tsamaiso ya go tshwaragana le mathata a bona.
mt0: <pad> He said the problem was with the Department of Defence and the Military Personnel, because there was no system to deal with their problems.</s>

en: Addressing a group of military veterans, Mabuza says things will start to work out properly because a director-general of the department has been appointed.
tsn: Fa a ne a ema setlhopha sa bagaka ba sesole ka lefoko, Mabuza o rile dilo di tlaa simolola go tsamaya sentle ka gonne go tlhophilwe Mokaedi-Kakaretso wa Lefapha.
mt0: <pad> When addressing the military officers' conference, Mabuza said things will start to get better because the Director General of the Department has been appointed.</s>

en: We proceed with Provincial interactions with Military Veterans.
tsn: Re sa ntse re tswelela ka dipuisano tsa porofense le bagaka ba Sesole.
mt0: <pad> We are still in talks with the state and the military commanders.</s>

en: Today we are in Limpopo at the Polokwane Rugby Stadium and warmly welcomed by Premier Stanley Mathabatha.
tsn: Gompieno re mo Limpopo kwa lebaleng la Rakabi la Polokwane mme re amogetswe ka diatla tse di bothito ke Tonakgolo, Stanley Mathabatha.
mt0: <pad> Today we are in Limpopo at the Polokwane rugby ground and were warmly welcomed by the Prime Minister, Stanley Mathabatha.</s>

en: He also urged military veterans to form one group instead of fighting one another.
tsn: O kopile bagaka ba masole go ipopa ba nne ngatana e le nngwe go na le gore ba lwe ka bo bona.
mt0: <pad> He urged the soldiers to unite as one body instead of fighting each other.</s>

en: We are still going to fix the Department of Military Veterans.
tsn: Re sa ntse re tlile go baakanya Lefapha la Bagaka ba Sesole.
mt0: <pad> We are still going to be rebuilding the Department of Defense.</s>

en: I can tell you that the Director-General [Irene Mpolweni] in the department has been appointed.
tsn: Nka go bolelela gore Mokaedi-Kakaretso [Irene Mpolweni] mo Lefapheng le o setse a tlhophilwe.
mt0: <pad> I can tell you that the Deputy Director [Irene Mpolweni] for this department has been selected.</s>

en: She is going to start to work on the 7th of June.
tsn: O tlile go simolola tiro ka di 7 tsa Seetebosigo.
mt0: <pad> He will start work on September 7th.</s>

en: So things will start to converge.
tsn: Jaanong dilo di tlaa simolola go tshwaragana.
mt0: <pad> Now things will start to get entangled.</s>

en: Secondly, the Presidency has requested the offices of the Premiers to collaborate in this work, says Mabuza.
tsn: Sa bobedi, Moporesidente o kopile Dikantoro tsa Botonakgolo go dirisana mmogo mo tirong eno, go bua Mabuza.
mt0: <pad> Second, the President asked the Offices of the Prime Minister to work together on this task, Mabuza said.</s>

en: Deputy President speak to the media about the discussion held with the military veterans.
tsn: Motlatsa Poresidente o bua le bobegakgang ka ga puisano e e neng e tshwerwe le bagaka ba sesole.
mt0: <pad> The Deputy President spoke to the press after a meeting with senior military officials.</s>

en: Deputy President David Mabuza has urged military veterans across the political divide, to organise themselves in one group for government to adequately support them.
tsn: Motlatsa Moporesitente David Mabuza o rotloeditse bagaka ba Sesole go ralala karoganyo ya sepolotiki, go ipopa go nna ngatana le nngwe gore puso e kgone go ba neela  tshegetso e e lekaneng.
mt0: <pad> The Deputy President David Mabuza urged the soldiers to cross-party politics, unite as one force to give the government enough support.</s>

en: Military veterans often complain that they are not getting housing, health services and other things from government equally.
tsn: Go le gantsi, Bagaka ba Sesole ba ngongorega ka gore ga ba na matlo, ditirelo tsa boitekanelo le dilo tse dingwe go tswa kwa pusong.
mt0: <pad> often, soldiers complain about not having housing, health care and other government services.</s>

en: In the video below the SABC speaks to a member of the then Venda Defence Force:
tsn: Mo kgatisong e e fa tlase, SABC e bua le leloko la maloba la Venda Defence Force:
mt0: <pad> In the following report, SABC speaks with a former member of the Venda Defence Force.</s>

en: Addressing a group of military veterans in Limpopo from the old South African Defence Force (SADF), Venda Defence Force (VDF).
tsn: Puo le setlhopha sa badiredi ba sesole kwa Limpopo go tswa kwa South African Defence Force (SADF) ya kgale, Venda Defence Force (VDF).
mt0: <pad> The language and military service in Limpopo are from the former South African Defence Force (SADF), Venda Defence Force (VDF).</s>

en: Mabuza says the government is worried that military veterans fight amongst themselves.
tsn: Mabuza a re puso e tshwentswe ke gore badiredi ba sesole ba lwana ka bobona.
mt0: <pad> The government is concerned that soldiers are fighting among themselves.</s>

en: He says military veterans from former liberations parties are still battling with verifications to check who was in the trenches whereas the situation of others from the SADF and VDF is better.
tsn: A re badiredi ba sesole go tswa go makoko a maloba ba santse ba sokololwa ka netefatso go lebelela gore ke bomang ba ba neng ba le mo ditsamaisong fa maemo a ba bangwe mo SADF le VDF a le botoka.
mt0: <pad> A re-examination of former soldiers from the previous generations is still underway to see who was in the process while others in the SADF and VDF had better positions.</s>

en: You are a community that is getting smaller and smaller.
tsn: Lo setšhaba se se ntseng se tswelela se nna sennye.
mt0: <pad> The population is growing faster and faster.</s>

en: You are a community that is ageing.
tsn: Lo setšhaba se se tsofalang.
mt0: <pad> The elderly people of the country</s>

en: So why would old people fight among themselves?
tsn: Ka jalo ke goreng batho ba bagolo ba ka lwa ka bo bona?
mt0: <pad> So why can't adults fight themselves?</s>

en: MKVA and military council you must go and solve your issues with immediate effect.
tsn: MKVA le khansele ya  sesole, lo tshwanetse go tsamaya lo ye go rarabolola mathata a lona ka bonako.
mt0: <pad> If you don't know MKVA and the military commission, you should go to solve your problems quickly.</s>

en: It is not good for this community, adds Mabuza.
tsn: Se ga se a tshwanela setšhaba se, ga tlaleletsa Mabuza.
mt0: <pad> That doesn't belong to this country, added Mabuza.</s>

en: The SABC speaks to the MKVA’s Limpopo Secretary Lulamile Jack.
tsn: SABC e bua le Mokwaledi wa MKVA wa Limpopo Lulamile Jack.
mt0: <pad> SABC speaks with the chief of MKVA in Limpopo Lulamile Jack.</s>

en: The KwaZulu-Natal Department of Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs (COGTA) has directed the Speaker of the Inkosi Langalibalele Local Municipality to investigate allegations of assault that have been levelled against a councillor.
tsn: Lefapha la Pusotshwaraganelo le Merero ya Setso (COGTA) kwa KwaZulu-Natal le laetse sebui sa Mmasepala wa selegae wa Inkosi Langalibalele go batlisisa ditatofatso tsa tlhaselo kgatlhanong le mokhanselara.
mt0: <pad> The Department of Conservation and Culture (COGTA) in KwaZulu-Natal has ordered the Inkosi Langalibalele Municipality to investigate allegations of attack against the mayor.</s>

en: It’s alleged that an IFP councillor assaulted two women ANC councillors.
tsn: Go umakiwa fa mokhanselara wa IFP a iteile basadi ba babedi ba makhaselara ba ANC.
mt0: <pad> It is alleged that the chairman of the IFP has married two women ANC congresswomen.</s>

en: KZN COGTA spokesperson Senzo Mzila says, The KwaZulu-Natal Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs MEC Sipho Hlomuka has expressed his concern at the allegation that have risen in the Inkosi Langalibalele Local Municipality.
tsn: Mmueledi wa KZN wa COGTA, Senzo Mzila a re, MEC ya Pusotshwaraganelo le Merero ya Setso ya KwaZulu-Natal, Sipho Hlomuka o bontshitse tlhobaelo ka ditatofatso tse di tlhalositsweng kwa mmasepala wa selegae Inkosi Langalibalele
mt0: <pad> The spokesman for KZN of COGTA, Senzo Mzila said, the MEC for Conservation and Culture in KwaZulu-Natal, Sipho Hlomuka has expressed concern over allegations made to the local mayor Inkosi Langalibalele.</s>

en: The allegations are that one of the councillors was assaulted by another councillor.
tsn: Ditatofatso tse di reng mongwe wa bakhanselara o iteile Mokhanselara yo mongwe.
mt0: <pad> Reports that one of the councillors has threatened another councillor.</s>

en: MEC Hlomuka has called upon the Speaker of the municipality to investigate the circumstances surrounding this incident and to provide him with a comprehensive report on this matter, adds Mzila.
tsn: MEC, Hlomuka o kopile Sebui sa Mmasepala go batlisisa mabaka a a bakileng tiragalo e le go mo neela pegelo e e tletseng ka ga ntlha e, go tlaleletsa Mzila.
mt0: <pad> The MEC, Hlomuka, urged the Speaker of the Municipality to investigate the incident and provide him with a full report on the matter, added Mzila.</s>

en: Deputy President David Mabuza in his capacity as the chairperson of the Presidential Task Team on Military Veterans is expected to interact with military veterans at Polokwane in Limpopo.
tsn: Motlatsamoporesitente David Mabuza ka maemo a gagwe jaaka  Modulasetulo wa Setlhopha sa  Tirelo ya Poresitente mo badireding ba Sesole o solofelwa go dirisana le badiredi ba sesole kwa Polokwane, Limpopo.
mt0: <pad> The Deputy President David Mabuza in his role as Chair of the Presidential Service Committee for the Armed Forces is expected to work with soldiers in Polokwane, Limpopo and Eastern Cape.</s>

en: He is to assess progress achieved by the provincial government in addressing challenges faced by military veterans.
tsn: O tlaa sekaseka tswelelopele e e bonweng ke puso ya porofense ka go samagana le dikgwetlho tse di lebaganeng le badiredi ba sesole.
mt0: <pad> He will assess the progress made by the state government in addressing the issues related to military personnel.</s>

en: For years, military veterans from both former liberation political parties and the then Transkei, Bophuthatswana, Venda and Ciskei (TBVC states), have been complaining that government is not doing enough to take care of their livelihood.
tsn: Mo dingwageng tse di fetileng, Bagaka ba Sesole go tswa kwa makokong a sepolotiki le a Transkei, Bophuthatswana, Venda le Ciskei (dinaga tsa TBVC), ba ntse ba ngongorega gore puso ga e dire ka mo go lekaneng go tlhokomela matshelo a bona.
mt0: <pad> For years, former soldiers from the Transkei, Bophuthatswana, Venda and Ciskei (TBVC) regions have been complaining that the government has not done enough to take care of their lives.</s>

en: Amongst other things the task team led by Deputy President Mabuza identified, is the need for social distress relief, providing educational assistance, decent housing and land for military veterans.
tsn: Gareng ga tse dingwe tse di lemogilweng ke setlhopha sa tirelo se se eteletsweng pele ke Motlatsamoporesitente Mabuza, ke tlhokego ya namolo ya tlalelo ya loago, go neela thuso ya thuto, kago ya matlo a a nang le seriti le lefatshe go Bagaka ba Sesole.
mt0: <pad> Other areas identified by the service group led by Vice President Mabuza include: social welfare, education, building of decent homes and land for the former soldiers.</s>

en: In a statement from the Presidency, the Task Team continues to receive reports on progress achieved by different departments, to come up with a legislative framework to help military veterans.
tsn: Mo setatamenteng se se tswang kwa kantorong ya Moporesidente, Setlhopha sa Tirelo se tswelela go amogela dipegelo tsa tswelelopele e e fitlheletsweng ke mafapha a a farologaneng, go tla ka letlhomeso la peomolao go thusa badiredi ba sesole.
mt0: <pad> In a report from the President's Office, the Service Committee continues to receive reports of progress made by different ministries, including the call for a bill to help military personnel.</s>

en: Speculation is mounting that President Cyril Ramaphosa is looking for a new Health Minister amid reports that Zweli Mkhize may be preparing to resign.
tsn: Go diphopholetso tse di oketsegang tsa gore Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa o batlana le Tona ya Boitekanelo e ntšhwa, fa go na le dipego tsa gore Zweli Mkhize a ka tswa a ipaakanyetsa go rola tiro.
mt0: <pad> There are growing rumors that President Cyril Ramaphosa is in search of a new Health Minister, with reports that Zweli Mkhize may be preparing to step down.</s>

en: Mkhize has been accused of conflict of interest regarding a R150 million tender that his department awarded to communications company Digital Vibes.
tsn: Mkhize o latofaditswe ka kgotlhang ya kgatlhego e e mabapi le thendara ya dimilione di ka nna R150 e lefapha la gagwe le e neetseng setlamo sa Digital Vibes.
mt0: <pad> Mkhize is accused of a conflict of interest over a R150 million contract his department awarded to the digital music company Digital Vibes.</s>

en: The Special Investigating Unit (SIU) is probing the irregular tender that was for work related to the National Health Insurance (NHI) scheme and governments response to the coronavirus pandemic.
tsn: Yuniti ya Dipatlisiso tse di Kgethegileng (SIU) e tlhatlhobana le thendara e e sa tlhomamang e e neng e amana le inšorense ya boitekanelo ba bosetšhaba (NHI) le mebuso ya go tsibogela leroborobo la khorona.
mt0: <pad> The Special Investigations Unit (SIU) is investigating the unstable budget that was linked to national health insurance (NHI) and governments to respond to the coronavirus outbreak.</s>

en: Mkhize failed to appear before Parliaments Portfolio Committee on Health on Friday following legal advice.
tsn: Mkhize o reteletswe ke go tlhagelela fa pele ga Komiti ya Photefolio ya Palamente ya Pholo ka Labotlhano go latela kgakololo ya semolao.
mt0: <pad> Mkhize was supposed to appear before the Parliamentary Portfolio Committee on Health on Thursday following legal advice.</s>

en: Chairperson of the Committee Dr Sibongiseni Dhlomo says, I had a telephonic discussion with Dr Mkhize last night (Thursday).
tsn: Modulasetulo wa Komiti Ngk. Sibongiseni Dhlomo a re, ke nnile le dipuisano tsa mo mogaleng le Ngk. Mkhize maabane bosigo (Labone).
mt0: <pad> The chair of the committee Dr Sibongiseni Dhlomo said, I had a phone conversation with Dr Mkhize yesterday night (Friday).</s>

en: I got to hear that he had been given a legal opinion.
tsn: Ke foo ke utlwileng teng gore o neetswe dikakanyo tsa semolao
mt0: <pad> I heard that he had been given legal advice.</s>

en: It is not advisable just for now for him to join the Portfolio Committee because of allegations that actually put his name into the picture.
tsn: Ga e se kakanyo e ntle ga jaana gore a ka nna leloko la Komiti ya Photefolio ka ntlha ya ditatofatso tse di bayang leina la gagwe mo setshwantshong.
mt0: <pad> It is not a good idea for him to be a member of the Portfolio Committee now that his name is associated with the photo.</s>

en: So, then it is fair legally for him not to come in to explain.
tsn: Ka jalo, go mo molaong gore a seke a tla go itlhalosa.
mt0: <pad> So, it is illegal for him to come and explain himself to you.</s>

en: Mkhize not appearing before Committee puts more clouds over his head
tsn: Go se tlhagelele ga ga Mkhize fa pele ga Komiti go dira gore a lebelelwe.
mt0: <pad> The absence of Mkhize before the Committee led to his investigation.</s>

en: Meanwhile, political analyst Dr Dale McKinley says Mkhize not appearing before the Health Portfolio Committee just puts more clouds over his head and that more people are going to ask questions around his involvement in the Digital Vibes tender.
tsn: Re sa le foo, mosekaseki wa tsa polotiki Ngk. Dale McKinley a re go se tlhagelele ga ga Mkhize fa pele ga Komiti ya Photefolio ya Pholo go mo thatafaletsa dilo mme batho ba le bantsi ba tlile go botsa dipotso mabapi le go nna le seabe mo thendareng ya Digital Vibes.
mt0: <pad> While there, political commentator Dr. Dale McKinley said Mkhize's absence from the Portfolio Committee of the House of Commons complicated things for him and many people came to ask questions about his involvement in the Digital Vibes tender.</s>

en: McKinley says the ANC must encourage Mkhize to resign as a matter of principle.
tsn: McKinely a re ANC e tshwanetse go rotloetsa Mkhize go rola tiro ka ntlha ya molao.
mt0: <pad> McKinely said the ANC should encourage Mkhize to resign legally.</s>

en: Dr Dale McKinely speaks on Mkhize not appearing before the Committee.
tsn: Ngk Dale McKinley o bua ka kgang ya go se tlhagelele ga ga Mkhize fa pele ga komiti.
mt0: <pad> Dr. Dale McKinley talks about Mkhize's absence from the panel.</s>

en: The Gauteng Health Department says the corruption allegations against Health Minister Dr Zweli Mkhize are a huge blow to the country’s fight against the coronavirus pandemic.
tsn: Lefapha la Boitekanelo la Gauteng la re ditatofatso tsa tlolomolao kgatlhanong le Tona ya Boitekanelo Ngk. Zweli Mkhize ke selo se segolo  mo nageng e e lwantshanang le  leroborobo la Corona.
mt0: <pad> The Gauteng Department of Health said the criminal charges against Health Minister Zweli Mkhize are a major blow to the country that is battling the coronavirus pandemic.</s>

en: The allegations related to his departments awarding of a R150-million contract to communications company Digital Vibes.
tsn: Ditatofatso tse di amanang le mafapha a gagwe a a amogetseng kontaraka ya dimilione di le 150 go setlamo sa ditlhaeletsano Digital Vibes.
mt0: <pad> The allegations relate to his agencies which received a 150 million dollar contract from the media company Digital Vibes.</s>

en: Mkhize’s former aides control the company which got the contract to do work related to the National Health Insurance scheme and governments response to the pandemic.
tsn: Bathusi ba maloba ba ga Mkhizes ba laola setlamo se se fitlhetseng konteraka ya go dira tiro e e amanang le sekema sa Inšorense ya Pholo ya Bosetšhaba le ditsiboso tsa mebuso ka ga Corona
mt0: <pad> The former Mkhizes aides control the company that won contracts to perform work related to the National Health Insurance Scheme and government warnings about the National Health Insurance System.</s>

en: The Special Investigative Unit is probing the matter.
tsn: Ditlhotlhomiso tse di Kgethegileng di batlisisa kgang e.
mt0: <pad> Special investigations are underway into the matter.</s>

en: Last month Mkhize admitted that the deal was irregular and said disciplinary action would be taken against those responsible.
tsn: Mo kgweding e e fetileng Mkhize o dumetse gore morero o ne o sa tlhomama mme a re dikgato tsa kgalemo di tla tsewa kgatlhanong le ba ba molato.
mt0: <pad> Last month Mkhize admitted that the purpose was not sustainable and said disciplinary action will be taken against the responsible.</s>

en: To have a Health Minister who is leading our pandemic response, somebody whose word is not believed, who cannot engage with the media, having to duck and dive accountability.
tsn: Go nna le Tona ya Boitekanelo e e  eteletseng pele tsibogo ya leroborobo la rona, motho yo mafoko a gagwe a sa tseweng tsia, yo a sa kgoneng go buisana le ba metswedi ya dikgang, yo o tlholang a tshabela maikarabelo.
mt0: <pad> To have a Health Minister whose words are not taken seriously, who can't communicate with the press, who is trying to avoid responsibility.</s>

en: We have a Health Minister that cant answer basic questions about whats happening in his department, says Chief Director at the Gauteng Health Department, Meisie Lerutle.
tsn: Re na le Tona ya Boitekanelo  e e sa kgoneng go araba dipotso tse di bonolo ka ditiragalo tse di diragalang mo lefapheng la gagwe, go bua  Mokaedimogolo wa Lefapheng la Boitekanelo la Gauteng, Meisie Lerutle.
mt0: <pad> We have a Health Minister who can't answer simple questions about the events in his department, said Gauteng Health Chief, Ms. Lerutle.</s>

en: Mkhize not appearing before Health Committee puts more clouds over his head:
tsn: Go se tlhagelelang ga ga Mkhize fa pele ga Komiti ya Boitekanelo go dira gore a lebelelwe.
mt0: <pad> The absence of Mkhize before the Health Committee led to his investigation.</s>

en: Meanwhile, political Analyst Dr Dale McKinley says Health Minister Dr Zweli Mkhize not appearing before the Health Portfolio Committee just puts more clouds over his head and more people are going to ask questions around his involvement in the Digital Vibes tender.
tsn: Re sa le foo, mosekaseki wa tsa polotiki Ngk Dale Mckinley a re go se tlhagelele ga Tona ya Boitekanelo Ngk Zweli Mkhize fa pele ga Komiti ya Photefolio ya Pholo go mo direla mathata a le mantsi mme batho ba le bantsi ba tlile go botsa dipotso  ka ga seabe ga gagwe mo thendareng ya Digital Vibes.
mt0: <pad> While we were there, political commentator Dr Dale Mckinley said the absence of Health Minister Zweli Mkhize before the Portfolio Committee of the House of Commons has caused him many problems and many people have come to ask questions about his role on Digital Vibes.</s>

en: The analyst says, Opposition parties are going to make hay of this and generally speaking he is going to come under more pressure.
tsn: Mosekaseki a re, Makoko a Kganetso a ya go dira furu ka ga se mme fa re bua fela, o ile go nna le kgatelelo e ntsi.
mt0: <pad> The Emergency Forces will make fun of it, but in general, he has been under great pressure.</s>

en: He should say look, there’s clearly something wrong here.
tsn: O tshwanetse go bona gore go sengwe se se phoso fano.
mt0: <pad> You must see something wrong here.</s>

en: I have a case to answer.
tsn: Ke na kgetse e ke tshwanetseng go e arabela.
mt0: <pad> I have a duty to answer.</s>

en: I’m going to step out of my role right now.
tsn: Ke tlile go tswa mo maemong a me jaanong.
mt0: <pad> I'm going to leave my position now.</s>

en: People would respect that and I think the ANC must allow that and encourage that to happen.
tsn: Batho ba tla tlotla seno mme ke akanya gore ANC e tshwanetse go letlelela seno mme e rotloetse seno go diragala.
mt0: <pad> People will respect this and I think the ANC should allow this and encourage it to happen.</s>

en: Not just with Mkhize, but with the whole range of their members who are dealing with serious allegations because the only way they are going to clean the name of the party and are going to regain the trust of the population, is if they are seen to act.
tsn: E seng fela ka Mkhize, le maloko otlhe a yona a a lebaganeng le ditatofatso tse di masisi gonne ke yona fela tsela eo e e tla dirang gore ba phepafatse leina la lekoko le go tsosolosa botshepegi jwa baagi, fa ba bonagala ba diragatsa molao ono.
mt0: <pad> Not only Mkhize, but all the members of the committee who are facing serious charges because it is the only way to cleanse the name of the committee and rebuild the trust of the people, if they are seen implementing this law.</s>

en: Not simply when and being charged formally, but when there is clear evidence that there’s been wrongdoing.
tsn: E seng fela fa a bonwa molato, le fa go na le bopaki jo bo bonagalang sentle gore go ne go na le diphoso.
mt0: <pad> He was not just convicted, even though there was clear evidence that there were mistakes.</s>

en: And I think that’s fundamentally important for the President to consider.
tsn: Mme ke akanya gore seo se botlhokwa mme moporesitente o tshwanetse go se tsaya tsie.
mt0: <pad> But I think that's important and the president should take it seriously.</s>

tsn: Mkhize o latofadiwa ka go nna le kgotlhang ya kgatlhego e a ungwileng go yona go tswa mo thendareng ya dimilione di ka nna R150 e lefapha la gagwe le e neetseng setlamo sa ditlhaeletsano.
mt0: <pad> Mkhize is accused of having an interest conflict from the R150 million tender that his department awarded to a media company.</s>

en: The Special Investigating Unit is probing the irregular tender that was for work related to the National Health Insurance scheme and governments response to the coronavirus pandemic.
tsn: Yuniti ya dipatlisiso e e Kgethegileng e tlhatlhobana le thendara e e sa tlhomamang e e neng e amana le sekema sa Inšhorense ya Boitekanelo jwa Bosetšhaba le mebuso ya go tsibogela leroborobo la Corona.
mt0: <pad> The Special Investigation Unit is investigating the uncertainty of the budget that was linked to the National Health Insurance and government programs to respond to the coronavirus outbreak.</s>

en: Mkhize failed to appear before Parliaments Portfolio Committee on Health, on advice by his lawyers.

en: Opposition parties in the Portfolio Committee on Health have expressed their discontent with Mkhize’s non-appearance.

en: They also disagreed with the ANC’s position that the matter is sub-judice after the DA opened a case at Cape Town Police Station against Mkhize and his Director General Sandile Buthelezi.
tsn: Ga ba dumalane le boemo jwa ANC jwa gore kgetse e se sekasekiwe phatlalatsa morago ga fa DA e butse kgetse kwa seteišheneng sa mapodisi kwa Toropong ya Kapa  e e kgatlhanong le Mkhize le Mokaedi Kakaretso, Sandile Buthelezi.
mt0: <pad> They did not agree with ANC's position that the case should not be publicly examined after DA filed a criminal case at Cape Town police station against Mkhize and the General Secretary, Sandile Buthelezi.</s>

en: EEF MPs, Dr Suzan Thembekwayo and Naledi Chirwa say the ANCs position on this matter is an indication that the committee will not be able to hold the minister to account.
tsn: Maloko a Palamente a EEF, Ngk Suzan Thembekwayo le Naledi Chirwa ba re boemo jwa ANC mo ntlheng e ke sesupo sa gore komiti e ka se kgone go bona tona molato.
mt0: <pad> The EEF MPs, Dr Suzan Thembekwayo and Naledi Chirwa, said the ANC's position on the matter is a sign that the committee will not be able to find them guilty.</s>

en: This was a clear indication that we as the committee cannot be able to speak in one voice to bring the national department and the minister to account, says Thembekwayo.
tsn: Se e ne e le sesupo se se bonagalang sentle gore jaaka re le komiti ga re kgone go bua ka lentswe le le lengwe go tlisa lefapha la bosetšhaba le tona go ikarabela, go bua Thembekwayo.
mt0: <pad> This was a clear sign that as a committee we couldn't speak with one voice to bring the national and prime minister to accountability, said Thembekwayo.</s>

en: So we cannot talk about this matter because a case has been opened against the minister, what happens when the NPA bring the matter to the court?
tsn: Ka jalo, re ka se kgone go bua ka kgang eno ka ntlha ya gore go butswe kgetse kgatlhanong le tona, go ya go diragala eng fa NPA e ka tlisa kgetse eno kwa kgotlatshekelong?
mt0: <pad> So, we can't talk about this issue because the case has been opened against him, what will happen if the NPA brings the case to court?</s>

en: Are we going to be held at ransom and wait until it is finished?
tsn: A re ya go tshwarwa matsogo go fitlhelela e fela?
mt0: <pad> We're going to be held hostage until we can do it?</s>

mt0: <pad> The funeral service was held at his home in the Feather Market neighborhood.</s>

en: The 84-year-old died on Thursday last week after a long illness.
tsn: Mosadimogolo yo wa dingwaga di le 84 o tlhokofetse mo beke e e fetileng ka Labone morago ga go lwala lobaka lo lo leele.
mt0: <pad> The 84-year-old grandmother died last Friday after a long illness.</s>

en: She was granted a category two special provincial official funeral by President Cyril Ramaphosa.
tsn: O ne a neetswe phitlho e e kgethegileng ya semmuso ke Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa
mt0: <pad> He was given a special state funeral by President Cyril Ramaphosa.</s>

en: The funeral service of ANC stalwart Mama Ivy Gcina is currently underway at Feather Market Centre in Gqeberha.
tsn: Tirelong phitlho ya moikanyi wa ANC Mme Ivy Gcina e tsweletse pele kwa Holong ya mmarakeng wa Feather mo Gqeberha.
mt0: <pad> The funeral of ANC member Mme Ivy Gcina has continued at the Feather Market Hall in Gaborone.</s>

en: The 84 year old Gcina died on Thursday last week after a long illness.

mt0: <pad> The 84-year-old, who died last Friday after a long illness, died on Monday.</s>

en: She was an ANC MP from 1994 until 2004.
tsn: E ne e le Leloko la Palamente la ANC go tloga ka 1994 go fitlha ka 2004.
mt0: <pad> He was a Member of the ANC Parliament from 1994 to 2004.</s>

en: Gcina served as an ANC MP in Parliament from 1994 until her retirement in 2004.
tsn: Gcina o dirile jaaka Leloko la Palamente la ANC mo Palamenteng go tloga ka 1994 go fitlhelela a rola tiro ka 2004.
mt0: <pad> Gcina served as an ANC MP in the National Assembly from 1994 to 2004 before retiring.</s>

en: She also served on various structures of different women’s organisations during the apartheid era.
tsn: Gape o ne a dira mo dithulaganyong tse di farologaneng tsa mekgatlho ya basadi ka nako ya tlhaolele.
mt0: <pad> She also worked in various women's groups during the apartheid.</s>

en: She served in the Women’s Committee of the Port Elizabeth Black Civic Organisation and was also the first chairperson of the Port Elizabeth Womens Organisation.
tsn: O dirile mo Komiting ya Basadi ya Port Elizabeth Black Civic Organisation mme e ne e le modulasetulo wa ntlha wa mokgatlho wa basadi wa kwa Port Elizabeth.
mt0: <pad> She worked on the Women's Committee of the Port Elizabeth Black Civic Organisation and was the first president of the Port Elizabeth Women's Association.</s>

en: She was also the leader of the United Democratic Front in the region.
tsn: E ne gape e le moeteledipele wa United Democratic Front mo kgaolong.
mt0: <pad> He was also the leader of the United Democratic Front in the region.</s>

en: During her time of resistance, she was detained and tortured on numerous occasions.
tsn: Ka nako ya gagwe, o ne a tshwarwa mme a bogisiwa makgetlo a le mantsi.
mt0: <pad> During his time, he was arrested and tortured many times.</s>

en: Her family remembered her as a wise and courageous woman.
tsn: Balelapa la gagwe ba mo gopola  e le mosadi yo o botlhale e bile a le sebete.
mt0: <pad> Her family remembers her as a wise and brave woman.</s>

en: Her grandchild, Lerato Gcina, says they have learned so much from her.
tsn: Setlogolo sa gagwe, Lerato Gcina, a re ba ithutile  go le gontsi mo go ene.
mt0: <pad> His grandmother, Love Gcina, said they learned a lot from him.</s>

en: It actually hurts our feelings that we couldn’t spend more time with you during your weakest moments.
tsn: Go re utlwisa botlhoko gore re be re sa kgona go nna le wena ka nako ya gago ya bokoa.
mt0: <pad> We are sorry that we weren't able to be with you during your difficult time.</s>

en: We will miss you makhulu, your spirit and your strength live on in each of us and in the lives that you touched with your love, wisdom, strength and the beauty of your soul.
tsn: Re tla go tlhoafalela nkoko, mowa le maatla a gago di  tshela mo go mongwe le mongwe wa rona, le mo matshelong a o a amileng ka lorato, botlhale, bokgoni le bontle jwa mowa wa gago.
mt0: <pad> We will miss you, Daddy, your spirit and power live in each of us, and in the hearts you touched with love, wisdom, skill and the beauty of your soul.</s>

en: Siyauthanda makhulu, you truly were a special woman.
tsn: Re a go rata nkoko, o ne o le mosadi yo o kgethegileng.
mt0: <pad> We loved you, Mom. She was a special woman.</s>

en: We thank you for your sacrifices and everything you have done for us.
tsn: Re go lebogela go intsha setlhabelo ga gago le sengwe le sengwe se o re diretseng sona.
mt0: <pad> We thank you for your sacrifice and everything you have done for us.</s>

en: Mama Gcina lost her three sons in the struggle while they were serving as soldiers of uMkhonto weSizwe while her daughter died of natural causes.
tsn: Mama Gcina o latlhegetswe ke barwa ba gagwe ba le bararo mo ntweng fa ba ne ba dira jaaka masole a uMkhonto weSizwe fa morwadie a tlhokafetse ka loso la tlhago.
mt0: <pad> Mama Gcina lost her three sons in the war while they were serving as Mkhonto weSizwe soldiers and her daughter died of natural causes.</s>

en: ANC Stalwart an icon Ivy Gcina who fought against the apartheid system a leader of PEWO, she stood for our people whilst she was tortured, beaten, suffocated, detained by the Security Branch.
tsn: Moikanyegi wa ANC Ivy Gcina  yo o lweleng kgatlhanong le tsamaiso ya tlhaolele, moeteledipele wa PEWO, o emetse batho ba rona le fa a ne a bogiswa, a itewa, ,a hupetswa, a tswaletswe ke Lefapha la Tshireletso.
mt0: <pad> The ANC's loyalist Ivy Gcina, who fought against the system of apartheid, leader of PEWO, represented our people despite being harassed, beaten, abused, and imprisoned by the Security Department.</s>

en: She lost her own children in front line of our liberation struggle.
tsn: O latlhegetswe ke bana ba gagwe a ntse a kgaratlhela tokologo.
mt0: <pad> She lost her children while she fought for freedom.</s>

en: It is so sad.
tsn: Go tlhomola pelo.
mt0: <pad> To make it easier to understand, just say you don't know.</s>

tsn: Pego ka Andile Lungisa (@mrlungisa), 20 Motsheganong 2021.
mt0: <pad> The post by Andile Lungisa (@mrlungisa), 20 March 2021.</s>

en: He called the current ANC members to emulate these values.
tsn: O rotloeditse maloko a ANC a ga jaana go latela  ditumelo tseno.
mt0: <pad> He urged the current ANC members to follow these beliefs.</s>

en: We are looking at someone who actually is a special kind, is a member that we want to see in the African National Congress.
tsn: Re lebile mongwe yo o tota a kgethegile, ke sekao sa motho se re batlang go se bona mo African National Congress.
mt0: <pad> We've found someone who is truly special, he is the kind of person we want to see in the African National Congress.</s>

en: A person of integrity, a person of discipline, a very dedicated member, a very committed member of the African National Congress.
tsn: Motho wa seriti, motho wa boitiso,motho wa maikarabelo, leloko le le  ineetseng mo African National Congress..
mt0: <pad> Respected, respectable, responsible, member of the African National Congress.</s>

en: We should all emulate this generation, it’s a generation that knew very well that it’s not about them, but its about the future of this country.
tsn: Rotlhe re tshwanetse go latela batho ba, ke batho ba ba neng ba itse sentle gore ga se ka ga bona, mme ke ka ga isago ya naga eno.
mt0: <pad> We all have to follow those people, people who knew well that it was not about them, but about the future of this country.</s>

en: Minister of Defence and Military Veterans Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula praised Mama Gcina as an unsung heroine and stalwart of the freedom struggle.
tsn: Tona ya Tshireletso le Mogaka wa Sesole Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula o akgotse Mme Gcina jaaka moikanyegi, mogaka wa kgaratlho ya kgololesego.
mt0: <pad> The Defense Minister and Chief of the Army Nosivile Mapisa-Nqakula praised Mme Gcina as a loyalist, a leader of the freedom struggle.</s>

en: She says there are many heavy hearts bidding farewell to somebody who sacrificed her whole life to the struggle.
tsn: A re batho ba le bantsi ba utlwisitswe botlhoko ke go laela  motho yo o neetseng ka  botshelo jwa gagwe jotlhe go lwela tokologo.
mt0: <pad> Do you think many people were upset at the sentence of a man who spent his whole life fighting for freedom?</s>

en: She was forever at the forefront as she fought against the heinous apartheid policy of the national party.
tsn: O ne a tlhola a le kwa pele fa a lwa le bagaka ba bangwe mo pholising ya National Party.
mt0: <pad> He was always ahead of others in his fight against the National Party's policy.</s>

en: She was never deterred by the brutality of the security forces of the racist regime.
tsn: O ne a sa kgorelediwe ke bosetlhogo jwa tshireletso ya bosemorafe ya puso ya mmala.
mt0: <pad> He was not hindered by the inhumane racism protection of the white government.</s>

en: She never wilted, even when more stringent security regulations were enacted by the regime in the dark days of apartheid.
tsn: O ne a sa tshoge, le fa go gagamatswa melao e e dirilweng ke puso ka nako ya tlhaolele.
mt0: <pad> He was not afraid, despite the laws made by the government during the Apartheid period.</s>

en: Mama Gcina leaves behind her two siblings and her six grandchildren.
tsn: Mama Gcina o tlogela bo monnaawe ba le babedi le ditlogolo di le thataro.
mt0: <pad> Mama Gcina left two husbands and eight grandchildren.</s>

en: The Democratic Alliance (DA) has accused both Health Minister Zweli Mkhize and the department’s Director-General (DG) Sandile Buthelezi of undermining the role of parliament.
tsn: Democratic Alliance (DA) e latofatsa Tona ya Boitekanelo Zweli Mkhize ga mmogo le Mokaedikakaretso wa lefapha (DG) Sandile Buthelezi ka go nyatsa karolo ya palamente.
mt0: <pad> The Democratic Alliance (DA) has accused the Health Minister Zweli Mkhize and the Director General (DG) Sandile Buthelezi of insulting the legislative branch.</s>

en: The Minister was expected to appear before the Portfolio Committee on Health on Friday.
tsn: Tona o ne a solofetswe go tlhagelela fa pele ga Komiti ya Photefolio ya Pholo ka Labotlhano.
mt0: <pad> The minister was due to appear before the Justice Portfolio Committee on Thursday.</s>

en: The Minister told the Portfolio Committee on Health that hes been legally advised not to appear before the Committee to discuss the awarding of the R150 million Digital Vibes contract, while his DG said he’s been advised to refrain from commenting on the contract.
tsn: Tona o boleletse Komiti ya Photefolio ya Pholo gore o  gakolotswe ke bamolao go se tlhagelele fa pele ga komiti go buisana ka ga kabelo ya Kontaraka ya  dimilione tsa diranta di le R150 go Digital Vibes, fa Mokaedi Kakaretso wa gagwe a rile o gakolotswe gore a seke a tshwaela mo kabelong ya konterakeng.
mt0: <pad> The Minister told the Portfolio Committee of the House of Commons that he was advised by lawmakers not to appear before the panel to discuss the R150 million contract award to Digital Vibes, while his General Manager said he was advised not to interfere with the award of the contract.</s>

en: This is after DA Member of Parliament, Siviwe Gwarube, opened a case against the two at the Cape Town Police Station.
tsn: Se ke morago ga gore leloko la Palamente la  DA,Siviwe Gwarube, a bule kgetse kgatlhanong le bobedi jo kwa Kapa kwa seteišheneng sa mapodisi.
mt0: <pad> This comes after a DA MP, Saviwe Gwarube, opened a case against the two men at the police station in Kapa.</s>

en: Gwarube’s colleague, Evelyn Wilson, rejected the African National Congress (ANC) position that the matter is subjudice, demanding answers.
tsn: Modira-mmogo le Gwarube, Evelyn Wilson, o ganne boemo jwa African National Congress (ANC) gore kgetse e nne bofitlha, go batlwa dikarabo.
mt0: <pad> The Deputy Minister of the Interior, Evelyn Wilson, refused the ANC's demand that the assembly be open to questions.</s>

en: It is not subject to subjudice, it is not before the court.
tsn: Ga e a tlisiwa fa pele ga kgotlhatshekelo.
mt0: <pad> He was not brought before the court.</s>

en: The matter is not being heard in court and the DG agreed to come to this meeting.
tsn: Ntlha e ga ise e reediwa kwa kgotlatshekelo mme DG o dumetse go tla mo kopanong e.
mt0: <pad> The case has not yet been heard in court and DG agreed to attend the meeting.</s>

en: We must remember one thing here, we are not accountable to the Minister or his DG, they are accountable to us, says Wilson.
tsn: Re tshwanetse go gakologelwa selo se le sengwe fa, ga re ikarabele go Tona kgotsa DG, bona ba na le maikarabelo mo go rona, go bua Wilson.
mt0: <pad> We have to remember one thing, we are not accountable to the Minister or DG, they are accountable to us," Wilson said.</s>

en: Digital Vibes contract: DA lays criminal charge against Dr Zweli Mkhize.
tsn: Konteraka ya Digital Vibes: DA e bula molato wa bosenyi kgatlhanong le Ngaka Zweli Mkhize
mt0: <pad> Digital Vibes contract: DA launches criminal charges against Dr Zweli Mkhize</s>

en: Siviwe Gwarube says ANC defends Mkhize.
tsn: Siviwe Gwarube a re ANC e sireletsa Mkhize
mt0: <pad> Siviwe Gwarube said the ANC is protecting Mkhize.</s>

en: The ANC has accused the DA of jumping the gun by opening a case against Mkhize and Buthelezi regarding the awarding of Digital Vibes tender.
tsn: ANC e latofatsa DA ka go itlhaganelela go bula kgetse kgatlhanong le Mkhize le Buthelezi malebana le kabelo ya thendara ya Digital Vibes.
mt0: <pad> ANC accuses DA of rushing to open a criminal case against Mkhize and Buthelezi over the distribution of the Digital Vibes contract.</s>

en: ANC MP Kenneth Jacobs puts the blame on Gwarube that the committee was unable to deliberate on the matter.
tsn: Leloko la Palamente la ANC, Kenneth Jacobs o tshwaya Gwarube phoso mo ntlheng ya gore komiti e be e sa kgona go akantshana ka ga kgang e.
mt0: <pad> ANC MP Kenneth Jacobs blamed Mbeki for the failure of the committee to discuss the matter.</s>

en: I want to reiterate that the member had jumped the gun to go and lay criminal charges, therefore, the DG and the Minister have the right to do what they are doing to make certain that they don’t infringe their rights according to the Constitution, says Jacobs.
tsn: Ke batla go gatelela gore maloko a ile a itlhaganenela go bula kgetse ya tshenyo, ka jalo, Mokaedi Kakaretso le Tona ba na le tshwanelo ya go dira se ba se dirang go netefatsa gore ga ba kgoreletse ditshwanelo tsa bona go ya ka Molaotheo, go bua Jacobs.
mt0: <pad> I want to stress that members rushed to open the damages inquiry, so the General Manager and the Minister have the duty to do what they are doing to ensure that they do not interfere with their constitutional rights, said Jacobs.</s>

en: Corruption allegations: Alleged irregular contract between the health department & Digital Vibes

en: The late Ivy Gcina has been praised as an unsung heroine and stalwart of the freedom struggle.
tsn: Moswi Ivy Gcina o ne a tlotlomatswa jaaka mogaka wa kgaratlho ya kgololesego.
mt0: <pad> Dr Ivy Gcina was honoured as a hero of the struggle for freedom.</s>

en: The Minister of Defence and Military Veterans, Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula, was speaking at the fun funeral of the liberation struggle stalwart, Ivy Cikizwa Gcina, in her hometown of Gqeberha, in the Eastern Cape, on Friday.
tsn: Tona ya Tshireletso le Bagaka ba Sesole, Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula, o ne a bua kwa phitlhong ya ga mokgaratlhela tokologo moikanyi, Ivy Cikizwa Gcina, mo lefelong la bodulo la gagwe kwa Gqeberha, kwa Kapa Botlhaba, ka Labotlhano.
mt0: <pad> The Ministry of Defence and Military Affairs, Nosikiwe Mapisa-Nqakula, spoke at the funeral of Ivy Cikizwa Gcina, a female freedom fighter, at her home in Gqeberha, South Africa, on Thursday.</s>

en: Gcina was granted a Special Official Provincial Funeral Category 2 by President Cyril Ramaphosa.
tsn: Gcina o neetswe phitlho ya semmuso ya Setlhopha sa 2 e e kgethegileng ke Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa.
mt0: <pad> Gcina was given a special state burial by President Cyril Ramaphosa.</s>

en: Video: Funeral service for ANC struggle stalwart Ivy Cikizwa Gcina
tsn: Kgatiso: Tirelo phitlho ya mokgaratlhi wa ANC Ivy Cikizwa Gcina.
mt0: <pad> Announcement: The funeral service of ANC activist Ivy Ngwenyama has been cancelled.</s>

en: Mapisa-Nqakula says there are many heavy hearts bidding farewell to somebody who sacrificed her whole life to the struggle.
tsn: Mapisa-Nqakula a re ke ba le bantsi ba ba utlwileng botlhoko ba ba tlileng go laela motho yo o neetseng ka botshelo jwa gagwe jotlhe go kgaratlho.
mt0: <pad> Mapisa-Nqakula said there were many people who felt sad that a man who had been fighting all his life was forced to surrender.</s>

en: She was forever at the forefront as she fought against the hideous apartheid policy of the national party.
tsn: O ne a tlhola a le kwa pele a lwa kgatlhanong le pholisi ya bofitlha ya National Party.
mt0: <pad> He was always a front-runner in the fight against the National Party's imperialist policy.</s>

en: Gcina, 84, served on many structures during her time fighting the apartheid regime including the Port Elizabeth Black Civic Organisation (PEBCO).
tsn: Gcina, yo o dingwaga di le 84, o dirile mo ditheong tse dintsi  ka nako ya ntwa ya ditheo tsa puso ya kgethololo  go akaretsa Port Elizabeth Black Civic Organisation (PEBCO).
mt0: <pad> Gcina, 84, has worked in many organizations during the struggle of black civil rights organizations including the Port Elizabeth Black Civic Organisation (PEBCO).</s>

en: She was also the first Chairperson of the Port Elizabeth Women’s Organisation (PEWO).
tsn: E ne e le Modulasetulo wa ntlha wa mokgatlho wa basadi wa kwa Port Elizabeth (PEWO).
mt0: <pad> She was the first President of the Port Elizabeth Women's Organization (PEWO).</s>

en: She joined the African National Congress Youth League (ANCYL) in the 1950s and served in parliament as an African National Congress Member of Parliament from 1994 until 2004 when she retired.
tsn: O ne a tsenetse mokgatlho wa bašwa  wa African National Congress (ANCYL) ka dingwaga tsa bo1950 mme o dirile mo Palamenteng jaaka Leloko la Palamente la African National Congress go tloga ka 1994 go ya go fitlha ka 2004 fa a rola tiro.
mt0: <pad> He joined the youth of the African National Congress (ANCYL) in the 1950s and worked in the Parliament as a Member of the African National Congress from 1994 to 2004 when he retired.</s>

en: The funeral of the liberation struggle stalwart, Ivy Cikizwa Gcina, is set to take place in her hometown of Gqeberha, in the Eastern Cape, on Friday morning.
tsn: Phitlho ya mokgaratlhela tokologo , Ivy Cikizwa Gcina, e ya go tshwarelwa kwa motsetoropo wa gaabo kwa Gqeberha, kwa Kapa Botlhaba, mo mosong wa Labotlhano.
mt0: <pad> The funeral of the freedom fighter Ivy Mabusela Gcina will be held in her hometown of Gqeberha, in South Africa, on Thursday morning.</s>

en: Gcina has been granted a Special Official Provincial Funeral Category 2 by President Cyril Ramaphosa.
tsn: Gcina o neetswe phitlho ya semmuso e e kgethegileng ya setlhopha  sa 2 ke Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa.
mt0: <pad> Gcina was awarded a special state burial by President Cyril Ramaphosa.</s>

en: Political analyst Ivor Sarakinsky says President Cyril Ramaphosa should have taken a decisive decision against Health Minister Dr Zweli Mkhize as he is facing serious allegations of corruption.
tsn: Mosekaseki wa tsa sepoletiki Ivor Sarakinsky a re moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa o ne a tshwanetse go tsaya tshwetso kgatlhanong le Tona ya Boitekanelo Ngaka Zweli Mkhize jaaka a lebagane le  ditatofatso tsa tlolomolao tse di masisi.
mt0: <pad> The political commentator Ivor Sarakinsky said President Cyril Ramaphosa should have taken action against Health Minister Zweli Mkhize as he is facing serious criminal charges.</s>

en: Sarakinsky says the president is not dealing with the matter appropriately.
tsn: Sarakinsky a re moporesitente ga a samagane le ntlha e ka tsela e e maleba.
mt0: <pad> Sarakinsky said the president did not handle the matter in a proper way.</s>

en: Allegations have surfaced that Mkhize personally benefited from the irregular R150 million tender to communications company Digital Vibes.
tsn: Go tlhageletse ditatofatso tsa gore Mkhize o ungwile go tswa mo  kabelong ya thendara ya dimilione tsa diranta di le R150 e e neetsweng setlamo sa ditlhaeletsano, Digital vibes.
mt0: <pad> The allegations arose after Mkhize was accused of embezzlement from the R150 million contract awarded to the media company, Digital vibes.</s>

en: Sarakinsky says Ramaphosa finds himself in a difficult position as Mkhize is a medical doctor who knows what needs to be done in terms of the COVID-19 pandemic.
tsn: Sarakinsky a re Ramaphosa o iphitlhela a le mo maemong a a bokete ka ntlha ya fa Mkhize e le ngaka mme a itse se se tshwanetseng go dirwa ka leroborobo la COVID-19.
mt0: <pad> Sarakinsky said Ramaphosa was in a difficult position because Mkhize is a doctor and knows what to do about the COVID-19 outbreak.</s>

en: Minister Mkhize made it very hard for President Ramaphosa because in many other democracies a scandal like this would result in the minister resigning falling on his sword and in that way protecting the president from having to take disciplinary action.
tsn: Tona Mkhize o thatafaleditse Moporesidente Ramaphosa dilo ka gonne mo dikgetseng tse dingwe tsa temokarasi e e tlhabisangditlhong jaana, dipoelo e nna  gore tona a role tiro ya gagwe  ka maikaelelo a go sireletsa le go tsaya dikgato tsa kgalemo.
mt0: <pad> Mr Mkhize complicated things for President Ramaphosa because in other cases of such a scandalous democracy, the result is that a minister resigns in order to protect and take disciplinary action.</s>

en: So that is the practice that should be in place.
tsn: Ka jalo ke tiro e e tshwanetse go dira.
mt0: <pad> So it's a job that has to be done.</s>

en: But in SA if that was the case we would have ongoing changes in the cabinet with all the scandals that are emerging through media investigations and the Zondo Commission.
tsn: Mme fa go ne go ntse jalo mo Aforika Borwa, re ka bo re na le diphetogo mo dikabineteng tse di nang le matlhabisaditlhong tsotlhe tse di tlhagelelang mo dipatlisisong tsa bobegakgang le kwa Khomišeneng ya ga Zondo.
mt0: <pad> But if that were true in South Africa, we would have seen a change in the cabinets with all the scandals that emerge in press inquiries and the Zondo Commission.</s>

en: Ramaphosa dealing with allegations.
tsn: Ramaphosa go samagane le ditatofatso.
mt0: <pad> simply say you don't know Ramaphosa in relation to the allegations.</s>

en: On Wednesday, President Cyril Ramaphosa said he’s dealing with allegations around Mkhize and the irregular R150 million Digital Vibes contract.
tsn: Ka Laboraro, Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa o rile o sa samagane le ditatofatso tsa ga Mkhize le kabelo ya konteraka ya dimilione ya diranta di le R150 go Digital Vibes.
mt0: <pad> On Wednesday, President Cyril Ramaphosa said he was not involved in Mkhize's allegations about the award of R150 million contract to Digital Vibes.</s>

en: There has been mounting pressure from the DA and other parties for Mkhize to step down or be removed by Ramaphosa.
tsn: Kgatelelo e ntse e oketsega go tswa kwa DA le mekgatlho e mengwe gore Mkhize a role tiro kgotsa a tlosiwe ke Ramaphosa.
mt0: <pad> There is increasing pressure from DA and other organizations for Mkhize to resign or be removed by Ramaphosa.</s>

en: The President said the allegations are serious and need to be investigated thoroughly by law enforcement agencies and that due process will be followed once the investigations are finalised.
tsn: Moporesidente o rile ditatofatso tse di masisi e bile di tshwanetse go batlisisiwa ka botlalo ke ditheo tsa tiragatso ya Molao le gore tsamaiso e e tshwanetseng e tlaa latela fa dipatlisiso di konoseditswe.
mt0: <pad> The President said the allegations are serious and should be investigated thoroughly by the executive agencies and that the proper procedure will follow after the investigation is concluded.</s>

en: Mkhize to appear before Parliaments Health Committee on Friday
tsn: Mkhize o solofetswe go tlhagelela fa pele ga Komiti ya Boitekanelo ya Palamente ka Labotlhano.
mt0: <pad> Mkhize is scheduled to appear before the Health Committee of the Parliament on Thursday.</s>

en: Meanwhile, Mkhize will be appearing before Parliaments Health Committee on Friday morning to respond to allegations of his involvement in the irregular Digital Vibes contract.
tsn: Re sa le foo, Mkhize o tla tlhagelela fa pele ga komiti ya Boitekanelo ya Palamente ka Labotlhano mo mosong go araba ditatofatso tsa go nna le seabe ga gagwe mo kabelong ya konteraka go Digital Vibes.
mt0: <pad> However, Mkhize will appear before the Health Committee of the Parliament on Thursday morning to answer allegations that he had a role in the award of contracts to Digital Vibes.</s>

en: National Assembly House Committee Chairperson and Chair of Committee Chairpersons Cedrick Frolick has confirmed to theSABCthat Mkhize will appear before the committee.
tsn: Modulasetulo wa Komiti ya Kokoano Bosetšhaba le Modulasetulo wa Komiti e e nang le Badulasetulo Cedrick Frolick o netefaleditse ba SABC gore Mkhize   o tlaa tlhagelela fa pele ga komiti.
mt0: <pad> The National Conference and Joint Committee Chairman Cedrick Frolick confirmed to SABC that Mkhize will appear before the panel.</s>

en: Frolick says he has approved a committee request for Mkhize to appear before the Health Committee early on Friday morning.
tsn: Frolick a re o amogetse kopo semmuso ya Komiti  ya go tlhagelela ga ga Mkhize fa pele ga komiti ya Boitekanelo mo mosong wa Labotlhano.
mt0: <pad> Frolick said he had received a formal request from the Committee to have Mkhize appear before the Health Committee on Thursday morning.</s>

en: Frolick says a virtual meeting with Mkhize and the Health Parliamentary Committee will take place at 8 o’clock on Friday morning.
tsn: Frolick a re kopano le Mkhize e e tla bong e seng ka namana le Komiti ya Palamente le ya Boitekanelo e tlaa tshwarwa ka Ura ya 8  mo mosong wa Labotlhano.
mt0: <pad> Frolick said the meeting with Mkhize which will be held in person and with the Parliamentary and Health Committees will be held at 8am on Thursday.</s>

en: Democratic Alliance (DA) shadow Minister of Health, Siviwe Gwarube, has laid criminal charges against Mkhize at the Cape Town Central Police Station.
tsn: Molatedi wa Democratic Alliance (DA) Tona ya Boitekanelo, Siviwe Gwarube, o butse molato wa bosenyi kgatlhanong le Mkhize kwa seteišheneng sa mapodisi kwa Toropong ya Kapa.
mt0: <pad> The Democratic Alliance (DA) Health Minister, Siviwe Gwarube, has filed a criminal charge against Mkhize at the Cape Town police station.</s>

en: She has also laid charges of contravening the Public Finance Management Act against Health Department Director-General Dr Sandile Buthelezi.
tsn: O butse molato wa go tlola Molao wa Taolo ya Matlole a Setšhaba kgatlhanong le Mokaedi Kakaretso wa Lefapha la Boitekanelo Ngaka Sandile Buthelezi.
mt0: <pad> He filed a criminal charge of fraud against the Director General of Health Dr Sandile Buthelezi.</s>

en: DA lays criminal charge against Dr Zweli Mkhize.
tsn: DA e bula molato wa bosenyi kgatlhanong le Ngaka Zweli Mkhize.
mt0: <pad> DA filed criminal charges against Dr Zweli Mkhize</s>

en: The African National Congress (ANC) Interim Provincial Committee in the Free State has warned that it will take action against members who are facing criminal charges and don’t step aside.
tsn: Komiti ya nakwana ya porofense mo Foreisetata ya African National Congress (ANC) e tlhalositse gore e tlaa tsaya kgato kgatlhanong le maloko a a lebaganeng le dikgetse tsa bosenyi mme a sa emisiwe.
mt0: <pad> The temporary provincial Committee of the African National Congress (ANC) in Eastern Province has said it will take action against members who are involved in criminal proceedings but have not been suspended.</s>

en: The committee held a media briefing in Bloemfontein about the outcome of its first meeting that was held earlier this week.
tsn: Komiti e ne ya tshwara dipuisano le bobegakgang kwa Bloemfontein ka ga dipoelo tsa kopanong ya yone ya ntlha e e neng e tshwerwe go sa le gale mo bekeng e.
mt0: <pad> The Committee held a press conference in Bloemfontein on the results of its first meeting held earlier this week.</s>

en: Deputy convener Paseka Nompondo says there are three members that have been affected.
tsn: Motlatsa motsamaisi Paseka Nompondo a re go na le maloko a le mararo a a  amegileng.
mt0: <pad> The Deputy Director of the NPO, Paseka Nompondo, said there were three members affected.</s>

en: At the current moment, I can say that those that are affected are three and then we already have been in touch with them this morning, We are dealing with that matter so the state officials that have appeared in court this morning, the state must act within the framework of the law.
tsn: Mo nakong ya ga jaana, ke tla re go amegile ba le bararo mme re setse re golagane le bone mo mosong ono,  Re lebagane le ntlha eno, batlhankedi ba puso ba ba tlhageletseng kwa kgotlatshekelo mo mosong ono, puso e tshwanetse go dira mo teng ga letlhomeso la molao.
mt0: <pad> Now, I can tell you that there are three people affected and we have already contacted them this morning. We are dealing with this issue, government officials who appeared in court this morning, the government must act within the legal framework.</s>

en: But on our side, as the ANC, those who occupy our positions shall step aside today, failing which the ANC will act appropriately.
tsn: Mme mo letlhakoreng la rona, jaaka ANC, ba ba leng mo maemong a rona ba tlaa emisiwa gompieno, fa go padile, ANC e tlaa dira se se tshwanetseng.
mt0: <pad> And on our part, as ANC, those in our ranks will be suspended today, if necessary, the ANC will do what is appropriate.</s>

en: ANC provincial convener, Mxolisi Dukwana, says members who don’t follow party policies will no longer be welcome in the party.
tsn: Motsamaisi wa porofense wa ANC, Mxolisi Dukwana o re maloko a a a sa lateleng dipholisi tsa lekoko ga a kitla a tlhola a amogelwa mo mokgatlhong.
mt0: <pad> The ANC's provincial director, Mxolisi Dukwana said members who do not follow the party's policies will not be accepted into the organisation.</s>

en: We would like to be given space to ensure that we work with the members of the ANC.
tsn: Re rata go ka newa tšhono ya go netefatsa gore re dira le maloko a Mokgatlho wa ANC.
mt0: <pad> We would like to be able to confirm that we are working with members of the ANC.</s>

en: We indicated that there is no one who is the hero; members of the ANC do not belong to anyone, there is no one who is the supporter of any leader.
tsn: Re supile gore ga go na motho yo e leng mogaka; maloko a mokgatlho wa ANC ga e se a ga ope, ga go ope yo e leng motshegetsi wa moeteledipele ope.
mt0: <pad> We have shown that no one is a criminal; members of the ANC are not anyone's, no one is a supporter of any leader.</s>

en: These are members of the ANC and we need to ensure that such finds expression and that members of the ANC will always follow the organisation and not follow individuals.
tsn: A, ke maloko a ANC mme re tshwanetse go netefatsa gore re fitlhela mekgwa e e siameng, maloko a mokgatlho wa ANC ka gale a tlaa latela mokgatlho e seng batho.
mt0: <pad> A, is a member of the ANC and we have to make sure that we find the right methods, members of the ANC will always follow the organization and not individuals.</s>

en: Mxolisi Dukwana appointed as convenor of the ANC Free State Interim Provincial Committee:
tsn: Mxolisi Dukwana o tlhomilwe jaaka moepapitso wa ANC wa Komiti ya nakwana ya Porofense ya Foreisetata.
mt0: <pad> Mxolisi Dukwana has been appointed as the ANC's spokesman for the Provisional Committee of the Eastern Province.</s>

en: Health Minister Dr Zweli Mkhize will be appearing before Parliaments Health Committee on Friday morning to respond to allegations of his involvement in the irregular Digital Vibes contract.
tsn: Tona ya Boitekanelo Ngaka Zweli Mkhize o tla tlhagelela fa pele ga Komiti ya Boitekanelo ya Palamente mo mosong wa Labotlhano go araba ditatofatso tsa go nna le seabe ga gagwe mo konterakeng ya Digital vibes.
mt0: <pad> The Health Minister Dr Zweli Mkhize will appear before the Parliamentary Committee on Health on Thursday morning to answer allegations of his involvement in the Digital Vibes contract.</s>

en: National Assembly House Committee Chairperson and Chair of Committee Chairpersons Cedrick Frolick has confirmed to the SABC that Mkhize will appear before the committee.
tsn: Modulasetulo wa Komiti ya Kokoano ya Bosetšhaba le Modulasetulo wa Komiti ya Badulasetulo Cedrick Frolick ba netefaleditse ba SABC gore  Mkhize o tlaa tlhagelela fa pele ga komiti.
mt0: <pad> The National Conference Committee and the Chair of the Joint Committee Cedric Frolick confirmed to SABC that Mkhize will appear before the panel.</s>

en: Pressure has been mounting that President Cyril Ramaphosa should act against Mkhize following his latest admission that the awarding of a R150-million tender to communications company, Digital Vibes was irregular.
tsn: Kgatelelo e sa ntse e oketsega gore Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa o tshwanetse go tsaya kgato kgatlhanong le Mkhize go latela go dumela kabelo ya thendara ya dimilione tsa diranta di le R150 go setlamo sa ditlhaeletsano, Digital Vibes e e neng e sa tlhomamang.
mt0: <pad> The pressure is growing that President Cyril Ramaphosa should take action against Mkhize after he agreed to award a R150 million tender to the media company, Digital Vibes, which was unlawful.</s>

en: The tender was for services related to the National Health Insurance scheme and governments response to the COVID-19 pandemic.
tsn: Thendara e ne e le ya ditirelo tse di amanang le sekema sa Inšhorense ya Pholo ya Bosetšhaba le tsibogelo ya mebuso ka ga covid-19.
mt0: <pad> The agenda was for services related to the National Health Insurance System and government response to the COVID-19 pandemic.</s>

en: DA lays criminal charges against Mkhize
tsn: DA e butse molato wa bosenyi kgatlhanong le Mkhize
mt0: <pad> DA has filed criminal charges against Mkhize.</s>

en: Meanwhile,Democratic Alliance (DA)shadow Minister of Health, Siviwe Gwarube, has laid criminal charges against Mkhize at the Cape Town Central Police Station.
tsn: Re sa ntse foo, molatedi wa Democratic Alliance (DA) Tona ya Boitekanelo, Siviwe Gwarube, o butse molato wa bosenyi kgatlhanong le Mkhize kwa seteišheneng sa mapodisi kwa Toropong ya Kapa.
mt0: <pad> While we were still there, the DA's Health Minister, Siviwe Gwarube, filed a criminal charge against Mkhize at the Cape Town police station.</s>

en: She has also laid charges of contravening the Public Finance Management Act against Health Department Director-General Doctor Sandile Buthelezi.
tsn: O butse molato gape wa go tlola Molao wa Taolo ya Matlole a Setšhaba kgatlhanong le Mokaedi Kakaretso wa Lefapha la Boitekanelo Ngk Sandile Buthelezi.
mt0: <pad> He also filed a charge of fraud against the Director General of Health Dr Sandile Buthelezi.</s>

en: This after revelations that Mkhize’s family may have benefited from proceeds of a R150 million tender that his department awarded to communications company Digital Vibes.
tsn: Seno se ka morago ga tshenolo ya gore lelapa la ga Mkhize le ka tswa le ungwile go tswa mo  mading a thendara ya dimilione di le R150 e  lefapha la gagwe le e abetseng setlamo sa ditlhaeletsano Digital vibes.
mt0: <pad> This comes after a revelation that Mkhize's family may have benefited from the R150 million contract his office awarded to the media company Digital vibes.</s>

en: The company employed Mkhize’s former spokesperson and alleged family friend, Tahera Mather, and the Ministers former assistant, Naadhira Mitha.
tsn: Setlamo se thapile Mmueledi wa Lelapa la ga Mkhize wa maloba, yo  e bile e leng tsala ya lelapa, Tahera Mather le mothusi wa ga tona wa maloba, Naadhira Mitha.
mt0: <pad> The organisation honoured the former Mkhize family lawyer, who was a friend of the family, Tahera Mather and his former assistant, Naadhira Mitha.</s>

en: DA lays criminal charge against Dr Zweli Mkhize:

en: On Wednesday, President Cyri lRamaphosa said he’s dealing with allegations around Zweli Mkhize and the irregular R150 million Digital Vibes contract.
tsn: Ka Laboraro, Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa o rile samagane le ditatofatso malebana le Zweli Mkhize le kontaraka e e sa tlhomamang ya diranta tsa dimilione di le  R150 ya Digital Vibes
mt0: <pad> On Wednesday, President Cyril Ramaphosa said he was aware of allegations against Zweli Mkhize and the unregulated R150 million contract with Digital Vibes.</s>

en: There are serious allegations which need to be investigated by the SIU and any other appropriate authority and be finalised without delay.
tsn: Go na le ditatofatso tse masisi tse di tshwanetseng go batlisisiwa ke ba ga SIU le makala a mangwe a a maleba mme ba konosetse se kwa ntle ga tiego.
mt0: <pad> There are serious allegations that need to be investigated by SIU and other relevant departments and they should do so without delay.</s>

en: President Cyril Ramaphosa says hes dealing with allegations against Dr Zweli Mkhize:
tsn: Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa a re o samagane le ditatofatso kgatlhanong le Ngaka Zweli Mkhize.
mt0: <pad> President Cyril Ramaphosa said he was aware of allegations against Dr Zweli Mkhize.</s>

en: The Democratic Alliance (DA) is calling for the immediate suspension of embattled Health Minister Dr Zweli Mkhize.
tsn: Democratic Alliance (DA) e dirang ipiletso ya gore kemiso ya Tona ya Boitekanelo.Ngk Zweli Mkhize e diragale ka bonako
mt0: <pad> The Democratic Alliance (DA) is calling for the resignation of Health Minister Dr Zweli Mkhize to be made as soon as possible.</s>

en: The DA shadow minister for Health Siviwe Gwarube laid charges against Mkhize on Thursday at the Cape Town police station under the Prevention of Corruption Act.
tsn: Molatedi wa DA, Tona ya Boitekanelo Siviwe Gwarube o butse molato  kgatlhanong le Mkhize ka Labone kwa seteišheneng sa mapodisi sa kwa Toropong ya Kapa ka fa tlase ga Molao wa Thibelo ya tlolomolao.
mt0: <pad> The DA's spokesman, Health Minister Siviwe Gwarube, charged Mkhize on Thursday at the Cape Town police station under the Proceeds of Crime Act.</s>

en: Allegations have surfaced regarding Mkhize and a tender of about R150 million for communications company Digital Vibes.
tsn: Ditatofatso di tlhageletse mabapi le Mkhize le thendara ya dimilione di le R150 tsa setlamo sa tlhaeletsano sa Digital vibes.
mt0: <pad> The allegations relate to Mkhize and the R150 million contract with digital vibes.</s>

en: The DA has also laid charges against the Director-General in the department, Dr Sandile Buthelezi for the alleged flouting the Public Finance Management Act.
tsn: DA e dirile ditatofatso kgatlhanong le Mokaedi-Kakaretso mo lefapheng, Ngk Sandile Buthelezi tsa tlolo ya Molao wa Taolo ya matlole a setšhaba.
mt0: <pad> DA has lodged charges against the Director General of the Department, Dr Sandile Buthelezi for violating the Public Finance Management Act.</s>

en: Gwarube says, We are laying charges here against Minister Mkhize, allegations are mounting in the past few weeks that suggest that the minister might have improperly signed off a contract to Digital Vibes, a company that is run by a close associates to the tune of 150 million rands.
tsn: Gwarube a re, re bula melato kgatlhanong le Tona Mkhize, ditatofatso di oketsegile mo dibekeng di le mmalwa tse di fetileng tse di tshitshinyang gore Tona a ka tswa a saenile  konteraka ya Digital Vibes ka phoso, khampani e e tsamaisiwa ke batho ba a ba itsaneng mme e lekanyetswa go dimilione tsa diranta di le 150.
mt0: <pad> Gwarube said, We are launching a criminal case against Mr Mkhize, allegations have grown over the past few weeks that the Minister may have signed the contract of Digital Vibes in error, a company run by his close associates and estimated to be 150 million rands.</s>

en: It is our contention that this could be in contravention of the combating and prevention of corruption act.
tsn: Maikutlo a rona ke gore se se ka nna kgatlhanong le molao wa Twantsho le Thibelo ya tlolomolao.
mt0: <pad> Our opinion is that this could be in violation of the Prevention and Combating of Crime Act.</s>

en: The Special Investigation Unit (SIU) is investigating the matter, telling Scopa that they hope to wrap up investigations by the end of the month.
tsn: Yuniti ya Dipatlisiso tse di Kgethegileng (SIU) e sekaseka ntlha e, ba boleletse Scopa gore ba solofela go konosetsa dipatlisiso fa kgwedi e ya kwa bokhutlong.
mt0: <pad> The Special Investigation Unit (SIU) is investigating the matter, and told Scopa that they expect to complete the investigation by the end of the month.</s>

en: President Cyril Ramamaphosa announced that he’s also dealing with the matter, saying Mkhize is co-operating fully.
tsn: Moporesitente Cyril Ramamaphosa o dirile kitsiso ya gore le ena o samagana le ntlha e, a re Mkhize o na le tirisanommogo e e tletseng.
mt0: <pad> President Cyril Ramaphosa also announced that he is aware of the matter, saying Mkhize has full cooperation with him.</s>

en: However, Gwarube says Mkhize should have long been suspended, We are of the view that the President failed yesterday to take any form of leadership by suspending Dr Mkhize, pending the conclusion of the SIU investigation.
tsn: Le fa go le jalo, Gwarube a re Mkhize o ne a tshwanetse go emisiwa kgale. Re lemoga gore Moporesidente o reteletswe maabane go dirisa maemo a gagwe a boeteledipele go emisa Ngaka Mkhize, fa go santse go letilwe go konosediwa ga dipatlisiso go tswa SIU.
mt0: <pad> However, Gwarube said Mkhize should have been sacked long ago. We know that the President has refused to use his office to sacked Dr Mkhize, while waiting for the release of the report from SIU.</s>

en: We think this is improper, we think that actually potentially from undue influence if the minister is his post while hes being investigated.
tsn: Re akanya gore se ga se a siama, re akanya gore go na le tshusumetso gore tona a tswelele ka tiro ya gagwe fa go sa ntse go diriwa dipatlisiso.
mt0: <pad> We think this is not fair, we think it is a disservice to the judge to continue his work while he is investigating.</s>

en: Mkhize is alleged to have signed off on the contract whose alleged directors are his friends, Tahera Mather and Naadira Mitha, for government communications services.
tsn: Mkhize o latofadiwa ka go saena konteraka e bakaedi ba latofadiwang e le ditsala tsa gagwe, Tahera Mather le Naadira Mitha, ba tirelo ya ditlhaeletsano tsa puso.
mt0: <pad> Mkhize is accused of signing contracts with two of his alleged friends, Tahera Mather and Naadira Mitha, of the government communication service.</s>

en: But the money allegedly ended up benefitting Mkhize, his family and the families of the two directors.
tsn: Fela madi a a a kaiwang a feleleditse a ungwela Mkhize, lelapa la gagwe le malapa a bakaedi ba babedi.
mt0: <pad> The money reportedly ended up being paid to Mkhize, his family and two other relatives.</s>

en: In another case, the Public Protector says she’s opened a case of contempt with the Brooklyn police.
tsn: Mo kgetseng e nngwe, Mosireletsi wa Setšhaba a re o butse kgetse ya lenyatso le ba sepodisi sa Brooklyn.
mt0: <pad> In another case, the prosecutor said he had opened a criminal case with Brooklyn police.</s>

en: This is after Mkhize failed on three occasions to honour her subpoenas.
tsn: Se ke mo morago ga gore Mkhize a retelelwe makgetlho a le mararo go tlotla dipiletsatshekong tsa  gagwe.
mt0: <pad> This comes after Mkhize was refused to speak in his petitions three times.</s>

en: The subpoenas were sent between February and the 1st of this month.
tsn: Dipiletsatshekong di rometswe magareng ga kgwedi ya Tlhakole le la di tsa kgwedi eno.
mt0: <pad> The invitations were sent between January and March of this year.</s>

en: President Cyril Ramaphosa engages with the media on various issues, following his reply to the debate on his Presidency Budget Vote for 2021/2022.
tsn: Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa o ikopanya le ba metswedi ya dikgang ka ga dintlha tse di farologaneng go latela karabo ya gagwe, ka ga tekanyetsokabo ya gagwe ya moporesidente 2021/2022
mt0: <pad> President Cyril Ramaphosa addresses the media on various issues after his response to the question about his presidential bid for 2021/2022.</s>

en: The Public Protectors office says it will initiate contempt proceedings against Health Minister Zweli Mkhize, following his failure to honour a subpoena to give evidence and produce documents.
tsn: Kantoro ya Basireletsi ba Setšhaba ya re e tla simolola dingangisano tsa tsamaiso ya tsheko kgatlhanong le, Tona ya Boitekanelo Zweli Mkhize go latela go retelelwa ke go tlotla dipiletsatshekong tsa gagwe, go neela bopaki le go tlhagisa ditokomane.
mt0: <pad> The National Advocate of South Africa (NPA) has said it will initiate legal proceedings against Health Minister Zweli Mkhize after he failed to answer his complaints, testify and produce documents.</s>

en: This is in relation to an investigation into allegations of undue delay and/or failure by his department to implement the recommendations of the Report of the Clinical Associate National Task Team in 2017.
tsn: Se ke ka ntlha ya patlisiso e e ka ga ditatofatso tse di gogelwang morago le/ kgotsa  go retelelwa ga lefapha la gagwe go tsenya tirisong dikatlenegiso tsa pegelo ya Clinical Associate National Task Team ka 2017.
mt0: <pad> This is due to the investigation into post-mortems and/or the failure of his office to implement the recommendations of the Clinical Associate National Task Team report in 2017</s>

en: In a statement, the Public Protectors office says Mkhize has failed to honour the subpoena on three occasions.
tsn: Mo tlhagisong, kantoro ya Basireletsi ba Setšhaba e rile Mkhize o paletswe ke go tlotla dipiletsatshekong makgetlo a le mararo.
mt0: <pad> In a statement, the National Prosecution Office said Mkhize had failed to show up for trial three times.</s>

en: It says a case will be opened against him at the Brooklyn police station in Hatfield, Pretoria this week.
tsn: E re kgetse e tlaa bulwa kgatlhanong le ena kwa seteišheneng sa mapodisi sa mo Brooklyn Hatfield, Pretoria mo bekeng eno.
mt0: <pad> He said the case will be filed against him at Brooklyn Hatfield, Pretoria this week.</s>

en: Public Protectors office to initiate contempt proceedings against Dr Zweli Mkhize.
tsn: Kantoro ya Basireletsi ba Setšhaba e tla simolola dikgogakgogano mo ditsamaisong kgatlhanong le Ngk Zweli Mkhize.
mt0: <pad> The National Advocate of South Africa will initiate legal action against Dr Zweli Mkhize.</s>

en: Meanwhile, Democratic Alliance (DA) shadow Minister of Health, Siviwe Gwarube, has laid criminal charges against Mkhize at the Cape Town Central Police Station.
tsn: Re sa le foo, Tona ya Boitekaneloya Democartic Alliance (DA), Siviwe Gwarube, o butse kgetse ya molato wa bosenyi  kgatlhanong le Mkhize kwa seteišheneng sa mapodisi kwa Toropong ya Kapa.
mt0: <pad> While we were still there, the DA's minister of security Siviwe Gwarube opened a criminal case against Mkhize at the police station in Cape Town.</s>

en: This after revelations that Mkhizes; family may have benefited from proceeds of a R150 million tender that his department awarded to communications company Digital Vibes.
tsn: Morago ga ditshenolo tsa gore lelapa la Mkhizes le ka tswa le ungwile go tswa dikunong tsa thendara ya dimilione tse R150 tse lefapha la gagwe le di neetseng setlamo sa tlhaeletsano Digital vibes
