mt0: <pad> After revelations that Mkhizes' family may have benefited from a R150 million contract his office awarded to the media company Digital vibes, he said:</s>

en: The contract was for work related to the National Health Insurance programme and governments response to the coronavirus pandemic.
tsn: Konteraka e ne e amana le lenaneo la  Inšhorense ya Boitekanelo ba Bosetšhaba le tsibogelo ya mebuso go leroborobo la khorona.
mt0: <pad> The contract was related to the National Health Insurance Program and government response to the coronavirus pandemic.</s>

en: On Wednesday, President Cyril Ramaphosa said hes dealing with allegations around Zweli Mkhize and the irregular R150 million Digital Vibes contract.
tsn: Ka Laboraro, Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa o rile o tshwaragane  le ditatofatso  tse di amaganang le Zweli Mkhize le kontaraka e e sa tlhomamang ya dimilione di ka nna R150 tsa Digital Vibes
mt0: <pad> On Wednesday, President Cyril Ramaphosa said he was involved in allegations against Zweli Mkhize and the unregulated contract of R150 million for Digital Vibes.</s>

en: There has been mounting pressure from the DA and other parties for Mkhize to step down or be removed by Ramaphosa.
tsn: Go na le kgatelelo e e oketsegang go tswa DA le mekgatlho e  mengwe gore Mkhize a role tiro kgotsa tloswe ke Ramaphosa.
mt0: <pad> There is increasing pressure from DA and other organizations for Mkhize to resign or be removed by Ramaphosa.</s>

en: President Cyril Ramaphosa is replying to the debate on the Presidencys budget vote for 2021/22, on Thursday afternoon.
tsn: Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa o araba dingangisano ka ga tekanyetsokabo ya Poresitente ya 2021/22, ka maitseboa a Labone
mt0: <pad> President Cyril Ramaphosa responded to debate on the presidential budget for 2021/22, on Friday evening.</s>

en: This follows his presentation of the budget allocation on Wednesday.
tsn: Se se latela morago ga puo ya gagwe ya tekanyetsokabo ya ka Laboraro.
mt0: <pad> It followed his Wednesday speech on the state of the union.</s>

en: The National Assembly has granted the Ad Hoc Committee on the amendment of Section 25 of the Constitution a 30-day extension to complete its work.
tsn: Kokoano Bosetšhaba e ntshitse Komiti ya nakwana ya Tlhabololo ya karolo 25 ya katoloso ya Molaotheo ya matsatsi a le 30 go fetsa tiro ya yona.
mt0: <pad> The National Conference established the Provisional Development Committee of Article 25 of the Extension of the Constitution for 30 days to complete its work.</s>

en: The Committee, tasked with coming up with legislation to enable amendments that will allow for land expropriation, made the request for the extension earlier this week.
tsn: Komiti e neetswe tiro ya go tla ka molao go kgontsha tlhabololo e e tla letlang tlhakolothoto ya lefatshe, go dirilwe kopo ya katoloso mo bekeng e.
mt0: <pad> The Committee was given the task of drafting a law to allow development that will allow global warming, and a request for an extension was made this week.</s>

en: Its lifespan ended at midnight on Monday.
tsn: Botshelo jwa yona bo fedile ka bosigogare jwa Mosupologo.
mt0: <pad> She died on Tuesday night.</s>

en: The Chairpersons in the National Assembly, Cedrick Frolick, says this doesn’t change the Committees mandate.
tsn: Baduladitulo ka mo Kokoanong ya Bosetšhaba, Cedrick Frolick, o rile se ga se fetole taolelo ya Komiti.
mt0: <pad> The spokesman for the National Conference, Cedrick Frolick, said this did not change the decision of the Committee.</s>

en: The mandate of the Committee will remain the same.
tsn: Taolelo ya Komiti e tla nna jalo.
mt0: <pad> The Committee's decision will be that.</s>

en: The Committee will be re-established and asked to report back end of August although they requested a 30-day extension, we are mindful that the House going into recess and even if they complete it in 30 days, the report would be there and wait for us when we return in August.
tsn: Komiti e tla nna diriwa sešwa mme ga kopiwa gore ba boe ka pegelo mo bokhutlong jwa kgwedi ya Phatwe, le fa ba kopile katoloso ya  matsatsi a le 30, re a itse gore Kgotla e tlile go nna maikhutsong le  fa ba ka fetsa mo matsatsing a le 30, pegelo e tla nna teng mme ya re emela fa re boa ka kgwedi ya Phatwe.
mt0: <pad> The Committee will be reconstituted and asked to return with a report at the end of August, although they requested an extension of 30 days, we know the Court will be on vacation and even if they finish in 30 days, the report will be there and will wait for us when we return in August.</s>

en: Parliament held public oral hearings into the proposal to amend Section 25 of the Constitution.
tsn: Palamente e ne e tshwere ditheetso tsa setšhaba tsa molomo ka go fetola tshitshinyo ya go tlhabolola Karolo 25 ya Molaotheo.
mt0: <pad> The parliament had held public hearings by changing the proposed amendment to Article 25 of the Constitution.</s>

en: This follows a request by the Democratic Alliance (DA) to allow oral submissions on the proposed constitutional amendment.
tsn: Se se latela kopo e e dirilweng ke Democratic Alliance (DA) go dumelela ditlhagiso tsa molomo mo go tshitshintsweng ya Tlhabololo ya Molaotheo.
mt0: <pad> This follows a request by the Democratic Alliance (DA) to allow amendments to the proposed Constitutional Amendment.</s>

en: The Ad Hoc Committee handling the matter has received over 200 000 written submissions.
tsn: Komiti ya nakwana e e tshwaraganeng le kgang e e amogetse dingongorego di feta 200 000 tse di kwadilweng.
mt0: <pad> The temporary committee that was formed to deal with the matter received over 2 million written complaints.</s>

en: It is currently processing the proposal to amend the Constitution to give effect to land expropriation without compensation.
tsn: Ga jaana e tsamaisa tshitshinyo go tlhabolola Molaotheo go diragatsa molao wa go amogiwa dithoto kwa ntle ga tuelo.
mt0: <pad> It is now carrying out a proposal to amend the Constitution to implement the law of freezing property without payment.</s>

en: There is currently a huge debate on the feasibility of the amendment.
tsn: Jaanong go na le ngangisano e e boitshegang mo ya tlhabololo.
mt0: <pad> Now there is a great discussion about development.</s>

en: However, labour federation Cosatu says it supports the Amendment and Expropriation Bill.
tsn: Le fa go ntse jalo, mokgatlho wa badiri wa COSATU o re o tshegetsa tlhabololo le molao wa go Amogiwa Dithoto.
mt0: <pad> However, the union of workers COSATU said it supports the development and the implementation of the Nationalisation Act.</s>

en: The highest law in the land
tsn: Molao o o kwa godimo mo lefatsheng
mt0: <pad> The highest law in the world.</s>

en: The Constitution of the Republic of South Africa is Act
tsn: Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ke Molao
mt0: <pad> The Constitution of the Republic of South Africa is the fundamental law of the country.</s>

en: No 108 of Parliament of 1996.
tsn: Molao wa 108 wa Palamente wa 1996.
mt0: <pad> The 108th Parliamentary Act of 1996</s>

en: It is the highest law in the land.
tsn: Ke molao o o kwa godimo mo lefatsheng.
mt0: <pad> It is the highest law in the world.</s>

en: And therefore any law that is not in line with the Constitution becomes invalid unless and until it is rectified to pass constitutional muster.
tsn: Ka jalo molao o mongwe le o mongwe o o sa tsamaelaneng le Molaotheo ga o dire, ntle le gore le go fitlha o baakanngwa go kgona go falola ditlhatlhobo tsa Molaotheo.
mt0: <pad> So any law that is inconsistent with the Constitution is not valid, unless it is amended to allow it to pass constitutional scrutiny.</s>

en: The Bill of Rights in Chapter 2 remains the cornerstone of democracy as outlined in the Constitution.
tsn: Molaotlhomo wa Ditshwanelo mo Kgaolo 2 e santse e le motheo wa temokerasi jaaka o tlhagisitswe mo Molaotheong.
mt0: <pad> The Constitutional Rights in Section 2 is still the basis of democracy as it is described in the Constitution.</s>

en: It is a chapter that makes provision for the protection of human dignity, the right to life, freedom of expression, equality, privacy, freedom of religion, freedom of belief and opinion.
tsn: Ke kgaolo e e dirang tlamelo ya go sireletsa seriti sa botho, tshwanelo ya botshelo, Kgololosego ya tlhagisomaikutlo, tekatekano, kgololosego ya sephiri, kgololosego ya bodumedi, kgololosego ya tumelo le kakanyo.
mt0: <pad> It is a section that provides to protect the individual's dignity, right to life, intellectual freedom, fairness, privacy, religious freedom, religious freedom and freedom of religion and thought.</s>

en: Other freedoms include political rights, freedom of trade, occupation and profession.
tsn: Tse dingwe tsa dikgololosego di akaretsa ditshwanelo tsa sepolotiki, kgololosego ya kgwebo, ditiro le borutegi.
mt0: <pad> Other freedoms include political rights, economic freedom, work and freedom of religion.</s>

en: However, all these rights are subject to limitations.
tsn: Le fa go ntse jalo, ditshwanelo tsotlhe di ya ka ditekanyetso
mt0: <pad> However, all requirements are subject to standards.</s>

en: To change most of the Bill of Rights requires a two-thirds majority vote.
tsn: Go fetola bontsi jwa Molaotlhomo wa Ditshwanelo ono go tlhoka bontsi jwa diboutu di le peditharong.
mt0: <pad> To change most of the Constitution requires two-thirds of the vote.</s>

en: One example that requires a two-thirds vote is the property clause under Section 25 of the Constitution.
tsn: Sekao se le sengwe se se tlhoka diboutu di le peditharong ke polelwana ya semolao ya thoto, ke polelwana e e ka fa tlase ga Karolo 25 ya Molaotheo.
mt0: <pad> One example that requires two-thirds of the vote is the legal definition of property, a definition under Article 25 of the Constitution.</s>

en: It is under Section 25 where the expropriation of land and property is provided for.
tsn: Ke ka fa tlase ga molawana wa Karolo 25 mo tlhakolothoto ya lefatshe le dithoto e neetsweng teng.
mt0: <pad> It is under Article 25 that the assignment of land and property is made.</s>

en: However, this clause is currently being amended by the Ad Hoc Committee to Amend Section 25 of the Constitution to allow the Expropriation of Land Without Compensation.
tsn: Le gale, polelo ya semolao e a tlhabololwa ke Komiti ya nakwana go tlhabolola Karolo 25 ya Molaotheo go letla tlhakolothoto ya lefatshe kwa ntle ga tuelo.
mt0: <pad> However, the legal language has been developed by the Interim Committee to amend Article 25 of the Constitution to allow the development of land without charge.</s>

en: The Section 25 amendment is currently being done through the Constitution’s 18th Amendment Bill.
tsn: Tlhabololo ya Karolo 25 ga jaana e dirwa ka tsamaiso ya Molaotheo wa Molaotlhomo o o Tlhabolotsweng wa bo 18.
mt0: <pad> The amendment of Article 25 is now underway through the process of the Revised Constitutional Convention.</s>

en: This means it is the 18th time that the South African Constitution is being amended.
tsn: Se se kaya gore ke lekgetlo la bo18 Molaotheo wa Aforikaborwa o o tlhabololwa.
mt0: <pad> This means that the South African Constitution is being amended for the 18th time.</s>

en: Additional reporting by Mercedes Besent
tsn: Tlaleletso ya pego ka Mercedes Besent.
mt0: <pad> Mercedes Benz Extended warranty</s>

en: The newly-elected African National Congress (ANC) Free State Interim Provincial Committee (IPC)is expected to outline its plan of action on Thursday.
tsn: Leloko le le ntšhwa la African National Congress (ANC) la Komiti ya Porofense ya Foreisetata (IPC) le tshwanetse go thadisa leano la lona la tiro ka Labone.
mt0: <pad> The new members of the African National Congress (ANC) of the Provincial Committee of Eastern Province (IPC) are to adopt their work plan on Thursday.</s>

en: The structure, which was elected in May, is set to address the media later on Thursday morning.
tsn: Setlamo se, se se tlhophilweng ka Motsheganong, se ya go bua le babegakgang moragonyana mo mosong wa Labone.
mt0: <pad> The committee, which was elected in March, will speak to the press later on Thursday morning.</s>

en: The partys Tshidiso Nkgwedi says the outcome of the first IPC meeting held recently will be the focus.
tsn: Leloko la mokgatlho Tshidiso Nkgwedi  a re poelo ya ntlha ya kopano ya IPC e e neng e tshwerwe bošheng jaana e tla nna yona e e lebelelwang.
mt0: <pad> The IPC's first meeting will be the one that will be expected, according to a member of the organisation Tshidiso Nkgwedi.</s>

en: The structure, which saw suspended Secretary-General Ace Magashules opponent who is the former Economic Development MEC, Mxolisi Dukwana, being appointed as the Convener and Premier Sisi Ntombela, as his deputy, is set to see the province to an elective conference.
tsn: Setlamo se se boneng motho yo o kgatlhnong le kgaotso ya Mokwaledi-Kakaretso Ace Magashule yo e leng MEC ya Tlhabololo ya Ikonomi, Mxolisi Dukwana, a thapiwa jaaka Moamogedi mme Tonakgolo Sisi Ntombela, jaaka Motlatsa wa gagwe, se dirile go bona porofense e le mo khonferense ya go tlhopha.
mt0: <pad> The organisation which saw the appointment of a person who was critical of the resignation of Chief Executive Ace Magashule, the MEC for Economic Development, Mxolisi Dukwana, as its chairman and the Governor Sifiso Ndlela, as his deputy, has made the province a conference of elective elections.</s>

en: The structure was established after disgruntled party members won a Supreme Court of Appeal bid which saw the Provincial Executive Committee being declared illegitimate and unconstitutional.
tsn: Setlamo se tlhamilweng morago ga dikgogakgogano tsa maloko a lekoko a fenya Kgotlatshekelokgolo ya Boikuelo e e boneng Komiti ya Khuduthamaga ya Porofense e se mo molaong e bile e sa tsamaye ka molaotheong.
mt0: <pad> The organization formed after the disagreements of the opposition members won the High Court of Appeal which found the Provisional Legislative Committee unlawful and unconstitutional.</s>

en: Aggrieved Free State ANC members welcome SCA judgment.
tsn: Maloko a a galefileng a Foreisetata a ANC a amogela katlholo ya SCA
mt0: <pad> The angry ANC executive members accepted the decision of the Supreme Court.</s>

en: Several ANC branches in Mahikeng pledge support for Magashule.
tsn: Makala a le mmalwa a ANC kwa Mahikeng a ikana go tshegetsa Magashule.
mt0: <pad> Several ANC members in Mahikeng have refused to support Magashule.</s>

en: ANC members from 35 branches of the Mahikeng sub-region in the North West have condemned the immediate temporary suspension of Secretary-General Ace Magashule from the party.
tsn: Maloko a ANC go tswa mo makaleng a le 35 a karolwana ya kwa Mafikeng ko Bokone Bophirima a kgalemile go beelwa thoko ga nakwana ga Mokwaledi-Kakaretso, Ace Magashule mo lekokong.
mt0: <pad> Members of the ANC from 35 branches of the Mafeking district in North West have condemned the temporary resignation of the General Secretary, Ace Magashule.</s>

en: His suspension was effective from 3 May.
tsn: Kemiso ya nakwana ya gagwe e simolotse ka di 3 Motsheganong.
mt0: <pad> His temporary suspension began on March 3.</s>

en: Magashule is currently out on bail charged with corruption, fraud, and money laundering related to the Free State asbestos tender that was issued during his tenure as the provinces premier.
tsn: Magashule o tswile ka beili mme o lebaganeng ditatofatso tsa tsietso, tlolomolao, le go adimisana ka madi mo go seng mo molaong a a amananang le dithendara mo Foreisetata tse di ntshitsweng ka nako ya paka ya gagwe jaaka Tonakgolo ya Diporofense.
mt0: <pad> Magashule has appeared in court and denied fraud, corruption and wrongdoing related to the Florida tenders awarded during his time as Governor of the Provincial Executive.</s>

en: ANC members in the Mahikeng sub-region converged just after the news that Magashule had been suspended.
tsn: Maloko a ANC kwa karolwaneng ya kgaolo kwa Mahikeng a kopane, fela morago ga dikgang tsa gore Magashule o emisitswe.
mt0: <pad> Members of the ANC in the provincial committee in Mahikeng met, just after reports that Magashule had been sacked.</s>

en: Members have vowed to support Magashule through thick and thin.
tsn: Maloko a ikantse go tshegetsa Magashule mo bontleng le mo bosuleng.
mt0: <pad> The brothers promised to support the boys in both good and bad times.</s>

en: A youth league leader in the Ngaka Modiri Molema region, Koketso Moiloa, has blamed the ANC President for Magashules suspension.
tsn: Moeteledipele wa bašwa mo Mmasepaleng wa Kgaolo ya Modiri Molema, Koketso Moiloa, o bona moporesidente wa ANC molato ka ga kemiso ya Magashule.
mt0: <pad> The youth leader of the Modiri Molema District Council, Koketso Moiloa, has accused the ANC president of failing to provide a proper education system.</s>

en: Herman Mashabas political party, ActionSA has accused the Electoral Commission of South Africa (IEC) of soliciting donations for political parties through the Multi-Party Democracy Fund.
tsn: Lekoko la sepolotiki la ga Herman Mashaba, ActionSA le latofaditse Khomišene ya Ditlhopho ya Aforikaborwa (IEC)  ka go kopa dimpho go makoko a sepolotiki ka tsamaiso ya Multi-Party Democracy Fund.
mt0: <pad> The Herman Mashaba political party, ActionSA has accused the South African Electoral Commission (IEC) of asking for donations from political parties through the Multi-Party Democracy Fund.</s>

en: The Fund was established in terms of the Political Party Funding Act, which came into effect in April this year.
tsn: Letlole letlhomilwe go ya ka Molao wa tlamelo ka Matlole a Lekoko la Sepolotiki, e e tsentsweng tirisong ka Moranang monongwaga.
mt0: <pad> The fund was established under the Political Party Funding Act, which came into force in March this year.</s>

en: Its aimed at raising and distributing funds donated from the private sector to represented political parties.
tsn: Yona e ikaeletse go godisa le go ntsha madi a a abilweng go tswa go lekala la poraefete go emela makoko a sepolotiki.
mt0: <pad> It was intended to increase and extract money from the private sector to represent political parties.</s>

en: Just two months after its implementation, the Multi-Party Democracy Fund is under scrutiny.
tsn: Fela dikgwedi di le pedi morago ga tsenyotirisong ya yona, Multi-Party Democracy Fund e ka fa tlase ga letlole la tlhatlhobo.
mt0: <pad> Just two months after its introduction, the Multi-Party Democracy Fund is under scrutiny by the independent review panel.</s>

en: ActionSA claims that the IEC is in violation of its Constitutional obligations with regards to the fund.
tsn: ActionSA e tlhalosa gore IEC e gataka ditlamelo tsa molaotheo malebana le letlole le.
mt0: <pad> ActionSA claims that the IEC violates the provisions of the constitution regarding the fund.</s>

en: It accuses the commission of actively raising funds for the fourteen political parties in the National Assembly and excluding political parties like ActionSA, that can only be represented after the 2024 national elections.
tsn: E latofatsa khomišene ka go tlhola e koleka madi a go direla makoko  a sepolotiki a le lesomenne ka mo Kokoanong ya Bosetšhaba mme e sa akaretse makoko a sepolotiki a a jaaka ActionSA, e ka nnang le kemedi morago ga ditlhopho tsa bosetšhaba tsa 2024.
mt0: <pad> It accuses the commission of spending too much money on eighteen political parties in the National Assembly without including political parties like ActionSA, which could have a representative after the 2024 national elections.</s>

en: ActionSA has written to the IEC CEO Sy Mamabolo and Deputy CEO Masego Sheburi to demand that the IECs fundraising for the multi-party democracy fund be ceased immediately.
tsn: ActionSA e kwaletse moeteledipele wa IEC, Sy Mamabolo le Motlatsa Modulasetulo Masego Sheburi  gore kgobokanyo ya matlole ya IEC go Multi-Party Democracy e emiswe ka bonako.
mt0: <pad> ActionSA has written to the IEC leader, Sy Mamabolo and the Deputy Chairperson Masego Sheburi to demand that the IEC's fundraising for Multi-Party Democracy be stopped immediately.</s>

en: The IEC made the startling confession that it has been actively soliciting funds for the 14 political parties that are represented in the National Assembly, who already received billions in public funding every year from taxpayers.
tsn: IEC dirile boipobolo jwa gore e ne e le matlhagatlhaga go kopa matlole go makoko a sepolotiki a le 14 a a emetsweng mo Kokoanong Bosetšhaba,ao a setseng a amogetse dibilione mo kolekong ya matlole phatlalatsa ngwaga le ngwaga go tswa go baduedi ba lekgetho.
mt0: <pad> The IEC made a boast that it was very active in seeking funding from the 14 political parties represented in the National Conference, which have already received billions of dollars in public funding every year from taxpayers.</s>

en: It is intolerable that the IEC activities perpetuate the status quo in politics especially when South Africans are being failed so fundamentally, says ActionSA spokesperson Lerato Ngobeni.
tsn: Ga go itshokelwe gore ditiro tsa IEC di tsweletse maemo a ga jaana mo dipolotiking segolo fa Maaforikaborwa a retelelwa ke go dira jalo, go bua mmueledi wa ActionSA Lerato Ngobeni.
mt0: <pad> It is unbelievable that the IEC's activities will continue to support current political conditions especially when South Africans have failed to do so, said ActionSA spokesman Lerato Ngobeni.</s>

en: Herman Mashabas ActionSA accuses IEC of soliciting donations for political parties
tsn: Herman Mashaba wa ActionSA o latofatsa IEC ka go kopa dimpho go makoko a sepolotiki
mt0: <pad> Herman Mashaba of ActionSA accuses the IEC of asking for bribes from political parties.</s>

en: Earlier this year, the IEC indicated that it was taking measures to promote the Fund.
tsn: Mo tshimologong ya ngwaga, IEC e supile gore e ne e tsaya dikgato tsa go tsweletsa Letlole.
mt0: <pad> In the early part of this year, the IEC indicated that it had taken measures to revitalise the Fund.</s>

en: The Fund is critical to combat corruption, by requiring political parties and donors to be transparent.
tsn: Letlole le ka fedisa tlolomolao ka go gapeletsa makoko a sepolotiki le ba ba thusang ka madi go nna mo pepeneneng.
mt0: <pad> The fund can end corruption by forcing political parties and their financiers to be transparent.</s>

en: Democracy is expensive and the fiscus alone cannot provide complete financial support to political parties especially under the current severe fiscal constraints.
tsn: Puso ya temokerasi e a tura mme le lefapha la matlole le le nosi le ka se kgone go tlamela ka tshegetso ya matlole go makoko a sepolotiki, segolobogolo ka fa tlase ga maemo feteletseng.
mt0: <pad> The government of democracy is expensive and even the finance ministry cannot provide financial support to political parties, especially under extreme conditions.</s>

en: To ensure we continue to enjoy a vibrant, thriving and robust multiparty democracy we hope that this Fund will provide an easy and Hands off channel through which corporate entities, individuals and other organisations can contribute funds to parties without having to engage directly with them or needing to declare these separately, says IEC vice-chairperson Janet Love.
tsn: Go netefatsa gore re tswelela ka go itumelela matlhagatlhaga, boitumelo le tshegetso e e maatla ya makokomantsi re solofela gore letlole leno le tlaa tlamela ka bonolo le go bula diatla gore ditlamo tsa kgwebo, batho le mekgatlho e mengwe e ka latlhela matlole go makoko a mangwe ntle le go nna le seabe ka tlhamalalo le bona kgotsa go  leka go itlhalosa, go bua Motlatsamodulasetulo wa IEC Janet Lerato.
mt0: <pad> To ensure that we continue to enjoy the excitement, pride and strong support of our communities we hope this fund will be easy to provide and open the door for business organizations, individuals and other organizations to donate money to other communities without direct involvement or attempting to define, said IEC Vice-Chair Janet Love.</s>

en: The party has since written to the commissions CEO and Deputy CEO, demanding that the fund ceases with immediate effect and that money deposited be returned to the donors.
tsn: Lekoko le kwaletse CEO ya dikhomišhene le Motlatsa Modulasetulo wa CEO, le batla gore letlole le emiswe ka bonako le gore go madi a a rometsweng a busediwe beng ba ona.
mt0: <pad> The committee wrote to the CEO of the commissions and the Deputy CEO of the commission, demanding that the fund be stopped immediately and that the money sent back to its owners.</s>

en: ActionSA has given the IEC until this Friday to respond to their demands or else they will take the matter to court.
tsn: ActionSA e neetse IEC go fitlha ka Labotlhano ono, go tsibogela ditlhokego tsa bona, e seng jalo ba tlaa isa kgang e kwa kgotlatshekelo.
mt0: <pad> ActionSA has given the IEC until Friday to respond to their demands, otherwise they will take the matter to court.</s>

en: Meanwhile, the commission is mum on the matter and says it will comment at a later stage.
tsn: Gavjaana, Khomišhene e sa ntse e eme tlhogo ka ga kgang mme e  tlaa tshwaela mo nakong e e tlang.
mt0: <pad> The Commission is still taking its stand on the matter and will act in the near future.</s>

en: President Cyril Ramaphosa says hes dealing with allegations around Health Minister Dr Zweli Mkhize and the irregular R150 million Digital Vibes contract.
tsn: Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa a re o tshwaragane le ditatofatso malebana le Ngaka Zweli Mkhize, Tona ya Boitekanelo le kontaraka e e sa tlhomamang ya dimilione di le R150.
mt0: <pad> President Cyril Ramaphosa has said he is being investigated by the inquiry into the alleged fraud of Health Minister Zweli Mkhize and a suspected R150 million contract.</s>

en: President Ramaphosa was presenting the Presidencys budget vote in Parliament:
tsn: Moporesidente Ramaphosa o ne a neela puo kwa boutung ya  Tekanyetsokabo ya poresedente  kwa Palamenteng:
mt0: <pad> President Ramaphosa spoke at the vote of trust by the president in the House of Commons.</s>

en: He says the allegations are serious and need to be investigated thoroughly by law enforcement agencies.
tsn: A re ditatofatso tse di masisi e bile di tshwanetse go batlisisiwa ka botlalo ke ditheo tsa tiragatso ya molao.
mt0: <pad> He said these allegations are serious and should be investigated thoroughly by the law enforcement agencies.</s>

en: President Ramaphosa says due process will be followed once the investigations are finalised.
tsn: Moporesidente Ramaphosa a re ditsamaiso di latelwa fa thulaganyo ya dipatlisiso e konoseditswe.
mt0: <pad> President Ramaphosa said the procedures were followed and an investigation was launched.</s>

en: Claims of tender irregularities at Health Department serious test for combating corruption
tsn: Ditatofatso tsa dithendara tse di sa tlhomamang kwa Lefapheng la Boitekanelo di masisi e bile ke teko ya go lwantsha bonweenwee.
mt0: <pad> The allegations of unlawful tenders in the Health Department are serious and a test of anti-corruption.</s>

en: The Executive Secretary at the Council for the Advancement of the South African Constitution, Lawson Naidoo says the claims of tender irregularities in the Health Department pose a serious test of the states commitment to combating corruption.
tsn: Mokwaledimogolo wa kwa khanseleng ya Tsweletso ya Molaotheo wa Aforikaborwa, Lawson Naidoo o tlhalosa gore ditatofatso tsa dithendara  tse di tlhokang boikanyego mo Lefapheng la Boitekanelo ke teko e e masisi ya go lwantsha bonweenwee.
mt0: <pad> The Chief Whip of the South African Legislative Assembly, Lawson Naidoo, has described the allegations of tenders in the Health Sector as a serious test to fight corruption.</s>

en: Naidoo says the matter is a very strong signal to the South African public.
tsn: Naidoo a re kgang e ke letshwao tota  le  le lemosang setšhaba sa Aforikaborwa.
mt0: <pad> Naidoo said the killing was a "very serious signal to the South African people."</s>

en: This is a very strong signal to the South African public that this is a serious matter.
tsn: Se ke go letshwao tota go setšhaba sa Aforika Borwa ka bophara gore kgang e e masisi.
mt0: <pad> This is a very clear signal to the whole South African community that this matter is serious.</s>

en: The issue of the integrity of the state, how serious they are about fighting corruption.
tsn: Ntlha ya boineelo jwa puso, ba ikemeseditse go le kana kang go lwantsha bonweenwee.
mt0: <pad> According to the commitment of the government, how much is committed to combating corruption?</s>

en: We are going to get a report from the Deputy Chief Justice in three months time outlining how we deal with state capture.
tsn: Re tlile go amogela raporoto go tswa go Motlatsa Moatlhodimogolo mo dikgweding tse tharo e e tlhalosang ka moo re tla samaganang le puso.
mt0: <pad> We will receive a report from the Deputy Chief Justice in three months that will explain how we will deal with the government.</s>

en: And we are only dealing with issues when they are staring at us like this.
tsn: Mme re ya go samagana le mathata fa ba ntse ba re tlhomile matlho jaana.
mt0: <pad> But how can we deal with problems when they're watching us like this?</s>

en: Is there any hope that the recommendations of the Zondo Commission will actually be before the court of law?
tsn: A go na le tsholofelo ya gore dikatlanegiso tsa Khomišhene ya ga Zondo di tlaa tshwarwa pele ga kgotlatshekelo ya molao?.
mt0: <pad> Is there hope that the Zondo Commission's findings will be brought before the court of law?</s>

en: Pressure from DA
tsn: Kgatelelo e e tswang kwa DA.
mt0: <pad> The pressure from the DA</s>

en: Pressure is mounting from the Democratic Alliance (DA) and others for Mkhize to step down or be removed by President Ramaphosa.
tsn: Kgatelelo e a oketsega go tswa go Democratic Alliance (DA) le ba bangwe gore Mkhize a role tiro kgotsa a tloswe ke Moporesitente Ramaphosa.
mt0: <pad> There is increasing pressure from the Democratic Alliance (DA) and others for Mkhize to resign or be removed by President Ramaphosa.</s>

en: Mkhize has said that an investigation into allegations over irregular multi-million rand contracts by his department has found that its dealings with communications company, Digital Vibes, were irregular.
tsn: Mkhize o rile dipatlisiso mo ditatofatsong tsa dikontaraka tsa  dimilione tsa diranta tsa Lefapha la gagwe di fitlhetse gore merero le setlamo sa ditlhaeletsano, Digital  Vibes, di ne di sa tlhomama.
mt0: <pad> Mkhize said a probe into the multimillion-dollar contracts of his department found that the plans and objectives of the media company, Digital Vibes, were not consistent.</s>

en: Mkhize denies any involvement
tsn: Mkhize o ganela gore o nnile le seabe
mt0: <pad> Mkhize denies any involvement in the murder of Mbeki.</s>

en: Mkhize has denied any involvement in the awarding of an irregular multi-million-rand contract by his department.
tsn: Mkhize o ganela gore o nnile le seabe mo go neeleng ka konteraka e e sa tlhomamang ya dimilione tsa diranta ke Lefapha la gagwe.
mt0: <pad> Mkhize denies involvement in the award of a $300 million unregulated contract by his department.</s>

en: This after a Special Investigating Unit probe found that the Health Departments dealings with communications company, Digital Vibes, were irregular.
tsn: Se ke morago ga Yuniti e e Kgethegileng ya Dipatlisiso e  fitlhela gore tirisano magarenga ga lafapha la Boitekanelo le setlamo sa ditlhaeletsano,Digital Vibes, e ne e sa sa tlhomamang.
mt0: <pad> This is after the Special Investigation Unit found that the collaboration between the Department of Health and the media company, Digital Vibes, was unsustainable.</s>

en: It follows newspaper reports that the Department had paid Digital Vibes R150-million for services related to the National Health Insurance and the governments response to the COVID-19 pandemic.
tsn: Se se latelang raporoto ya gore Lefapha le duetse Digital Vibes dimilione di le 150 go dira ditirelo tse di amanang le inšhoranse boitekanelo ya Bosetšhaba le tsibogelo ya dipuso  go leroborobo la covid-19.
mt0: <pad> This follows a report that the Department paid Digital Vibes 150 million dollars to provide services related to insurance, public health and government response to the coronavirus pandemic.</s>

en: Mkhizes briefing on Digital Vibes issue:
tsn: Puisano ya Mkhizes ka ntlha ya Digital vibes:
mt0: <pad> The conversation with Mkhizes about Digital vibes</s>

en: Mkhize says the monies paid to Digital Vibes were found to be fruitless and wasteful expenditure.
tsn: Mkhize a re madi a a duetsweng Digital Vibes a bonwe a sena mosola e bile e le tshenyo ya madi.
mt0: <pad> Mkhize said the money paid to Digital Vibes was a waste of money and a waste of time.</s>

en: The much-awaited case of the ANCs suspended Secretary-General, Ace Magashule is expected to be heard before the end of June.
tsn: Kgetse e e leng kgale e emetswe ya ga Mokwaledi-Kakaretso wa ANC, ACE Magashule yo o neng a emisitswe nakwana e solofelwa go reediwa pele kgwedi ya Seetebosigo e ya kwa bokhutlong.
mt0: <pad> The long-delayed suspension of ANC General Secretary, Ace Magashule, is expected to be heard before the end of September.</s>

en: A full bench of the High Court is expected to hear the matter.
tsn: Kgotlatshekelo e e kwa godimo e solofetswe go reetsa kgang.
mt0: <pad> The highest court is scheduled to hear the case.</s>

en: Magashule was suspended after he refused to step aside in accordance with his party’s resolutions.
tsn: Magashule o emisitswe nakwana morago ga go gana go emela thoko ka maitlamo a tharabololo ya lekoko.
mt0: <pad> Magashule was suspended briefly after he refused to stand by his commitment to the fight against the disease.</s>

en: In conversation with suspended ANC Secretary-General Ace Magashule:
tsn: Puisano le Mokwaledi-Kakaretso wa ANC o a emisitsweng nakwana,  ACE Magashule:
mt0: <pad> Interview with the interim ANC Secretary General, Ace Magashule</s>

en: The National Executive Committee had ordered him to publicly apologise to ANC branches after he wrote a suspension letter to party President Cyril Ramaphosa, but he refused and instead took the matter to court.
tsn: Komiti ya Khuduthamaga ya Bosetšhaba e mo laetse gore a kope maitshwarelo phatlalatsa go dikgaolo tsa ANC  morago ga go kwalela Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa lekwalo la kemiso, fela o ile a gana mme a tsweletsa kgang e kwa kgotlatshekelo.
mt0: <pad> National Executive Committee ordered him to apologize publicly to the ANC regions after writing a resignation letter to President Cyril Ramaphosa, but he refused and took the matter to court.</s>

en: ANC National Working Committee to discuss suspended Ace Magashule’s defiance.
tsn: Komiti ya go Dira ya Bosetšhaba ya ANC e ya go buisana ka Ikgatholosomolao ya ga ACE Magashule.
mt0: <pad> The National Executive Committee of the ANC will discuss the Constitution of ACE Magashule on Tuesday.</s>

en: Magashule has sought the services of Senior Council, Advocate Dali Mpofu.
tsn: Magashule o kopile tirelo ya ga Khansele yo Mogolo, Mmueledi Dali Mpofu.
mt0: <pad> Magashule called on the services of the Chief Justice, Dali Mpofu.</s>

en: He wants his suspension to be nullified.
tsn: O batla gore kemiso ya gagwe e tloswe.
mt0: <pad> He wants his appointment to be dropped.</s>

en: Magashules behaviour unprecedented
tsn: Maitsholo a ga Magashule ga a tlhaloganyesege
mt0: <pad> The behavior of the elderly is not understandable.</s>

en: Last week, Ramaphosa described Magashules conduct as both shocking and unprecedented.
tsn: Mo bekeng e e fetileng, Ramaphosa o tlhalositse fa maitsholo a ga Magashule a tshosa e bile a sa tlhaloganyesege.
mt0: <pad> Last week, Ramaphosa described Magashule's behavior as "shocking and unacceptable."</s>

en: ANC spokesperson Pule Mabe said the constitution of the party has been put to the test.
tsn: Mmueledi wa ANC Pule Mabe o rile molaotheo wa lekoko o a lekolwa.
mt0: <pad> The ANC spokesman, Ms. Mabe, said the constitution of the party was under review.</s>

en: The party is certainly not in crisis.
tsn: Lekoko ga le mo mathateng.
mt0: <pad> The lion is not in trouble.</s>

en: Unfortunately, the constitution of the ANC has been taken on trial.
tsn: Ka bomadimabe, Molaotheo wa ANC o isitswe mo tshekong.
mt0: <pad> Unfortunately, the ANC constitution has been taken to court.</s>

en: The party has already issued a statement stating that it will be opposing the application by the Secretary-General.
tsn: Lekoko le setse le rebotswe polelo e e tlhalosang gore le tlaa nna le kganetsong ya kopo ya ga Mokwaledikakaretso.
mt0: <pad> The Ministry of Health has already issued a statement that it will not be allowed to respond to the request of the Press Secretary.</s>

en: But when courts are then approached in the manner that they have been approached, the ANC ought to act to protect and defend its own constitution and also to protect and defend its own decisions.
tsn: Fela fa dikgotlatshekelo di latelelwa ka mokgwa o di lateletsweng ka ona, ANC e tshwanetse go itshireletsa le go sireletsa Molaotheo wa yona, gape le go sireletsa le go femela ditshwetso tsa yona.
mt0: <pad> Just as the courts are followed in the same way, the ANC must defend and protect its constitution, as well as defend and enforce its decisions.</s>

en: Pule Mabe speaks on Magashules court action and conduct of some ANC senior members at Zuma’s trial:
tsn: Pule Mabe o bua ka tshwetso ya kgotlatshekelo ya ga Magashule le boitshwaro a maloko a mangwe a magolo a ANC kwa tshekong ya ga Zuma.
mt0: <pad> Mr Mabe spoke about the court ruling by Magashule and the behavior of other senior ANC members in the Zuma trial.</s>

en: Mpofu has a right to discharge his professional duties
tsn: Mpofu o na le tshwanelo ya go dira ditiro tsa gagwe ka tsela ya seporofešhenale
mt0: <pad> The poor has the duty to do his work in a professional way.</s>

en: Meanwhile, some have questioned Mpofus decision to represent both Magashule and former President Jacob Zuma in his corruption case.
tsn: Re sa ntse re le foo, bangwe ba botsoloditse tshwetso ya ga Mpofu ya go emela Magashule le Moporesitente Jacob Zuma mo kgetseng ya gagwe ya bonweenwee.
mt0: <pad> While we were there, some questioned the decision of Mbeki to represent Magashule and President Jacob Zuma in his graft case.</s>

en: EFF leader Julius Malema says Mpofu has a right to discharge his professional duties, without fear and the party will not interfere in his private responsibilities.
tsn: Moeteledipele wa EFF Julius Malema a re Mpofu o na le tshwanelo ya go dira ditiro tsa gagwe ka tsela ya seporofešenale, kwa ntle ga poifo mme lekoko le ka se ke la itshunya-tshunya  mo tirong ya gagwe ya poraefete.
mt0: <pad> The leader of the EFF Julius Malema said that poor people have the right to do their work professionally, without fear and no one can meddle in their private business.</s>

en: Any doctor of the EFF can treat Jacob Zuma when hes sick; they have taken a professional oath and we should allow that.
tsn: Ngaka nngwe le nngwe ya EFF e ka tlhatlhoba Jacob Zuma fa a lwala; Ba tsere maikano a tiro mme re tshwanetse go letlelela seo.
mt0: <pad> Every EFF doctor can check Jacob Zuma if he is ill; they have taken their oaths and we must allow that.</s>

en: We cant say to a doctor, when Zuma is sick, you cant treat him; they will be contravening their legal oath.
tsn: Re ka se reya ngaka ra re, fa Zuma a lwala, o ka se kgone go mo tlhatlhoba, o  tlaa bo a nna kgatlhanong le maikano a gagwe.
mt0: <pad> We can't tell a doctor that if Zuma is ill, he can't treat him, it would be against his wishes.</s>

en: The same applies to legal counsel.
tsn: Go ntse fela jalo le ka kgakololo ya semolao.
mt0: <pad> It's the same with legal advice.</s>

en: We must allow them to do their work without any political interference; we must respect their professional responsibilities.
tsn: Re tshwanetse go ba letla go dira tiro ya bona kwa ntle ga kgoreletso ya sepolotiki; Re tshwanetse go tlotla maikarabelo a bona a seporofešenale.
mt0: <pad> We must allow them to do their work without political censorship; We must respect their professional responsibilities.</s>

en: We cant say a charted accountant of the EFF cant audit the books of the ANC; that would be encroaching them in their personal and professional space.
tsn: Re ka seke ra re mmalamatlotlo wa EFF a ka se kgone go runa dibuka tsa ANC; seo e tlaa nna kgatelelo mo go bone ka namana le ka tsela ya seporofešenale.
mt0: <pad> We can't say that the EFF treasurer can't steal the ANC's books; that will put pressure on them personally and professionally.</s>

en: We are going to end up telling people who to date and who not to date.
tsn: Re tla feleletsa re bolelela batho gore ba ratane le bomang mme ba se ke ba ratana le bo mang.
mt0: <pad> We're going to end up telling people who to love and who not to love.</s>

en: Let people conduct their professional jobs.
tsn: Tlogelang batho ba dire ditiro tsa bona tsa seporofešenale
mt0: <pad> Let people do their job.</s>

en: When it comes to politics, Dali conducts his work without fear; when it comes to his profession, he doesnt consult us.
tsn: Fa go tla mo go tsa sepolotiking, Dali a dira tiro ya gagwe kwa ntle ga poifo; fa go tla mo tirong ya gagwe ya seporefešenale, ga a kope tetla mo go rona.
mt0: <pad> In politics, Dali did his work without fear; in his professional work, he didn't ask for our permission.</s>

en: EFF says it has no say in who Adv.
tsn: EFF e re ga e na tshwaelo mo go reng mang ke  mmueledi.
mt0: <pad> The EFF says it has no influence on who is the lawyer.</s>

en: Dali Mpofu represents in court.
tsn: Dali Mpofu ke moemedi kwa kgotlatshekelo.
mt0: <pad> Dali Mpofu is a court representative.</s>

en: President Cyril Ramaphosa is currently presenting the budget allocation for his office.
tsn: Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa o tlhagisa tekanyetsokabo ya kantoro ya gagwe.
mt0: <pad> President Cyril Ramaphosa has announced the budget of his government.</s>

en: His budget vote takes place amid mounting pressure on him to fire Health Minister Zweli Mkhize as more allegations surface about the Digital Vibes tender.
tsn: Tekanyetsokabo ya gagwe e diragala ka nako e a leng ka fa tlase ga kgatelelo ya gore a leleke Zweli Mkhize, Tona ya Boitekanelo jaaka go ntse go tlhagelela ditatofatso tse dingwe ka ga thendara ya Digital Vibes.
mt0: <pad> His resignation comes while he is under pressure to remove Zweli Mkhize, Health Minister as new allegations emerge about the Digital Vibes tender.</s>

en: On Tuesday, some opposition political parties accused the African National Congress (ANC) in Parliament of asking soft questions to the executive and also raised concerns about the Disaster Management Act.
tsn: Ka Labobedi, makoko a mangwe a kganetso a sepolotiki a latofaditse African National Congress (ANC) kwa Palamenteng go botsa khuduthamaga dipotso tse di bonolo gape le go ntsha maikutlo a bona ka ga Molao wa Taolo ya Matlhotlhapelo.
mt0: <pad> On Tuesday, some political parties accused the African National Congress (ANC) in Parliament of asking government questions and expressing their views on the Emergency Control Act.</s>

en: They say Parliament has no say on lockdown regulations.
tsn: Ba rile Palamente ga e na puo mo melawanng ya kganelobatho.
mt0: <pad> They said the parliament had no say in the proposals for a constitutional reform.</s>

en: Others questioned the role that Parliament is playing in holding Mkhize to account for the Digital Vibes tender.
tsn: Bangwe ba boditse gore ke karolo efe e e tshamikiwang ke Palamente go netefatseng gore Mkhize o arabela di thendara tsa Digital Vibes
mt0: <pad> Some asked what part of the bill was passed by the Parliament to ensure that Mkhize responded to the Digital Vibes contracts.</s>

en: Political parties will debate the Presidencys budget vote and he will respond on Thursday.
tsn: Makoko a sepolotiki a tlaa ngangisana ka tekanyetsokabo ya moporesitente, mme ena o tla e arabela ka Labone.
mt0: <pad> The political parties will argue over the president's budget, and he will respond to it on Thursday.</s>

en: President Cyril Ramaphosa presents his offices budget in the National Assembly.
tsn: Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa o rola tekanyetsokabo ya dikantoro tsa gagwe mo Kokoanong ya Bosetšhaba
mt0: <pad> President Cyril Ramaphosa presented his budget to the National Conference.</s>

en: Health Minister Zweli Mkhize has denied any involvement in the awarding of an irregular multi-million-rand contract by his department.
tsn: Tona ya Boitekanelo Zweli Mkhize o ganetsane le go nna le seabe mo go neeleng konteraka ya dimilione-milione ke Lefapha la gagwe
mt0: <pad> The Health Minister Zweli Mkhize has refused to participate in the awarding of millions of dollars in contracts by his department.</s>

en: This after a Special Investigating Unit probe found that the Health Departments dealings with the communications company,Digital Vibes, were irregular.
tsn: Morago ga Yuniti e e Kgethegileng ya Bobatlisisi e fitlhetse gore dipuisano tsa Mafapha a Boitekanelo Setlamo sa Tlhaeletsano, Digital Vibes di ne di sa tlhomama.
mt0: <pad> After the Special Investigation Unit found that the Health Communications division of Digital Vibes was not being monitored,</s>

en: It follows newspaper reports that the department had paid Digital Vibes R150-million for services related to the National Health Insuranceand the governments response to the COVID-19 pandemic.
tsn: E latela raporoto ya lokwalodikgang ya gore lefapha le duetse Digital Vibes dimilione di le R150 tsa ditirelo tse di amaneng le inšhorense ya boitekanelo ya bosetšhaba le go tsibogela leroborobong la COVID-19 ga puso.
mt0: <pad> It follows a press report that the department paid Digital Vibes R150 million for services related to public health insurance and response to the government's COVID-19 response.</s>

en: President Ramaphosa awaits SIU report on Digital Vibes irregular tender allegations
tsn: Moporesidente Ramaphosa o emetse raporoto ya SIU ka ga ditatofatso tse di sa tlhomamang ka ga Digital Vibes
mt0: <pad> President Ramaphosa awaited the SIU report on unfounded allegations about Digital Vibes.</s>

en: President Cyril Ramaphosa is this afternoon presenting the budget allocation for his office in Parliament.
tsn: Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphos o tlaa tlhagisa tekanyetsokabo ya kantorong ya gagwe kwa Palamenteng gomipieno motshegare.
mt0: <pad> President Cyril Ramaphosa will present his budget to the Parliament on Wednesday afternoon.</s>

en: Below are the proceedings in Parliament.
tsn: Tse di latelang ke ditsamaiso tsa kwa Palamenteng.
mt0: <pad> The following are the procedures of the Parliament.</s>

en: The Democratic Alliance (DA) questioned the role of Parliament in holding Health Minister Dr Zweli Mkhize to account for allegations of irregularly awarding a contract to communications company Digital Vibes.
tsn: Democratic Alliance (DA) e botsoloditse karolo ya Palamente mo go latofatseng Ngaka Zweli Mkhize, Tona ya Boitekanelo go ikarabela mo ditatofatso tsa kabelo ya konteraka e e sa tlhomamang gosetlamo sa tlhaeletsano, Digital Vibes.
mt0: <pad> The Democratic Alliance (DA) has questioned the House of Commons in accusing Dr Zweli Mkhize, Health Minister of the allegation of the award of an unregulated contract to the media company Digital Vibes.</s>

en: Opposition parties have accused the African National Congress (ANC) members of Parliament of shielding the executive, this was revealed during the debate on the budget vote of Parliament.
tsn: Makoko a kganetso a latofaditsw maloko a palamente a African National Congress (ANC) ka go sireletsa Khuduthamaga, se se senotswe ka nako ya boutu ya motlotlo ya tekanyetsokabo ya Palamente.
mt0: <pad> The opposition parties accused the members of the African National Congress (ANC) of protecting the Executive, which was made clear during the debate on the constitutional bill in the House of Commons.</s>

en: The opposition parties say ANC MPs ask soft questions to ministers and their deputies, while some dont answer written questions.
tsn: mekgatlho ya kganetso ya re maloko a ANC a botsa ditona le batlatsi ba bona dipotso tse di bonolo, mme ba bangwe ga ba arabe dipotso tse di kwadilweng.
mt0: <pad> opposition groups say ANC members ask ministers and their representatives simple questions, and some did not answer the written questions.</s>

en: They have also raised concern about the Disaster Management Act saying Parliament has no say on lockdown regulations.
tsn: Ba tlhagisitse matshwenyego a bona ka ga Molao wa taolo ya matlhotlhapelo, gore Palamente ga e na puo mo melawaneng ya kganelobatho
mt0: <pad> They expressed concerns about the Emergency Management Act, that the Parliament has no say in the laws on anti-riot measures.</s>

en: DA MP Jacques Julius says, If only ANC members can also do their part in holding the executive to account.
tsn: Leloko la palamete la DA Jacques Julius a re, okare maloko a ANC le ona a ka tshameka karolo ya ona mo go rotloetseng Khuduthamaga go tsaya maikarabelo.
mt0: <pad> DA MP Jacques Julius said, however, ANC members could also play their part in urging the government to take responsibility.</s>

en: We can do our work with this budget a good starting point for them will be to ask more uncomfortable questions whether written or oral and stop sweetheart questions.
tsn: Re ka dira tiro ya rona ka tekanyetsokabo e. Ntlha e ntle e ba ka simololang ka yona ke gore bo botse dipotso tse di utlwalang, e ka nna tse di kwadilweng mo fatshe kgotsa tsa puo ya molomo. Ba emise go botsa dipotso tse di bokoa.
mt0: <pad> We can do our work at this pace. A good start is to ask clear questions, whether written or oral. Stop asking weaker questions.</s>

en: Alleged irregular contract between the health department & Digital Vibes:
tsn: Ditatofatso tsa kontaraka e e sa tlhomamang magareng ga Lefapha la Boitekanelo le Digital Vibes:
mt0: <pad> The complaints of unsettled contract between the Department of Health and Digital Vibes.</s>

en: Meanwhile, pressure is mounting on President Cyril Ramaphosa to fire Mkhize, as more allegations surface against the minister.
tsn: Re sa ntse re le foo, kgatelelo e kwa godimo mo go Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa go koba Mkhize, fa go nna ditatofatso tse di tswelelang kgatlhanong le Tona.
mt0: <pad> While we are still there, pressure is on President Cyril Ramaphosa to fire Mkhize, as the allegations continue against the Minister.</s>

en: Digital Vibes, a company which was awarded a contract to carry out work related to the National Health Insurance (NHI) programme and governments response to the COVID-19 pandemic reportedly paid for maintenance at a property that Mkhizes family Trust owns.
tsn: Digital vibes, e leng khampani e e abetsweng konteraka go dira tiro e e amanang le inšhorense ya bosetšhaba ya boitekanelo (NHI) le ditsibogelo tsa leroborobo la COVID-19, go begwa e duetswe go tlamela boagi jo e leng jwa terasele ya lelapa la ga Mkhize.
mt0: <pad> Digital vibes, a company awarded contracts to provide work related to the National Health Insurance (NHI) and COVID-19 response, is said to have been funded to provide the housing that is the family's terrace.</s>

en: The company is also alleged to have transferred R300 000 to All Out Trading, an entity in which Mkhizes son is the director.
tsn: Setlamo gape se latofadiwa ka go romela bokana ka R300 000 go ditswa kgwebong tsotlhe, setlamo se morwa Mkhize e leng Mokaedi wa sona.
mt0: <pad> The foundation is also accused of sending R300 000 to all the companies, the foundation where Mkhize's son is the CEO.</s>

en: SIUs probe into contract between Digital Vibes and the Health Department.
tsn: SIU e lebelela konteraka magareng ga Digital Vibes le Lefapha la Boitekanelo.
mt0: <pad> The SIU is reviewing a contract between Digital Vibes and the Department of Health.</s>

en: National Assembly Speaker Thandi Modise has reiterated that Pan African Parliament, based in Midrand, Johannesburg, is an organ of the African Union and therefore the rules of the organisation must be applied.
tsn: Kokoano Bosetšhaba Mmusakgotla Thandi Modise o gateletse gore Pan African Parliament,e e kwa Midrand, Johannesburg, ke setheo sa Kitlano sa African Union ka jalo, melao ya Setheo e tshwanetse go dirisiwa.
mt0: <pad> The National Assembly President Thandi Modise stressed that the Pan African Parliament, located in Midrand, Johannesburg, is a member of the African Union and therefore the laws of the Organisation should be used.</s>

en: The Pan African Parliament has been suspended after MPs again plunged the house into a third consecutive day of chaos.
tsn: Pan African Parliament e emisitswe morago ga gore maloko a palamente a bake tlhakatlhakano matsatsi a mararo a a latelanang.
mt0: <pad> The Pan African Parliament was suspended after members of the parliament caused a standoff for three days in a row.</s>

en: The members clashed over the electoral system with the Southern Caucus pushing for the change to rotational leadership similar to the African Union process, while the Eastern and Western caucuses are against it.
tsn: Maloko a tlhokile go nna le kutlwano ka ga tsamaiso ya ditlhopho le ditlhopha tsa Borwa di tlhotlheletsa go fetoga ga thulaganyong ya boeteledipele go tshwana le tsamaiso ya African Union, fa ditlhopha tsa Botlhaba le Bophirima di le kgatlhanong le se.
mt0: <pad> Members had to agree on the election system and the South sections pushed for a change to a presidential system similar to the African Union, while the West and East sections were opposed to this.</s>

en: Chaos at PAP today.
tsn: Tlhakatlhakano mo PAP gompieno.
mt0: <pad> Today's violence at the PAP</s>

en: Modise was delivering the budget vote of the National Assembly.
tsn: Modise o ne a neelana ka puo ya tekanyetsokabo ya Kokoano ya Bosetšhaba.
mt0: <pad> Modise gave his annual speech to the National Conference.</s>

en: She says South Africa is expecting PAP to follow rotational rules.
tsn: A re Aforikaborwa e solofetse PAP go latela melao.
mt0: <pad> South Africa has promised to implement the principles of the CPA in accordance with the law.</s>

en: We host the PAP as a country we have our members delegated to that house as members of that house we do and do need to take proper interest in the functioning of the PAP, specifically whatever goes wrong on the PAP floor.
tsn: Re amogela PAP jaaka naga, re na le maloko a rona a a re emetseng kwa setheong, re tlhoka go tsaya kgatlhego e e siameng ka ga tiro ya PAP, segolobogolo mo dilong tse di sa tsamaeng ka tsela kwa PAP.
mt0: <pad> We accept PAP as a country, we have our own members representing us in the organization, we need to take a proper interest in the work of PAP, especially in the areas that are not going well with PAP.</s>

en: SA gets the beating whether we are responsible or not and the truth is we have not played our role properly as a host and we are correcting that.
tsn: SA e dula e bonwa diphoso. Go sa kgatalasege gore are re molato kgotsa nnyaa, mme nnete ke gore ga re ise re tshameke karolo ya rona sentle jaaka baamogedi mme re baakanya seo.
mt0: <pad> SA is always criticized. Whether we are guilty or not, the truth is that we haven't done our part as hosts well and we're trying to fix it.</s>

en: ANC MP condemns chaos.
tsn: Maloko a Palamente a ANC a kgalema tlhakatlhakano.
mt0: <pad> ANC MPs deny violence.</s>

en: ANC MP, Bhekizizwe Radebe has condemned the chaos and disruptions
tsn: Leloko la palamente la ANC, Bhekizizwe Radebe o kgalema tlhakatlhakano le maparego.
mt0: <pad> ANC MP Bhekizizwe Radebe has condemned violence and protests.</s>

en: South Africa is the host of the PAP and it has representatives who are members of its Parliament.
tsn: Aforika Borwa ke motshwara-gae wa PAP, mme e na le baemedi ba e leng maloko a Palamente.
mt0: <pad> South Africa is the chairman of the PAP, and has representatives in the parliament.</s>

en: Radebe says the scenes from Midrand might result in the continent not being taken seriously.
tsn: Radebe a re ditiragalo go tswa kwa Midrand di ka dira gore kontinente e se ke ya tsewa tsia.
mt0: <pad> Radebe said that Midrand's events could lead to the continent not being taken seriously.</s>

en: What has happened there in the PAP was really disgusting and it must be condemned that such despicable behaviour can be shown throughout the whole world.
tsn: Se se diragetseng kwa PAP se ne se swabisa e le ruri, mme se tshwanetse go kgalengwa gore maitsholo a a ntseng jalo a ka bontshiwa mo lefatsheng ka bophara.
mt0: <pad> What happened in PAP was really disgraceful, and should be condemned so that such behavior cannot be shown around the world.</s>

en: How are the other regions in the world going to take us seriously if we can do this thing to each other?
tsn: Dikgaolo tse dingwe mo lefatsheng di tla re tsaya jang tsia fa re kgona go tshwarana jaana?
mt0: <pad> What will other parts of the world think of us if we can treat each other like this?</s>

en: Malema calls for AU intervention.
tsn: Malema a kopa tsereganyo ya AU.
mt0: <pad> Malema calls for AU support</s>

en: Economics Freedom Fighters (EFF) leader Julius Malema says the African Union needs to intervene in recent issues raised by the Pan African Parliament (PAP) at Midrand in Johannesburg.
tsn: Moeteledipele wa Economic Freedom Fighters (EFF) Julius Malema a re African Union e tlhoka go tsereganya mo dintlheng tse di tlhagisitsweng ga jaana ke Pan African Parliament (PAP) kwa Midrand, Johannesburg.
mt0: <pad> The leader of the Economic Freedom Fighters (EFF) Julius Malema said the African Union should take action on the issues raised by the Pan African Parliament (PAP) in Midrand, Johannesburg.</s>

en: Malema, who was at the session, has described the chaotic scenes as disappointing.
tsn: Malema, yo o neng a le teng kwa kopanong, o tlhalositse fa ditiragalo  di ne di swabisa.
mt0: <pad> Malema, who was present at the conference, described the incident as "disturbing".</s>

en: The debate is robust.
tsn: Ngangisano e, e maatla.
mt0: <pad> The debate is power.</s>

en: People have different views.
tsn: Batho ba na le dikakanyo tse di farologaneng.
mt0: <pad> People have different opinions.</s>

en: We have suspended the house to go and consult further on these matters.
tsn: Re emisitse kopano gore re ye go buisana ka dintlha tse go ya pele.
mt0: <pad> We ended the meeting to discuss the next steps.</s>

en: We hope there will be a solution and our proposed solution is to let someone from the AU come and intervene and facilitate the elections.
tsn: Re solofela gore go tlaa nna le  tharabololo mme  tshitshinyo ya rona ke gore go tlisiwe motho yo o tswang kwa AU go tla go tsereganya le go tsamaisa ditlhopho.
mt0: <pad> We hope that there will be a solution and our suggestion is that an AU official should be brought in to help with the coordination and implementation of the elections.</s>

en: There are two letters from the AU which our colleagues are refusing to adhere to and the dispute is with regard to those letters from the AU.
tsn: Go na le makwalo a mabedi a a tswang kwa AU a badiri-ka-rona ba ganang go a arabela le dikganetsano tse di amanang le makwalo a a tswang kwa AU.
mt0: <pad> There are two AU letters that our colleagues have refused to respond to and the controversy over AU letters.</s>

en: So if someone from the AU can come and give us direction, we all can comply.
tsn: Ka jalo fa motho yo mongwe yo o tswang kwa AU a ka tla go re kaela, rotlhe re ka kgona go dirisana.
mt0: <pad> So if someone from the AU comes to guide us, we can all work together.</s>

en: The African National Congress Womens League (ANCWL) says it is appalled by the incident of gender-based violence, which occurred at the Pan-African Parliament (PAP) on Monday.
tsn: African National Congress Women League (ANCWL) ya re e swabisitswe ke tiragalo ya tirisodikgoka e e ikaegileng ka bong, e e diragetseng kwa Pan-African Parliament (PAP) ka Mosupologo.
mt0: <pad> The African National Congress Women League (ANCWL) has expressed its dismay at the gender-based violence incident that occurred in the Pan-African Parliament (PAP) on Monday.</s>

en: Djibril War of Senegal was caught on camera kicking ANC MP, Pemmy Majodina, during a disagreement.
tsn: Djibril War wa kwa Senegal, o tlhageletse mo khamereng a raga leloko la palamente la ANC, Pemmy Majidina ka nako ya dikgogakgogano.
mt0: <pad> Djibril War of Senegal, appeared on the camera of ANC MP Pemmy Majidina during the protests.</s>

en: In a statement, ANCWL says, Cde Pemmy, has publicly provided a comprehensive account of the occurrence and that she was intervening to stop a physical fight which broke out between two male leaders, only to find herself assaulted and her dignity undermined in public.
tsn: Mo tlhagisong, ANCWL ya re, Cde Pemmy, o tlhalositse tiragalo eo mo phatlaletseng mme a re, o ne a leka go tsereganya le go emisa ntwa ya diatla e e neng e runtse magareng ga banna ba babedi ba baeteledipele, fela o iphitlhetse a setse a itewa le seriti sa gagwe se isiwa kwa tlase mo phatlalatseng.
mt0: <pad> An ANCWL statement said, Cde Pemmy, explained the incident in a press release and said he tried to mediate and stop the hand-fight between the two leaders, but found himself beaten and his reputation denigrated in the press.</s>

en: As the ANCWL we strongly condemn Djibrils actions and we are highly disappointed that a leader of his social standing could grossly violate a woman.
tsn: Jaaka ANCWL re kgala ditiro tsa ga Djibrils. mme re swabile thata gore moeteledipele wa seemo sa gagwe mo setšhabeng a ka gataka mosadi ka mokgwa o ntseng jalo.
mt0: <pad> As ANCWL we condemn the actions of Djibrils. and we are deeply saddened that a leader of his status could be so cruel towards a woman.</s>

en: ANCWL members will be picketing outside Pan-African Parliament over Majodinas assault.
tsn: Maloko a ANCWL a tla bo a eme kwa ntle ga Palamente ya Pan-African ka ntlha ya tlhaselo ya ga  Majodinas.
mt0: <pad> Members of ANCWL will stand outside the Pan-African Parliament because of the Majodinas attack.</s>

en: They are calling for PAP to suspend War.
tsn: Ba ikuela go PAP gore e emise ntwa.
mt0: <pad> They complained to the PAP that it had launched a war.</s>

en: Majodina had initially intended to open a case against the Senegalese delegate.
tsn: Majodina o ne a ikemiseditse go bula kgetse kgatlhanong le moemedi wa kwa Senegal.
mt0: <pad> Majodina was planning to file a lawsuit against the Senegalese ambassador.</s>

en: She, however, had a change of heart after War apologised.
tsn: Le gale, o fetotse maikutlo a gagwe morago ga gore War a ikopele maitshwarelo.
mt0: <pad> However, he changed his mind after War apologized.</s>

en: Senegalese PAP member apologises to Majodina.
tsn: Leloko la PAP la kwa Senegal le ikopela maitshwerelo mo go Majodina.
mt0: <pad> Senegalese member of the PAP asks for a ceasefire on prisoners</s>

en: The Democratic Alliance (DA) says, so far, 50 000 people have signed its petition against the proposed Firearms Control Amendment Bill.
tsn: Democratic Alliance  (DA) e re, go fitlha jaanong, batho ba le  50 000 ba saenile boikuelo kgatlhanong le Molaotlhomo o o Tlhabolotsweng wa Taolo ya Dithunya.
mt0: <pad> The Democratic Alliance (DA) says that, as of now, 50 000 people have signed a petition against the proposed Amended Drug Control Bill.</s>

en: The draft bill would  if it were to become law  prohibit the awarding of firearm licenses for self- defence purposes.
tsn: Kakanyetso ya Molao e ka, fa e ka dirwa molao, thibela go neelana ka laesense ya ditlhobolo mo mabakeng a go itshireletsa.
mt0: <pad> The proposed law could, if passed, prohibit the issuance of firearm permits in self-defense circumstances.</s>

en: It would also restrict the number of firearms individuals can own for sport and hunting.
tsn: Gape e tla fokotsa palo ya ditlhobolo tse motho a le mongwe a ka nnang le tsona. Tsa metshameko le go tsoma.
mt0: <pad> It will also reduce the number of guns a person can have. For sports and hunting.</s>

en: The DA says it strongly opposes the Bill and has called for more people to sign its petition.
tsn: DA e ganetsana le Molaotlhomo o mme e ikuela go batho ba le bantsi go saena boikuelo jwa bona.
mt0: <pad> DA opposes this law and urges as many people as possible to sign their protest.</s>

en: DA Spokesperson on Police, Andrew Whitfield, says a legal handgun is the last line of defence for millions of South Africans.
tsn: Mmueledi wa DA wa sepodisi, Andrew Whitfield, a re tlhobolo e nnye e e mo molaong  ke tsela e nngwe e Maaforikaborwa a ka itshireletsang ka yona.
mt0: <pad> DA police spokesman Andrew Whitfield said that the legalisation of small firearms is another way South Africans can protect themselves.</s>

en: The DA believes that the firearms control amendment bill is one of the most draconian pieces of legislation that weve seen in a very long time.
tsn: DA e dumela gore molaotlhomo o o tlhabolotsweng wa taolo ya ditlhobolo ke o mongwe wa dikarolo tse di setlhogo tsa peomolao e ba e itemogetseng yona mo nakong e telele.
mt0: <pad> DA believes that the proposed gun control bill is one of the most serious parts of the legislative process they have experienced in a long time.</s>

en: Specifically the bill intends to remove self-defence as a reason to own a firearm.
tsn: Totatota molaotlhomo o o ikaelela go tlosa iphemelo jaaka lebaka la go nna le tlhobolo.
mt0: <pad> The Constitution essentially seeks to remove the restrictions on carrying a gun as a reason for having a gun.</s>

en: The DA believes that in such a violent society like South Africa, this is completely irrational and unreasonable.
tsn: DA e dumela gore mo dikhuduegong tsa setšhaba jaaka mo Aforikaborwa, se ga se a tlhomama  e bile ga se utlwagale.
mt0: <pad> DA believes that in a social revolution like South Africa, this is not fair and not understandable.</s>

en: The DA is also concerned about the impact on the sport shooting fraternities as well as private security and the limitations of the bill will impose on them, explains Whitfield.
tsn: DA e tshwenyegile gape ka kamego ya ditlamo tsa metshameko wa go thuntsha gammogo le tshireletso ya poraefete le dikgoreletso tsa Molaotlhomo tse di latlhelwang go bona, go tlhalosa Whitfield.
mt0: <pad> DA is also concerned about the role of gun-running organizations and the loss of privacy and constitutional protections to them, Whitfield said.</s>

en: The Congress of the People (COPE) is also against the Bill and says it will mobilise other opposition parties against it.
tsn: Mokgatlho wa Congress of the People (COPE) le ona o kgatlhanong le Molao o mme o re o tla tlhotlheletsa e mengwe ya mekgatlho ya Kganetso go nna kgatlhanong le ona.
mt0: <pad> Congress of the People (COPE) is also against the bill and says it will encourage other opposition groups to oppose it.</s>

en: Party Spokesperson, Dennis Bloem, says all South Africans have the right to defend themselves.
tsn: Mmueledi wa lekoko, Dennis Bloem, a re Maaforikaborwa otlhe a na le tshwanelo ya go itshireletsa.
mt0: <pad> The spokesman for the disease, Dennis Bloem, said all South Africans have the responsibility to protect themselves.</s>

en: This amendment is disgraceful and completely madness.
tsn: Tlhabololo e, e tlhabisa ditlhong e bile ke ya botsenwa
mt0: <pad> This is very shameful and disgraceful.</s>

en: The bill does not make any sense to say that no firearm license may be issued for self-defence suppose.
tsn: Molaotlhomo ono ga o dire tlhaloganyo fa o re go seke ga neelanwa ka laesense ya tlhobolo ka maikaelelo a go iphemelo.
mt0: <pad> This bill does not make sense when it says that no permits can be issued for the purpose of self-defense.</s>

en: It is very clear that this government is not taking the lives of its citizens serious.
tsn: Go a bonagala gore puso e ga e tsaye matshelo a baagi ba yona tsia.
mt0: <pad> It is clear that this government does not take its people's lives seriously.</s>

en: Criminals with illegal firearms will terrorise law abiding citizens more than ever before, explains Bloem.
tsn: Dinokwane tse di nang le dithunya di tla tlhorisa baagi ba ba obamelang molao go feta pele ga fa, go tlhalosa Bloem.
mt0: <pad> The armed vehicles will make law-abiding citizens more anxious than ever before, said Bloem.</s>

en: Government says the proposed law will help reduce crime.
tsn: Puso ya re molao o o akantsweng o tla thusa go fokotsa bosenyi.
mt0: <pad> The government says the proposed law will help to reduce crime.</s>

en: Former African National Congress (ANC) President, Thabo Mbeki, says the party needs to guard against members who join the party to advance their selfish interests.
tsn: Moporesitente wa African National Congress (ANC) wa maloba, Thabo Mbeki are, mokgatlho o tshwanetse go ela tlhoko maloko a a tsenelang lekoko ka maikaelelo a go tsweletsa dikgatlhego tsa bona tsa bopelotshetlha.
mt0: <pad> The former president of the African National Congress (ANC), Thabo Mbeki, said the organisation should be vigilant towards members who join the party with the intention of pursuing their own selfish interests.</s>

en: He was speaking at the ANCs Provincial Executive Council (PEC) meeting in the Eastern Cape.
tsn: O ne a bua kwa kopanong ya ANC ya Porofense ya Khansele ya Khuduthamaga (PEC) kwa Kapa Botlhaba.
mt0: <pad> He spoke at the ANC's National Executive Committee (NEC) meeting in East Cape on Tuesday.</s>

en: The three-day ANC PEC meeting focused on the renewal of the party.
tsn: Kopano ya malatsi a le mararo ya ANC PEC e ne e tsepame mo go ntšhwafatseng lekoko.
mt0: <pad> The three-day ANC PEC meeting was focused on rejuvenating the party.</s>

en: Mbeki says careerism has destroyed the ANC and disconnected it from its core responsibility of improving the livelihoods of the underprivileged.
tsn: Mbeki a re boitshedisi jo bo pelotshetlha bo sentse mokgatlho wa ANC e bile bo o arogantse le  maikarabelo a ona a go tokafatsa matshelo a bahumanegi.
mt0: <pad> Mbeki said selfish behavior had destroyed the ANC and deprived it of its role in improving the lives of the poor.</s>

en: Because we have not addressed this matter raised by [former president] Nelson Mandela in 1997, about careerist, we have failed to address that matter.
tsn: Ka gonne ga re ise re bue ka kgang e e tlhagisitsweng ke moporesitente wa maloba Nelson Mandela ka 1997, ka ga boitshedisi jo bo pelotshetlha, re reteletswe ke go samagana le ntlha eo.
mt0: <pad> Since we have never addressed the issue raised by late President Nelson Mandela in 1997, on selfish behavior, we have been refused to engage with that issue.</s>

en: When we say renewal, can you renew ANC with those careerists and the answer was it wouldnt make sense, explains Mbeki.
tsn: Fa re re ntšhwafatso, a o ka ntšhwafatsa ANC le batho ba ba pelotshetlha bao, mme Karabo e nnile gore go ka se dire tlhaloganyo, go tlhalosa Mbeki.
mt0: <pad> If we say reform, can you reform the ANC with those corrupt people, and the answer was that it would be stupid, Mbeki said.</s>

en: Former ANC President Cde Thabo Mbeki earlier arriving at the 3 day Extended PEC meeting that kickstarted today.
tsn: Moporesidente  wa maloba wa ANC khomoreiti Thabo Mbeki, o fitlhile pele kwa kopanong ya matsatsi a le mararo e e okeditsweng ya PEC e e simolotseng gompieno .
mt0: <pad> The former ANC president, Mr Thabo Mbeki, has opened the three-day extended meeting of the PEC which began today.</s>

en: Former Public Enterprises Minister, Malusi Gigaba, has denied at the Commission of Inquiry into State Capture that he received bags of cash from the Gupta family.
tsn: Tona ya maloba ya Dikgwebo tsa Setšhaba, Malusi Gigaba, o latotse kwa Khomišeneng ya Dipatlisiso tsa Puso gore o amogetse dikgetsana tsa madi go tswa  go ba lelapa la ga Gupta.
mt0: <pad> The former minister of public prosecutions, Malusi Gigaba, alleged in the Public Prosecution Commission that he received bribes from the Gupta family.</s>

en: Gigaba continued to give testimony after being accused by several witnesses, including his estranged wife, Nomachule, of being close to the controversial family.
tsn: Gigaba o tsweletse go ntsha bosupi morago ga go latofadiwa ke dipaki di le mmalwa, go akaretsa le mosadi wa gagwe, Nomachule, ka go utlwana le lelapa le go buiwang ka lona.
mt0: <pad> Gigaba continued to testify after he was accused by several witnesses, including his wife, Nomachule, of having sexual relations with the family that is being investigated.</s>

en: He claims that his estranged wife is trying to implicate him in wrongdoing amid their separation.
tsn: O tlhalosa gore mosadi wa gagwe yo a leng mo tseleng ya go arogana le ena, o leka go mo mmona diphoso ka ga kgaogano ya bona.
mt0: <pad> He explains that his wife, who is about to break up with him, is trying to blame him for their split.</s>

en: If she was there and saw me being given money, it was illicit and implicates her in an illegality.
tsn: Fa e le gore o ne a le teng, mme o bone fa ke ne ke newa madi, go raya gore le ena o a amega mo tlolomolaong eno.
mt0: <pad> If he was there and saw me being given blood, that means he is also involved in this crime.</s>

en: So, when she was being coached about her affidavit, it would say you didnt see the bag or this money being given to him, you only saw it in the boot and you can only infer that it came from the Guptas, says the former Minister.
tsn: Ka jalo, fa a ne a kaelwa mo afidafiting ya gagwe, e ne e tla re ga o a bona kgetsi ya madi kgotsa fa a ne a neelwa madi, o e bone fela ka mo gare butu mme wa ikakanyetsa gore e tswa kwa ga Gupta, go bua Tona ya maloba.
mt0: <pad> So, if he was arrested in his palace, he would have said he didn't see the money or if he was offered money, he only saw it in the middle of the night and thought it was from Gupta, said yesterday's Prime Minister.</s>

en: I wouldnt be able to tell the chairperson exactly her motives.
tsn: Ke ne ke ka se kgone go ka bolelela modulasetulo maikaelelo a gagwe.
mt0: <pad> I couldn't tell the president his intentions.</s>

en: The reason she never saw the money being given to me or carried by me to the car  and tries to implicate the protectors  is because there was no such money, explains Gigaba.
tsn: Lebaka la gore a bo a sa bona fa ke ne ke newa madi kgotsa ke a isa kwa koloing mme ke leka go tsenyeletsa basireletsi,  ke ka ntlha ya gore go ne go sena madi a a ntseng jalo, go tlhalosa Gigaba.
mt0: <pad> The reason he didn't see me being paid or taking money to the car and trying to get in the passengers, is because there wasn't any such money.</s>

en: Commission hears Gupta-related evidence
tsn: Khomišhene e reetsa bopaki jo bo amanang le Gupta.
mt0: <pad> The commission is hearing evidence relating to Gupta.</s>

en: Gigaba has continued to dispute all allegations levelled against him by his estranged wife.
tsn: Gigaba tsweletse go ganetsa ditatofatso tsotlhe kgatlhanong le ena tse di dirilweng ke mosadi wa gagwe.
mt0: <pad> Gigaba continued to deny all allegations made against him by his wife.</s>

en: The former Minister also rejected Nomachules claim at the commission regarding then South African Airways (SAA) Chairperson, Dudu Myeni, giving him instructions from former President Jacob Zuma.
tsn: Tona ya maloba e gananeditse ditletlebo tsa ga Nomachule kwa khomišheneng malebana le Modulasetulo wa maloba wa South African Airways (SAA), Dudu Myeni, tsa gore o ne a mo neela ditaelo tse di tswang kwa go mopresitente Jacob Zuma.
mt0: <pad> The former minister denied the allegations made by Nomachule to the commission about the former SAA president, Dudu Myeni, that he had been given instructions from President Jacob Zuma.</s>

en: Gigaba also rejected his estranged wifes evidence that Myeni threatened at one stage that he would be sent back to being Home Affairs Minister, a less senior post, if he did not follow instructions.
tsn: Gigaba o ganeditse gape le bosupi jwa mosadi wa gagwe jwa gore Myeni ka nako nngwe, o dirile matshosetsi a gore o tlaa mo busetsa kwa setulong sa gagwe sa Tona ya Merero ya Selegae, e leng maemo a a kwa tlase, fa a sa latele ditaelo.
mt0: <pad> Gigaba also denied the wife's testimony that Myeni at one point, threatened to remove him from his position as Minister of Local Affairs, a lower rank, if he did not follow his instructions.</s>

en: The hearings will resume on Tuesday.
tsn: Ditheetso di tlaa tswelela ka Labobedi.
mt0: <pad> The hearings will continue on Tuesday.</s>

en: It will hear Prasa-related evidence from two employees of the the rail agency, including its Head of the Legal Division, Martha Ngoye.
tsn: E tla reetsa bopaki jo bo amanang le Prasa go tswa kwa badiring ba babedi ba  Rail Agency, go akaretsa le Tlhogo ya Karolo ya Semolao, Martha Ngoye.
mt0: <pad> It will hear evidence relating to press from two Rail Agency officials, including the Head of Legal Division, Martha Ngoye.</s>

en: Former Transnet Chief Financial Officer, Gary Pita, will also take the stand to give evidence related to the company.
tsn: Motlhankedimogolo wa maloba wa ditšhelete wa Transnet, Gary Pita, o tlaa ema ka dinao mme a neelane ka bopaki jo bo amanang le setlamo.
mt0: <pad> The former chief financial officer of Transnet, Gary Pita, will stand by and provide evidence about the company.</s>

en: Proceedings will start at 3pm.
tsn: Tsheko e tlaa simolola kwa 3pm.
mt0: <pad> The trial will start at 3 pm.</s>

en: Former Public Enterprises Minister Malusi Gigaba has continued to dispute all allegations levelled against him at the State Capture Commission in Johannesburg by his estranged wife, Noma.
tsn: Tona ya maloba ya Dikgwebo tsa Setšhaba, Malusi Gigaba o tsweletse go ganetsana le ditatofatso tsotlhe kgatlhanong le ena  kwa khomišeneng ya dipatlisiso tsa Puso kwa Johannesburg, tse di dirilweng ke mosadi wa gagwe, Noma.
mt0: <pad> The former Minister of Public Prosecutions, Malusi Gigaba, has continued to deny all allegations against him at the Johannesburg Crown Commission, which his wife Noma made against him.</s>

en: Gigaba also rejected her claim at the commission regarding then SAA chairperson Dudu Myeni giving him instructions from Former President Jacob Zuma.
tsn: Gigaba gape go ganetsane le dipuo tsa gagwe kwa khomišeneng malebana le kgang ya gore modulasetulo wa maloba wa SAA Dudu Myeni a mo neetse ditaelo go tswa go Poresidente Jacob Zuma.
mt0: <pad> Gigaba also contradicted his statements in the commission about the claim that the former chair of the SAA Dudu Myeni had received instructions from President Jacob Zuma.</s>

en: It would have been ridiculous of me to say I didnt understand why Ms Myeni was appointed because I was the Minister when she was appointed.
tsn: Ke ne ke tla lebega jaaka sematla fa ke ne ke rile ka re ga ke tlhaloganye gore ke ka ntlha ya eng mme Myeni a ne a beilwe mo setulong ka gonne ke ne ke le Tona fa a ne a tlhomiwa.
mt0: <pad> I would be a fool if I said I don't understand why Mr. Menzies was put on the chair because I was the Minister when he was appointed.</s>

en: We requested Cabinet to appoint a new board and approve her appointment as chair as one of the people who served in the previous board appointed by Minister Hogan.
tsn: Re kopile Kabinete go thapa boto e ntšhwa le go amogela go tlhomiwa ga gagwe jaaka modulasetulo jaaka mongwe wa batho ba ba dirileng mo botong ya maloba e e tlhomilweng ke Tona Hogan.
