mt0: <pad> We asked the Cabinet to form a new committee and accept his appointment as chairman as one of the members of the previous committee appointed by Mr Hogan.</s>

en: Last week, Gigaba disputed allegations made by his estranged wife that he had business dealings with the Gupta brothers.
tsn: Mo bekeng e e fetileng, Gigaba o ganane le ditatofatso tse di dirilweng ke mosadi wa gagwe tsa gore o ne a na le merero ya kgwebo le boabuti ba ga  Gupta.
mt0: <pad> Last week, Gigaba denied allegations made by his wife that he had business plans with the Gupta brothers.</s>

en: Gigaba recalled going several times to the Gupta-owned Sahara Computers offices in Johannesburg to pick up invitations.
tsn: Gigaba o gopola a ya makgetlo a le mmalwa kwa dikantorong tsa bo Gupta, Sahara Computers kwa Johannesburg go lata ditaletso.
mt0: <pad> Gigaba remembers going to the offices of Gupta, Sahara Computers in Johannesburg several times to collect the certificates.</s>

en: He insisted that he only had social and cultural interactions with the Guptas and not business dealings.
tsn: O gateletse gore o ne a na le dikamano tsa loago le setso fela le ba ga Gupta mme e seng merero ya kgwebo.
mt0: <pad> He stressed that he had only social and cultural relations with the Guptas and not business ambitions.</s>

en: Gigaba told Deputy Chief Justice Raymond Zondo that he continued interacting with the Guptas even after he was appointed minister.
tsn: Gigaba o boleletse Motlatsa Moatlhodimogolo Raymond Zondo gore o ne a tswelela go kopana le bo Gupta le morago ga go tlhomiwa ga gagwe jaaka Tona.
mt0: <pad> Gigaba told the Deputy Chief Justice Raymond Zondo that he continued to meet with Mrs. Gupta even after her appointment as Minister.</s>

en: Building strong relationships with political parties, the media and other stakeholders are the hallmarks of success for the Independent Electoral Commission (IEC) in the Western Cape.
tsn: Go aga kamano e e nonofileng le makoko a sepolotiki, bobegakgang le batsayakarolo ba bangwe ke matshwao a katlego go Khomišene e e Ikemetseng ya Ditlhopho (IEC) kwa Kapa Bophirima.
mt0: <pad> Building strong relationships with political parties, media and other stakeholders is a sign of success for the Independent Electoral Commission (IEC) in Western Cape.</s>

en: This is according to Reverend Courtney Sampson who served as provincial chairperson for the IEC for 22 years.
tsn: Se ke go ya ka moruti Courtney Sampson yo e neng e le modulasetulo wa Porofense ya IEC dingwaga di le 22.
mt0: <pad> This is according to Dr. Courtney Sampson, who was the IEC's provincial president for two years.</s>

en: Sampson retired at the beginning of this month.
tsn: Sampson o rotse tiro mo tshimologong ya kgwedi e.
mt0: <pad> Sampson quit at the beginning of this month.</s>

en: He cast his first vote at the age of 38.
tsn: O latlhetse bouto ya gagwe ya ntlha a le dingwaga di le 38.
mt0: <pad> He lost his first vote when he was only four years old.</s>

en: Five years later, he was appointed Chairperson of the institution tasked with overseeing elections in the country.
tsn: Morago ga dingwaga di le tlhano, o ne a tlhophiwa go nna modulasetulo wa setheo se se neng se lebagane le ditlhopho mo nageng.
mt0: <pad> Five years later, he was elected as the chair of the national election commission.</s>

en: Meanwhile, former ANC President, Thabo Mbeki, is expected to make presentations on the unity and renewal of the party.
tsn: Re sa le foo, moporesitente wa maloba Thabo Mbeki o solofetswe go dira ditlhagiso ka ga kopano le ntšhwafatso ya lekoko.
mt0: <pad> While we are still here, the former president Thabo Mbeki is expected to make announcements about the meeting and renewal of the party.</s>

en: He will contribute to how to reassert the ANC as a movement rooted among the people.
tsn: O tla nna le seabe mo tlhomamisong ya ANC jaaka e le mokgatlho o o leng mo gare ga batho.
mt0: <pad> He will play a role in the establishment of the ANC as a people's organization.</s>

en: ANC PEC spokesperson, Loyiso Magqashela, says the meeting will also draw on the legacy of the founders of the party for the benefit of the current generation.
tsn: Mmueledi wa ANC PEC, Loyiso Magqashela o bua gore kopano e tlaa gatelela boswa jwa basimolodi ba mokgatlho go thusa ba ba latelang jaanong.
mt0: <pad> The ANC PEC spokesman, Loyiso Magqashela said the meeting will stress the legacy of the founders of the organisation to help the current leaders.</s>

en: To strengthen the issue of the organisational renewal and unity, we have then to tap from the wisdom of those who led before so that at least our renewal trajectory gets to be guided and guided properly.
tsn: Go tiisa ntlha ya ntšhwafatso le kopano, re tshwanetse go tsaya botlhale go ba ba eteletseng pele maloba gore ntšhwafatso e kgone go kaelwa sentle.
mt0: <pad> To ensure the point of renewal and integration, we must take advice from the previous leaders so that the renewal can be directed properly.</s>

en: You would have nowadays understood how the ANC is pressured from left, right and centre
tsn: Gompieno o ka tlhaloganya gore ANC e ka fa tlase ga kgatelelo go tswa ka fa molemeng,  ka fa mojeng le mo magareng.
mt0: <pad> Today you can understand that the ANC is under pressure from the left, right and middle.</s>

en: Now the renewal project then becomes key.
tsn: Jaanong porojeke ya ntšhwafatso e tlile go nna botlhokwa.
mt0: <pad> Now a refurbishment project will be very important.</s>

en: We want to assert the authority and the leadership of the ANC amongst the society, says Magqashela.
tsn: Re batla go gatelela thata taolo le boeteledipele jwa ANC mo setšhabeng. Go bua Magqashela.
mt0: <pad> We want to underline the power and leadership of the ANC in the nation, said Magqashela.</s>

en: Magqashela says on Monday the organisation will engage various community stakeholders to listen to their concerns.
tsn: Magqashela a re ka Mosupologo mokgatlho o tlaa buisana le baamegi ba ba farologaneng go reetsa matshwenyego a bona.
mt0: <pad> Magqashela said the organisation will meet with different victims on Monday to hear their concerns.</s>

en: May 29, 2021. Political analyst Dr Luvuyo Dondolo says the ANC needs a long term solution if it is to renew the movement.
tsn: Motsheganong 21 2021. Mosakeseki wa dipolotiki Ngaka Luvuyo Dondolo o buile gore ANC e tlhoka tharabololo ya pakatelele go ntšhwafatsa mokgatlho.
mt0: <pad> February 21, 2021. A political commentator Dr Luvuyo Dondolo said the ANC needed a radical transformation to rejuvenate the organisation.</s>

en: He says the party may regain a bit of trust following current interventions but going forward, they will have to put in more work
tsn: A re, mokhgatlho o ka tsolosa tshepo morago ga ditharabololo tsa ga jaana, fela go ya kwa pele ba tlile go tlhoka go dira ka thata.
mt0: <pad> He said, the organization can be a hopeful after the current improvements, but they will need to work harder in the future.</s>

en: This after the ANC in the Eastern Cape announced tapping into the wisdom of those who led before by involving Mbeki in its three-day Provincial Executive Committee meeting currently under way in East London.
tsn: Se, se tla morago ga mokgatlho wa ANC wa kwa Kapa Botlhaba o bua ka go tsaya botlhale go baeteledipele ba maloba, ka go akaretsa Mbeki go nna le seabe kwa kopanong ya komiti ya khuduthamaga ya malatsi a le mararo e e diragalang jaanong jaana.
mt0: <pad> This comes after the ANC's Eastern Cape branch said it was wise of former leaders, including Mbeki, to participate in the three-day conference of the Executive Committee that is taking place now.</s>

en: The involvement of former leaders such as President Thabo Mbeki, leaders who are perceived to have the moral campus as a way of this renewal of the ANC its a short term, it is the strategy that the ANC is using to win the hearts of the voters however the ANC needs permanent and long term solution, through this short term solution they might win the elections in some of the municipalities but there are certain metros where they will get strong contestation from other political organisations, he adds.
tsn: Go nna le seabe ga baeteledipele ba maloba jaaka Thabo Mbeki, baeteledipele ba ba lemogilweng go nna le ngwao ya molao ka tsela ya go ntšhwafatsa mokgatlho, ke selo sa pakakhutswane, ke leano le ANC le le dirisang go fenya dipelo tsa batlhophi mme fela ANC e tlhoka maano a a nnelang ruri, ka tharabololo e ya nakwana e, baka kgona go fenya ditlhopho kwa di mmasepaleng tse di rileng, mme go na le ditoropokgolo tse di rileng kwa ba nnang le kgaisano e e thata go tswa kwa mekgatlhong mengwe ya dipolitiki, a tlaleletsa.
mt0: <pad> The involvement of former leaders like Thabo Mbeki, leaders who have been recognised for their cultural values through the process of rejuvenating the organisation, is a short-term solution, a strategy that the ANC is using to win the hearts of voters but the ANC needs long-term solutions, with this temporary solution, they can only win elections in certain districts, and there are certain cities where they have a strong competition from other political parties, he added.</s>

en: The African National Congress (ANC) has convened a three-day extended Provincial Executive Committee (PEC) meeting at the East London International Convention Centre in the Eastern Cape.
tsn: African National Congress (ANC) e biditse kopano ya malatsi a le mararo e e atolositsweng ya komiti ya khuduthamaga ya porofense  (PEC) kwa East London International Convention Centre kwa Kapa Botlhaba.
mt0: <pad> The African National Congress (ANC) has called for a three-day expanded state Executive Committee (PEC) meeting at the East London International Convention Centre in South Africa.</s>

en: Former ANC President, Thabo Mbeki, is expected to make presentations on the unity and renewal of the party.
tsn: Moporesidente wa maloba  wa ANC, Thabo Mbeki, o solofetswe go dira ditlhagiso ka tshwaragano le ntšhwafatso ya lekoko.
mt0: <pad> The former ANC president, Thabo Mbeki, is expected to make warnings about the spread and re-emergence of the virus.</s>

en: We shall be bringing all those stakeholders under one roof because what is important is for us to then say here are the people, what is it that concerns them in the presence of the leadership so that at least when they present, the former President gets an opportunity to speak to those people and try and respond to whatever issues they would raise.
tsn: Re tla tlisa botlhe ba ba amegang ka fa tlase ga lefelo le le lengwe ka ntlha ya gore, se se botlhokwa mo go rona ke gore “batho ke ba”, matshwenyego a bona ke eng fa pele ga baeteledipele, gore fa ba dira ditlhagiso Moporesidente wa maloba a nne le tšhono ya go bua le  batho ba bangwe le go leka go tsibogela dintlha tse ba ka di dirang.
mt0: <pad> We will bring all those involved together because, what is important to us is who the people are, what are their concerns before the leaders, so that when they make recommendations the former President can have the chance to talk to other people and try to respond to any points they may have made.</s>

en: African National Congress (ANC) Deputy Secretary-General Jessie Duarte, says contrary to misconceptions, the aim of the step aside resolution is not to target one person.
tsn: Motlatsa mokwadi-kakaretso wa lekgotla la Bosetšhaba la Aforika (ANC), Jessie Duarte o bua gore , kgatlhanong le maikutlo a a sa siamang, maikaelelo  a kgato ya ntlha ya kwa thoko ga se go leba motho a le mongwe.
mt0: <pad> The Deputy General Secretary of the African National Congress (ANC), Jessie Duarte, said that, contrary to negative perceptions, the purpose of the first step is not to isolate any individual.</s>

en: Her statement comes after suspended ANC Secretary-General, Ace Magashule, approached the High Court in Johannesburg to request it to declare the resolution unconstitutional and set aside his suspension.
tsn: Puo ya gagwe e tla morago ga mokwadi-kakaretso, Ace Magashule a buisana le kgotlhatshekelo e e kwa godimo kwa Johannesburg go kopa go senola molaotheo le go beela maitlamo kwa thoko.
mt0: <pad> His speech comes after the general secretary, Ace Magashule, had spoken to the High Court in Johannesburg to ask for an explanation of the constitution and to suspend the mandate.</s>

en: He was suspended after he refused to step down.
tsn: O ne a emisiwa morago ga go gana go rola tiro.
mt0: <pad> She was fired after she refused to accept the job.</s>

en: Magashule faces several charges of fraud, corruption and money laundering relating to the alleged irregular awarding of more than R250 million in the Free State asbestos roofing audit contract.
tsn: Magashule o lebane le ditatofataso di le mmalwa tsa tsietso, bobodu, tsamaiso ya madi e e amanang le magatwe a a sa amogelesegeng a kabelo ya madi a a fetang dimilione di le R250 mo konterakeng ya borulelo ya asebesetose.
mt0: <pad> Magashule is facing several allegations of fraud, corruption and money management related to the unlawful allocation of over R250 million in the asbestos irrigation contract.</s>

en: Magashule was given 48 hours to publicly apologise to ANC branches after he wrote a suspension letter to party President Cyril Ramaphosa.
tsn: Magashule o ne a newa di ura di le 48 go kopa maitshwarelo phatlhalatsa go makala a ANC, morago ga go kwala lokwalo la go emisa tiro go Moporesidente wa mokgatlho Cyril Ramaphosa.
mt0: <pad> Magashule was given 48 hours to apologize publicly to the ANC members, after writing a letter of resignation to the leader of the organisation Cyril Ramaphosa.</s>

en: Speaking at the Northern Capes ninth ANC conference in Namakwa, Duarte said the resolution was aimed at those who had been charged with serious crimes.
tsn: O bua kwa khonferenseng ya borobonngwe ya ANC kwa Kapa Bokone kwa Namakwa, Duarte o buile fa tshwetso e lebane ba ba neng ba lotofaditswe ka bosenyi jo bo masisi.
mt0: <pad> Speaking at the ANC's annual conference in Cape Town on Monday, Duarte said the decision was made for those convicted of serious crimes.</s>

en: Comrade John Block when he was charged, he did not hesitate to step aside.
tsn: Khomoretiti John Block fa a ne a bonwe molato, ga a ka a okaoka go emala kwa thoko.
mt0: <pad> When Judge John Block was convicted, he did not hesitate to take his own life.</s>

en: Comrade Marius Fransman, I can go on; the list is quite long.
tsn: Khomoreiti Marius Fransman, “nka tswelela pele, lenaane le le telele”.
mt0: <pad> Dr. Marius Fransman, "I can go on, long night."</s>

en: Comrade Pallo Jordan stood aside.
tsn: Khomoreiti Pallo Jordan o emetse kwa thoko.
mt0: <pad> Jordan played the ball with his hand.</s>

en: Comrade Mdu Manana stepped aside.
tsn: Khomoreiti Mdu Manana o sutetse kwa thoko.
mt0: <pad> My mother took my hand.</s>

en: The issue here is not about an individual and that is where the issue is being made
tsn: Bothata jo bo fa, ga e se ka ga motho yo o rileng mme, ke gona fa bothata bo leng teng foo.
mt0: <pad> The problem is not a specific person, but the problem is where the problem is.</s>

en: The issue here is about the resolution of the ANC.
tsn: Kgangkgolo fa ke ka ga maitlamo a ANC.
mt0: <pad> The main issue here is the ANC's commitment.</s>

en: Suspended ANC Secretary-General Ace Magashule takes ANC to court:
tsn: Mokwaledi kakaretso yo o emisitsweng kwa tirong wa ANC Ace Magashule o isa ANC kwa kgotlhatshekelong.
mt0: <pad> The ousted ANC general secretary Ace Magashule has put the ANC under scrutiny.</s>

en: African National Congress (ANC) Chairperson in the Northern Cape, Dr Zamani Saul, who is expected to be retained, has lambasted National Executive Committee (NEC) members who fail to take their own decisions seriously and to execute their tasks with integrity.
tsn: Modulasetulo wa ANC kwa Kapa Bokone, Ngaka Zamani Saul yo o solofetsweng go tswelela pele ka tiro, o kgalemetse maloko a komiti ya khuduthamaga ya bosetšhaba (NEC) a a palelwang ke go tsaya ditshwetso tsa bona tsia le go diragatsa ditiro tsa bona ka tlhamalalo.
mt0: <pad> The ANC's Northern Cape chairperson, Dr Zamani Saul, who is expected to continue with his job, has criticised members of the National Executive Committee (NEC) for failing to take their decisions seriously and perform their duties effectively.</s>

en: In recent weeks, some ANC NEC members have leaked recordings of their meetings to the media and the public, which Saul regards as ideologically bankrupt.
tsn: Mo dibekeng tsa malobanyana jaana, maloko a ANC NEC a golotse dikgatiso tsa dikopano tsa bona go ba metswedi ya dikgang le setšhaba, ke ntlha e Saul a e lebang e le kgopolo e e nang le kakanyo e e senyegileng.
mt0: <pad> In recent weeks, members of the ANC NEC have released their meeting minutes to journalists and the public, a move that Saul sees as having a negative connotation.</s>

en: Speaking during the provinces ninth elective conference in Namakwa, Saul said the ANC NEC has the responsibility of providing leadership to all structures of the ANC and society.
tsn: Fa a ne a bua ka nako ya khonferense ya borobongwe ya ditlhopong tsa porofense kwa Namakwa, Saul o rile ANC NEC e na le maikarabelo a go tlamela ka boeteledipele jwa ditheo tsotlhe tsa ANC le setšhaba.
mt0: <pad> When he was speaking during the ninth regional conference in Namakwa, Saul said the ANC NEC has the responsibility to provide for the leadership of all the structures of the ANC and the people.</s>

en: We don’t want to see squabbling and fighting in the NEC; we can’t sit with political bankruptcy there.
tsn: Ga re battle go bona dikomano le ditlhabano mo go NEC; re ka se kgone go nna le tshenyego ya sepolotiki.
mt0: <pad> We don't want to see violence and fighting in the NEC; we can't have political destruction.</s>

en: We have NEC members who have converted NEC and NWC meetings into a new fun game which records NEC discussion and selectively leak them to the public and media.
tsn: Re na le maloko a a fetotseng dikopano tsa NEC le NWC papadi e ntšhwa e e monate e e gatisang dipuisano tsa NEC, mme ba tlhopa tseo ba di lokololang go setšhaba le metswedi ya dikgang.
mt0: <pad> We have members who have turned NEC and NWC meetings into a new exciting game that promotes NEC discussions, and they select what they release to the public and media.</s>

en: This, comrades, is politics of brinkmanship and honestly must be stopped.
tsn: Seno makhomoreiti, ke dipolotiki tse di kotsi, mme go bua nnete fela, di tshwanetse go emisiwa.
mt0: <pad> These are the commorants, these are dangerous politics, and to tell the truth, they should be stopped.</s>

en: Zamani Saul says the ANC needs to restore its damaged image: stealing of branch members
tsn: Zamani o bua gore ANC e tshwanetse go busetsa setshwantsho sa yona se se senyegileng: Go utswiwa ga maloko a ditokololo.
mt0: <pad> Zamani says that the ANC must rebuild its damaged image: The embezzlement of party members.</s>

en: A faction opposing Saul in the John Taolo Gaetsewe region, has accused the ANC of stealing branch members.
tsn: Makoko a a ganetsang Saul kwa kgaolong ya Gaetsewe, a latofaditse ANC ka go utswa maloko a ditokololo.
mt0: <pad> The opposition parties in the Gaetsewe district accused the ANC of stealing the votes of the electoral commissions.</s>

en: The regions ANC conference was postponed late Friday night.
tsn: Khonferense ya ANC e buseditswe morago bosigo jwa Labotlhano.
mt0: <pad> The ANC Conference was postponed on Friday night.</s>

en: It was to be the last regional conference before the provincial conference next week.
tsn: E ne e tshwanetse go nna khonferense ya bofelo ya kgaolo, pele ga khonferense ya beke e e tlang.
mt0: <pad> It was supposed to be the last regional conference, before the next week's conference.</s>

en: Saul, who is also Northern Cape Premier, says the Provincial Executive Committee will meet on Saturday to discuss the way forward.
tsn: Saul yo gape e leng tonakgolo ya Kapa Bokone, a re komiti ya khuduthamaga ya porofense e tlaa kopana ka Lamatlhatso go buisanela ka go ya pele.
mt0: <pad> Saul, who is also the chief minister of North Carolina, said the state Executive Committee will meet on Tuesday to discuss the matter.</s>

en: All branches have not yet been registered because there are parallel structures that were submitted straight to the provincial secretary and not via the regional secretary.
tsn: Makala otlhe ga a ise a kwadisiwe ka gonne go na le ditheo tse di neng di romelwa go mokwadi wa porofense mme e seng go ya ka kgaolo ya mokwaledi.
mt0: <pad> All the cases were not registered because some institutions were sent to the state attorney but not to the district attorney.</s>

en: So, they want to steal the branches and delegates, Party member Olebogeng Leserwane says.
tsn: Leloko la lekoko Olebogeng Leserwane a re; ba batla utswa makala le baemedi a ona.
mt0: <pad> The chairman of the committee Olebogeng Leserwane said; they are trying to steal the committee and its members.</s>

en: Additional reporting by Reginald Witbooi.
tsn: Tlaleletso ya pego ka Reginal Witbooi.
mt0: <pad> Report by Reginal Witbooi</s>

en: Tributes are pouring following the death of 84-year-old African National Congress (ANC) stalwart, Ivy Cikizwa Gcina.
tsn: Batho ba ne ba thologela go tlisa matshediso morago ga loso la moikanyegi, Ivy Cikizwa Gcina wa ANC wa dingwaga di le 84.
mt0: <pad> People gathered to offer condolences after the death of a veteran ANC member, Ivy Mbeki, 84, who was a martyr.</s>

en: The ANC in the Nelson Mandela Bay region has described her passing as a huge blow to the party, nationally.
tsn: Mokgatlho wa ANC wa kwa kgaolong ya Nelson Mandela Bay o tlhalositse loso la gagwe jaaka sebetso se se boitshegang mo mokgatlhong.
mt0: <pad> Nelson Mandela Bay ANC chapter described his death as a "great loss" to the organisation.</s>

en: Gcina joined the ANC Youth League in the 1950s and was active in the bus boycotts and protests against Bantu education.
tsn: Gcina o tsenetse mokgatlho wa bašwa wa ANC ka dingwaga tsa bo 1950 mme a le matlhagatlhaga mo dikhuduegong le dingongorego kgatlhanong le thuto ya bantsho.
mt0: <pad> Gcina joined the ANC youth movement in the 1950s and was active in protests and protests against black education.</s>

en: She headed the womens committee after the establishment of Port Elizabeth Black Civic Organisation (PEBCO) and was also elected the first chairperson of the Port Elizabeth Womens Organisation (PEWO).
tsn: O ne a eteletse pele komiti ya basadi, morago ga go tlhomiwa ga Port Elizabeth Black Civic Organisation (PEBCO), mme gape o ne a tlhopiwa go nna modulasetulo wa ntlha wa Port Elizabeth Women’s Organisation (PEWO).
mt0: <pad> She was the first chair of the women's committee, after the formation of the Port Elizabeth Black Civic Organisation (PEBCO), and was also elected as the first chair of the Port Elizabeth Women's Organisation (PEWO).</s>

en: Mourners visited the Gcina home to pay tribute to the struggle veteran.
tsn: Batho ba ba hutsafetseng ba ne ba etetse legae la Gcina go isa matshidiso.
mt0: <pad> Those who were grieving visited the Gcina's home to offer condolences.</s>

en: They include ANC veterans such as Benson Fihla, Nceba Faku and Litho Suka.
tsn: Mo go bona go akaretsa ba ba kileng ba lwa; jaaka Benson Fihla, Nceba le Litho Suka.
mt0: <pad> They include former combatants; such as Benson Fihla, Nceba and Litho Suka.</s>

en: Mama Gcina also lost three of her sons in the struggle, two in combat and the third in exile.
tsn: Mama Gcina o latlhegetswe gape ke basimane ba gagwe ba le bararo mo go lwantsheng dikgwetlho, ba le babedi kwa ntweng, wa boraro kwa botshwarong.
mt0: <pad> Mama Gcina has also lost her three sons in battle, two in the war, and the third in prison.</s>

en: All of her sons were members of Umkhonto we Sizwe.
tsn: Basimane botlhe ba gagwe e ne e le maloko a Umkhonto we Sizwe.
mt0: <pad> All his sons were members of the Umkhonto we Sizwe.</s>

en: The ANC in the region says her legacy will never be forgotten.
tsn: ANC e mo kgaolong ya gagwe e re boswa jwa gagwe bo ka se se lebalwe.
mt0: <pad> The ANC in his district says that his legacy will never be forgotten.</s>

en: ANC regional Member Nceba Faku and ANCWL NEC member Nancy Sihlwayi talk about her contribution to the struggle for liberation.
tsn: Nceba Faku yo o leng leloko la kgaolo ya ANC le leloko la ANCWL NEC ba bua ka ntlha ya go nna le seabe ga gagwe mo go kgaratlheleng tokologo.
mt0: <pad> Nceba Faku, a member of the ANC regional committee and a member of the ANCWL NEC, speaks on behalf of his role in the struggle for freedom.</s>

en: Her children all died in exile and were extremely vital in the struggle against the oppression, its a sad loss but she was eighty, her wisdom will never be forgotten, says Faku
tsn: Bana ba gagwe botlhe ba tlhokofaletse kwa botshabelong mme, ba ne ba le botlhokwa mo ntweng kgatlhanong kgatelelo, ke tatlhegelo e e utliwsang botlhoko fela o ne a na le dingwaga di le masome a robedi, botlhale jwa gagwe ga bo kitla bo lebalwa, go bua Faku.
mt0: <pad> All her children died in the concentration camps, but they were important in the fight against oppression, it's a sad loss only eighteen years old, his wisdom will never be forgotten, said Faku.</s>

en: She has a passion for people, she wanted to change the lives of the people and women emancipation, she loved the ANC and ANCWL, its a sad loss to our movement, says Sihlwayi.
tsn: Ke motho yo o ratang batho, o ne a batla go fetola matshelo a batho le go tlisa kgololosego mo basading, o ne a rata ANC le ANCWL, ke tatlhegelo e e utlwisang botlhoko mo mokgatlhong wa rona, go bua Sihlwayi.
mt0: <pad> He was a man of people, he wanted to change the lives of people and bring freedom to women, he loved the ANC and the ANCWL, it's a sad loss for our organisation," said Sihlwayi.</s>

en: Gcina leaves behind her sister, brother, and great-grandchildren.
tsn: Gcina o sia  kgaitsadie, mogoloe le ditlogolwana.
mt0: <pad> Gcina left his wife, grandmother and grandchildren.</s>

en: A family spokesperson is Andile Hashe says she lived for the ANC.
tsn: Mmueledi wa lelapa ke Andile Hashe. A re o ne a tshelela mokgatlho wa ANC.
mt0: <pad> The family spokesman is Andile Hashe. He said he was a member of the ANC.</s>

en: The only thing that she knew and lived for was the ANC, she loved each and everyone of us, may her soul rest in peace.
tsn: Selo se le sengwe fela se a neng a se itse e bile a se tshelela, ke mokgatlho wa ANC. O ne a rata mongwe le mongwe wa rona, a moya wa gagwe robale ka kagiso.
mt0: <pad> The only thing he knew and lived for was the ANC. He loved each of us, may his soul rest in peace.</s>

en: Gcina was a Member of Parliament after the 1994 elections and retired in 2004.
tsn: Gcina e ne e le leloko la palamente morago ga ditlhopho tsa 1994 mme o rotse tiro ka 2004.
mt0: <pad> Gcina became a member of the parliament after the 1994 elections and resigned in 2004.</s>

en: She will be laid to rest next week Saturday.
tsn: O tla fitlhwa mo bekeng e e latelang ka Lamatlhatso.
mt0: <pad> He will be buried next week on Friday.</s>

en: Reporting by Lwando Nomoyi
tsn: Pego ka Lwando Nomoyi.
mt0: <pad> Please don't know.</s>

en: Parliament has celebrated the 25th anniversary of the Constitution.
tsn: Palemente e ne ya keteka ngwaga wa bo 25 wa molaotheo.
mt0: <pad> The Parliament celebrated the 25th anniversary of the constitution.</s>

en: The final Constitution was adopted in December 1996 and it came into effect in February 1997.
tsn: Molaotheo wa bofelo o amogetswe ka Sedimonthole 1996 mme o tsenetswe tirisong ka Ferikgong 1997.
mt0: <pad> The final Constitution was adopted in December 1996 and came into force in January 1997.</s>

en: Parliament held a joint sitting today, to reflect on its values and principles.
tsn: Palemente e ne e tshwere kokoanokopanelo gompieno go ikgakolola ka ga mekgwa le melawana ya yone.
mt0: <pad> The Parliament held a meeting today to remind itself of its procedures and laws.</s>

en: Hailed as the world’s best Constitution and anchored in human rights and dignity following decades of colonialism and apartheid, South Africas apex document elicits diverse responses.
tsn: O bakiwa jaaka  e le molaotheo o o molemo wa lefatshe gape o nonofile go ditshwanelo tsa batho le seriti tse di latelang morago ga dingwaga tsa bokoloniale le tlhaolele, tokomane ya Aforika Borwa ya Apex e tla ka dikarabo tse di farologaneng.
mt0: <pad> Criticized as the best constitution of the world and strong on human rights and dignity that followed years of colonization and apartheid, the South African Apex document comes with a wide variety of responses.</s>

en: Twenty-five years since the adoption of South Africas Constitution, the countrys lawmakers still dont agree on its value.
tsn: Dinwaga di le 25 fa e sa le kamogelo ya molaotheo wa Aforika Borwa, batlhomamolao ba naga ba santse ba sa dumalane le boleng jwa yona.
mt0: <pad> 25 years after the adoption of the South African Constitution, South African legislators still do not agree on its value.</s>

en: While the vast majority of political parties have described it as a proud achievement, others have equated it to an instrument of oppression and dispossession.
tsn: Le fa bontsi jwa makoko a dipolotiki a tlhalositse katlego ya phitlhelelo ya bona, ba bangwe ba e tsaya jaaka e le sediriswa sa kgatelelo le go tseelwa dithoto.
mt0: <pad> While most political parties have described the success of their access, some see it as a tool for pressure and expropriation.</s>

en: The two Houses of Parliament held a joint sitting debate to mark 25 years of the adoption of the Constitution
tsn: Dintlo tse pedi tsa Palamente di ne di tshwere ngangisano e e tsenelwang go keteka dingwaga di le 25 tsa go amogelwa ga molaotheo.
mt0: <pad> The two houses of parliament held a special session to mark the 25th anniversary of the adoption of the constitution.</s>

en: In 1996, South Africas Parliament held a joint sitting on the occasion of the adoption of its new constitution.
tsn: Ka ngwaga wa 1996, Palamente ya Aforika Borwa e ne ya tshwara kopano ya Kokoanotshwaraganelo go amogela molaotheo wa yona o mošwa.
mt0: <pad> In 1996, the South African Parliament held a special session to adopt its new constitution.</s>

en: Up to the podium walked the then-Deputy President of the country to deliver a landmark oration that has become as iconic as the document itself.
tsn: Kwa seraleng se go buelwang kwa go sona, go ile motlatsamoporesidente wa maloba wa naga go neelana ka puo ya lekwalo le le tumileng la semolao.
mt0: <pad> In the debate, the former vice president of the country gave his speech on a popular bill.</s>

en: Two and a half decades on, many South Africans are still in awe of this document that they call a living embodiment of their hopes and aspirations.
tsn: Dingwaga di le pedi le halofo, bontsi jwa MaAforikaborwa bo boifa tokomane e, e ba e bitsang popego e e tshelang ya ditsholofelo le dikeletso tsa bona.
mt0: <pad> For two and a half years, most South Africans have feared this document, which they call a living image of their hopes and wishes.</s>

en: Instrument of freedom
tsn: Sediriswa sa kgololosego.
mt0: <pad> The Freedom of Information Act</s>

en: In opening the debate, International Relations and Co-operation Minister, Naledi Pandor, has hailed those who participated in the drafting of the countrys Constitution.
tsn: Ka pulo ya ngangisano, tona ya dikamano tsa boditšhabatšhaba le tirisanommogo Naledi Pandor, o galaletsa ba ba tsereng karolo mo go kwaleng molaotheo wa naga.
mt0: <pad> At the end of the debate, Minister for International Relations and Cooperation Naledi Pandor thanked those who participated in writing the country's constitution.</s>

en: She has praised leading African National Congress (ANC) leaders such as the late Zola Skweyiya and Kader Asmal for the important role they played.
tsn: O bakile baeteledipele ba mokgatlho wa African National Congress (ANC); ba ba jaaka moswi Zola Skweyiya le Kader Asmal ka seabe se se botlhokwa ba nnileng le sona.
mt0: <pad> He thanked the leaders of the African National Congress (ANC); such as former president Zola Skweyiya and Kader Asmal for their important role.</s>

en: Pandor says opposition party leaders such as Chief Mangosuthu Buthelezi, James Selfe of the Democratic Alliance (DA), Kenneth Meshoe of the African Christian Democratic Party (ACDP) also made a meaningful contribution.
tsn: Pandor o bua gore baeteledipele ba makokokgatlhanong; ba ba jaaka Kgosi Mangosuthu Buthelezi, James Selfe wa Democratic Alliance (DA), Kenneth Meshoe wa African Christian Democratic Party (ACDP) le bona ba nnile le seabe se se mosola.
mt0: <pad> Pandor says that opposition leaders; such as King Mangosuthu Buthelezi, James Selfe of the Democratic Alliance (DA), and Kenneth Meshoe of the African Christian Democratic Party (ACDP) also had a significant role.</s>

en: Pandor, who took part in a joint sitting debate, says the document unites the people of the country in a manner that no other legal document does.
tsn: Pandor yo o tsereng karolo mo ngangisanong e e kopanetsweng e, a re tokomane e, e golaganya batho ba naga ka mokgwa o tokomane e nngwe ya semolao e ka seke ya ba golaganya ka ona..
mt0: <pad> Pandor, who participated in the joint hearing, said that the document binds the nation's people in a way that no other legal document could.</s>

en: Those who shaped our Constitution number millions.
tsn: Ba ba bopileng molaotheo wa rona ba ka nna  dimilione.
mt0: <pad> The people who created our constitution are estimated to be over a million.</s>

en: Not just those who were in the constitutional assembly.
tsn: E seng fela ba ba neng ba le mo kopanong ya molaotheo.
mt0: <pad> Not only those who were present at the constitution conference.</s>

en: It does not belong to a few
tsn: Ga e se ya ba le mmalwa fela.
mt0: <pad> It wasn't just a few.</s>

en: It is our instrument of freedom honouring Kwame Nkrumah, Patrice Lumumba, Sekou Toure.
tsn: Ke sediriswa sa rona sa kgololosego go tlotla Kwame Nkrumah, Patrice Lumumba, Sekou Toure.
mt0: <pad> It is our freedom tool to honor Kwame Nkrumah, Patrice Lumumba, Sekou Toure.</s>

en: We in parliament and government have a critical role to claim in honour of these men and women and millions of others.
tsn: Rona kwa palamente le puso, re na le seabe se se golo mo go tlotla banna le basadi le dimilione tsa ba bangwe.
mt0: <pad> We in the parliament and government have a great role to play in respecting men and women and millions of others.</s>

en: We need to consistently ensure that the ambitions of service to the people are honoured and realised, says Pandor.
tsn: Re tshwanela go tswelela go tlhola go netefatsa gore maemo a tirelo ya batho ke a a tlotlegang go bua Pandor.
mt0: <pad> We have to continue to ensure that the standards of human service are respected, said Pandor.</s>

en: "Reflecting on 25-years of the South African Constitution Political parties weigh in"
tsn: Go leba kwa morago kwa dingwageng di le 25 tsa molaotheo, makoko a polotiki ya Aforikaborwa a ntsha a a tshwaela.
mt0: <pad> Looking back on 25 years of the constitution, South African politics has become increasingly polarized.</s>

en: Some of the country’s leading lawmakers were themselves in their youth when the constitution was adopted.
tsn: Bangwe ba batlhomamolao ba ba itlhomileng kwa pele mo nageng, e ne e santse e le bašwa fa molaotheo ne o amogelwa.
mt0: <pad> Some of the first elected legislators in the country were still young when the constitution was adopted.</s>

en: Yet they too hold it in high regard
tsn: Mme le bona ba o tshwaretse kwa godimo.
mt0: <pad> And they also carried him up.</s>

en: One of them, DA Chief Whip Natasha Mazzone calls for those who seek to undermine this document to be shunned.
tsn: Mongwe wa bona e leng semesegolo sa DA Natasha Mazzone o bua gore ba ba batlang go nyatsa tokomane e, ba itlhokomolosiwe.
mt0: <pad> One of them, the DA's chief executive Natasha Mazzone, said that those who want to ridicule the document have been ignored.</s>

en: She says it is the job of all Parliamentarians who took an oath to uphold the Constitution, should do so.
tsn: O rile ke tiro ya maloko otlhe a palamente, a a kileng a ikana go tshegetsa Molaotheo. Ba tshwanetse go dira jalo.
mt0: <pad> He said it is the duty of all members of the parliament, who have sworn to support the constitution. They must do so.</s>

en: It is therefore essential that when this document is undermined we must take it for what it is a treasonous act.
tsn: Ka jalo go botlhokwa thata gore fa tokomane e e nyadiwa, re tshwanetse go e tsaya jaaka e le leano la go menola puso.
mt0: <pad> So it is very important that if this document is leaked, we should take it as a way to undermine the government.</s>

en: We simply cannot have high-ranking politicians making statements that the Constitution should be ignored or is not going to be considered or even more worryingly, not affect their course of action.
tsn: Re ka se kgone go nna le boradipolotiki ba ba maemo a a kwa godimo go dira dipolelo tse di buang gore Molaotheo o ikgatholosiwa kgotsa ga o ye go akanyediwa, kgotsa go feta. Se se tshwenyang go feta ke gore se ka se ame tiro ya bona
mt0: <pad> We can't have senior politicians making statements that the Constitution is being dissolved or not to be dissolved, or more. The worst part is that it will not affect the work of the government.</s>

en: We should have a collective outrage at such utterances and have the guts to take them and put them where they belong behind bars, says Mazzone.
tsn: Re tshwanetse go nna le kgatelelo e le nngwe mo dipuong tse, le go nna le maatla a go ba tsaya, re ba ise kwa ba tshwanetseng teng e leng kwa kgolegelong go bua Mazzone
mt0: <pad> We have to put a pressure on these men, and have the power to take them, to bring them where they belong, to jail, said Mazzone.</s>

en: Even though Buthelezi has handed the leadership of the Inkatha Freedom Party (IFP) over to new, younger leaders, he continues to be viewed by many of his fellow MPs as an elder statesman whose counsel they value.
tsn: Le fa Buthelezi a neetse boeteledipele jwa lekoko la IFP go baeteledipele ba ba ntšhwa, ba ba botlana o tswelela go bonwa ke bontsi jwa ditokololo tsa gagwe jaaka radipolotiki yo dikgakololo tsa gagwe di tlotlwang.
mt0: <pad> Although Buthelezi has passed the helm of the IFP to new, younger leaders he is still seen by many of his followers as a politician whose advice is respected.</s>

en: He says while he was unhappy about certain provisions of the Constitution, he is happy with the role his party played in its shaping.
tsn: A re le fa a ne a sa itumelela ditlamelo dingwe tsa Molaotheo ,o itumelela seabe se lekoko la gagwe le nnile le sona mo tlhamong ya ona.
mt0: <pad> He said that while he was not happy with some provisions of the Constitution, he was pleased with the role his party had played in its development.</s>

en: EFF criticises Constitution
tsn: EFF e tshwaya Molaotheo phoso.
mt0: <pad> The EFF is misinterpreting the constitution.</s>

en: The Economic Freedom Fighters (EFF) say South Africas constitution has done nothing to undo the oppression of black people.
tsn: Economic Freedom Fighters (EFF) e bua gore Molaotheo wa Aforika Borwa ga o a dira sepe go dirolola kgatelelo ya bantsho.
mt0: <pad> Economic Freedom Fighters (EFF) says that the South African constitution has done nothing to address black oppression.</s>

en: The party says, in fact, it has cushioned those who benefited from oppression while millions of black people still live in abject poverty.
tsn: Mokgatlho wa re, ke nnete, ba sireleditse ba ba ungwileng go tswa mo kgatelelong ya batho, fa dimilione tsa batho bantsho di santse di tshela ka fa tlase ga botlhoki jo bo tseneletseng.
mt0: <pad> The organization says, while they have indeed protected the victims of slavery, millions of black people are still living under a deep and widespread poverty.</s>

en: EFF National Chairperson Ntombovuyo Mente says the party will not rest until the constitution is amended to allow for the expropriation of land without compensation.
tsn: Modulasetulo wa EFF Ntombovuyo Mente a re lekoko le ka se ikhutse go fitlhela Molaotheo o tlhabololwa go letla go amogiwa lefatshe kwa ntle ga tuelo.
mt0: <pad> The EFF's leader, Ntombovuyo Mente, said the movement will not be quiet until the constitution is amended to allow land acquisition without charge.</s>

en: It draws a moral equivalence between the needs of the dispossessed majority and the interests of the dispossessing minority.
tsn: E thala maitsholo a a tshwanang magareng ga ditlhokego tsa matshelo a bontsi jo bo amogilweng ditsabona le dikgatlhego tsa palo e nnye ya ba ba amogang.
mt0: <pad> It establishes a balance between the needs of the vast majority of people who are unable to support themselves and the interests of a small number of those who can support them.</s>

en: It imagines a world where the persecuted live in peace with their persecutors with no redress and no material acknowledgment of the past wrongs.
tsn: E akanya ka lefatshe le mo go lona, ba ba bogisitsweng ba tshelang ka kagiso le babogisi ba bona, kwa ntle le go bona le tshiamiso, le go amogela diphoso tse di fetileng.
mt0: <pad> He thinks of a world and in it, the oppressed living in peace with their oppressors, without seeing or hearing justice, and accepting past mistakes.</s>

en: It proclaims to recognise the injustices of our past while at the same time acting as a stonewall around those who perpetrated these injustices and their descendants, says Mente.
tsn: E kaya fa e lemoga ditshiamololo tse re di diretsweng mo nakong e e fetileng, mme gape ba sireletsa ba ba dirileng ditshiamololo tse, le bana ba bone. Go bua Mente.
mt0: <pad> It says it recognizes the wrongdoings we have been done, but also protects those who have done the wrongdoings, and their children.</s>

en: How has government and South Africans upheld the values of the Constitution?
tsn: Puso le Aforika Borwa ba tshegeditse mekgwa ya Molaotheo jang?
mt0: <pad> How have the government and South Africa supported the constitutional process?</s>

en: Parliaments Joint Defence Portfolio Committee has called Defence Minister Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula to appear before it to respond to allegations of corruption.
tsn: Photefolio ya komiti ya tshireletso e e kopanetsweng e biditse tona ya tshireletso Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula go tlhagelela pele ga yona go araba ditatofatso tsa bobodu.
mt0: <pad> The joint security portfolio of the committee has called for the minister of security Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula to appear before it to answer allegations of fraud.</s>

en: Mapisa-Nqakula is alleged to have received gifts and cash to the value of R5 million from a South African National Defence Force (SANDF) supplier.
tsn: Mapisa-Nqakula o latofadiwa ka go amogela dimpho le madi a boleng jwa dimilione di le tlhano, go tswa go motlamedi wa sesole sa tshireletso ya naga ya Aforika Borwa (SANDF).
mt0: <pad> Mapisa-Nqakula is accused of receiving gifts and money worth five million rand (Â£5 million) from the South African National Defence Force (SANDF) chief.</s>

en: The United Democratic Movement (UDM) leader Bantu Holomisa brought the allegations to the attention of the committee, saying a whistle-blower presented them to him.
tsn: Moeteledipele wa United Democratic Movement (UDM) Bantu Homisa o tlisitse ditatofatso go komiti e, a bua gore mongwe o mo neile tshedimosetso.
mt0: <pad> The leader of the United Democratic Movement (UDM) Bantu Homisa has brought charges to the commission, saying that someone gave him information.</s>

en: Mapisa-Nqakula has written to the committee denying the allegations.
tsn: Mapisa-Nqakula o kwaletse komiti go ganetsana le ditatofatso.
mt0: <pad> Mapisa-Nqakula wrote to the committee to deny the allegations.</s>

en: However, Committee Co-chairperson Elleck Nchabeleng says they need more information from the Minister and the whistle-blower.
tsn: Le fa go ntse jalo, modulasetulo mmogo wa komiti Elleck Nchabeleng o bolela gore ba tlhoka go bona tshedimosetso e e oketsegileng go tswa go tona le motho yo o ntshitseng dikgang.
mt0: <pad> However, the deputy chair of the committee Elleck Nchabeleng said that they needed to get more information from the mayor and the source who published the report.</s>

en: First engage and get time to engage the minister so we can get her responses
tsn: Re simolola pele ka go dira le go bona nako ya go buisana le tona gore re kgone go bona dikarabo tsa gagwe.
mt0: <pad> We start by making and finding time to talk with the father so that we can get his answers.</s>

en: And then we can ask questions.
tsn: Mme morago ga foo re ka nna ra botsa dipotso.
mt0: <pad> But after that we can ask questions.</s>

en: We need info from the whistle-blower, like a statement or an affidavit, at least we know someone has written something to us.
tsn: Re tlhoka tshedimosetso, jaaka polelo kgotsa maikano, bonnye re itse gore mongwe o kwadile sengwe mo go rona.
mt0: <pad> We need information, like a story or an anecdote, at least we know that someone has written something on us.</s>

en: We need something tangible from this person.
tsn: Re tlhoka sengwe se se bonagalang go tswa go motho yo.
mt0: <pad> We need something clear from that person.</s>

en: Holomisa implicates Minister Mapisa-Nqakula in a R5 million scandal.
tsn: Holomisa o kaya tona Mapisa-Nqakula mo go dikgang tsa dimilione di le tlhano tsa matlhabisa ditlhong.
mt0: <pad> Holomisa says Ms Mapisa-Nqakula in the $5 million scandal.</s>

en: In April, the Democratic Alliance (DA) called on President Cyril Ramaphosa to institute an urgent investigation into allegations that Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula wasted millions of taxpayers money on chartered flights and luxury accommodation.
tsn: Ka Moranang, Democratic Alliance (DA) e biditse Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa go tlhoma patlisiso e e potlakileng mo ditatofatsong tsa gore Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula o sentse dimilione tsa madi a batho ba ba duelang lekgetho ka go duelela difofane le manno a manobonobo.
mt0: <pad> On October, the Democratic Alliance (DA) called on President Cyril Ramaphosa to launch an urgent investigation into allegations that Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula wasted millions of taxpayers' money by paying for his luxurious flights and luxury accommodation.</s>

en: The party says she must also be suspended without compensation pending the outcome of the investigation.
tsn: Mokgatlho o re; o tshwanetse a sekegiwa kwa ntle ga tuelo, go sa ntse go letetswe dipholo tsa patlisiso.
mt0: <pad> The organization said; he should be held without pay, while the investigation is underway.</s>

en: DA Shadow Defence Minister Kobus Marais says a dossier of evidence has been submitted to the Joint Standing Committee on Defence, detailing at least five instances where doubt can be cast over Mapisa-Nqakulas actions.
tsn: Tona ya  tshireletso ya DA Kobus Marais o bua gore dipampiri tse di na leng bosupi di neetswe kwa komiti e e kopaneng ya tshireletso, mme di tlhagisa bonnye jwa mabaka a le matlhano kwa pelaelo e ka lebesiwang mo go Mapisa-Nqakula.
mt0: <pad> DA defense minister Kobus Marais said the documents were handed over to the joint security committee, and raised at least five reasons for doubt on Mapisa-Nqakula.</s>

en: Pressure is mounting from the Democratic Alliance (DA) and others for Health Minister Dr Zweli Mkhize to step down or be removed by President Cyril Ramaphosa.
tsn: Go na le kgatelelo e e tswang mo DA le bangwe gore tona ya pholo Zweli Mkhize a role tiro kgotsa a tlosiwe ke moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa.
mt0: <pad> There is pressure from the DA and others that the Agriculture Minister Zweli Mkhize resign or be removed by President Cyril Ramaphosa.</s>

en: National Health Department briefs media on the irregular Digital Vibes contract: The Special Investigating Unit is probing allegations that the Department of Health had paid Digital Vibes R150-million for services related to the National Health Insurance (NHI) and the governments response to the COVID-19 pandemic.
tsn: Lefapha la bosetšhaba la boitekanelo le bolelela bobegakgang ka ga konteraka ya Digital Vibes e e sa siamang. Yuniti ya dipatlisiso tse di kgethegileng e batlisisa ditatofatso tsa gore lefapha la boitekanelo le duetse Digital Vibes dimilione di le 150 tsa ditirelo tse di amanang le Inšhorense ya bosetšhaba ya boitekanelo le tsibogo ya puso go leroborobo la COVID-19.
mt0: <pad> The Department of Health and Human Services announces a misleading contract with Digital Vibes. A special investigation unit is investigating allegations that the Department of Health and Human Services paid Digital Vibes 150 million dollars in services related to the National Health Insurance and government response to the COVID-19 pandemic.</s>

en: Alleged irregular contract between Health department and Digital Vibes.
tsn: Ditatofatso tsa konteraka e e sa tlhomamamng magareng ga lefapha la boitekanelo le Digital Vibes.
mt0: <pad> Reports of unlawful contracts between the Department of Health and Digital Vibes.</s>

en: Political analyst Tessa Dooms has raised questions over the veracity of claims made by Mkhize after he denied any involvement in the awarding of the irregular multi-million-rand contract by his Department.
tsn: Mosekaseki wa dipolotikki tsa thendara e e sa tlhomamang Tessa Dooms o tsositse dipotso kgatlhanong le boammaaruri jo bo dirilweng ke Mkhize morago ga go itatola go nna le seabe mo kabelong ya konteraka e e sa tlhomamang ya dimilione di le dintsi ya lefapha la gagwe.
mt0: <pad> The whistleblower of uncertainty politics Tessa Dooms raised questions about Mkhize's honesty after he admitted to having a role in the award of multimillion-dollar uncertain contracts for his office.</s>

en: Mkhizes former personal spokesperson, Tahera Mather, and former personal assistant, Naadhira Mitha, are reported to control the company, Digital Vibes, although the two are not listed as directors.
tsn: Tahera Mather, mmueledi wa sebele wa maloba wa Mkhize le mothusi wa nako e e fetileng Naadhira Mitha, ba begiwa go laola setheo sa Digital Vibes, le fa bobedi ba bona ba se fa lenaaneg jaaka baekedi.
mt0: <pad> Tahera Mather, the former Mkhize spokesperson and his former assistant Naadhira Mitha are said to be in charge of Digital Vibes, although both were present at the show as judges.</s>

en: Dooms says it is hard to believe Mkhize as he contradicted himself in the press briefing.
tsn: Doom o bolela gore go thata go dumela Mkhize, ka a ne a ikganetsa kwa bobegadikgang.
mt0: <pad> Doom says it is difficult to trust Mkhize, as he has been lying to the press.</s>

en: Its very hard to believe him when he contradicted himself in the press briefing itself
tsn: Go thata go mo dumela fa a ikganeditse mo kopanong ya bobegadikgang.
mt0: <pad> It's hard to believe that he spoke at a press conference.</s>

en: He said he didnt know up until a point until he came to know that she was involved when she was setting up meetings with him in order to do the work that was being paid for; so, he clearly became aware at some point.
tsn: O rile o ne a sa itse. Go fitlhela go fitlha nako ya gore a  itse gore o tseile karolo  fa a ne a rulaganya dikopano le ena, go kgona go dira tiro e e duelelwang, ka jalo o ne a lemoga ka nako nngwe.
mt0: <pad> He said he didn't know. It was only when he realized that he had been involved that he knew he had participated in his meetings with him, to be able to do paid work, so he realized it at some point.</s>

en: But of course, it would be highly irregular for that level of work to be done in his office and he not have a clue about it.
tsn: Mme go ne, e tla nna tlhomamo e kwa godimo ya gore maemo a tiro e e tshwanetswe go dirwa mo kantorong ya gagwe mme a se nne le lesedinyana ka ga yona.
mt0: <pad> But if so, it would be a highly unlikely case that the levels of work that had to be done in his office he had no idea about.</s>

en: Additional reporting by Risha Maduray.
tsn: Tlaleletso ya pego Risha Maduray.
mt0: <pad> Please add the name of Risha Maduray to the list of applicants.</s>

en: The chairperson of the State Capture Commission in Johannesburg, Justice Raymond Zondo says President Cyril Ramaphosa will make another appearance before the Commission at a later date in June.
tsn: Modulasetulo wa khomišhene ya puso kwa Johannesburg, Justice Raymond Zondo o bolela gore Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa o tlile go tlhagelela fa pele ga khomišhene ka nako e e kwa morago ka Seetebosigo
mt0: <pad> The chair of the Johannesburg state commission, Justice Raymond Zondo, said that President Cyril Ramaphosa will appear before the commission later on Wednesday.</s>

en: Ramaphosa will appear as President of the country.
tsn: Ramaphosa o tlaa tlhagelela jaaka Moporesidente wa naga.
mt0: <pad> Ramaphosa will be the next President of the country.</s>

en: His previous appearance was as president of the African National Congress (ANC).
tsn: Tebego ya gagwe ya nako e e fetileng, e ne e le moporesidente wa African National Congress (ANC).
mt0: <pad> He was former president of the African National Congress (ANC).</s>

en: Ramaphosa was scheduled to give evidence next week but will no longer be doing so.
tsn: Ramaphosa o ne a rulagantswe go neela bopaki beke e e latelang fela ga a kitla a tlhola a dira jalo.
mt0: <pad> Ramaphosa was scheduled to testify next week but will not be able to do so.</s>

en: Zondo says he will announce another date in the course of June for when the President will appear.
tsn: Zondo o bua gore o tlile go itsise letlha le lengwe mo kgweding ya Seetebosigo, le  moporesitente a tlaa tlhagelelang ka lona.
mt0: <pad> Zondo says he will announce another date in September, when the president will be able to speak.</s>

en: Ramaphosa will be the last witness to give oral evidence at the commission  which is wrapping up before starting work on its report.
tsn: Ramaphosa o tlile go nna paki ya bofelo go naya bopaki ka molomo kwa khomišheneng e e tileng go feleletsa pele ba simolola go dira pegelo ya yona.
mt0: <pad> Ramaphosa will be the last witness to testify in person before a commission that failed to complete its work before it began writing its report.</s>

en: State Capture Inquiry: 25 May 2021
tsn: State Capture Inquiry: 25 Motsheganong 2021
mt0: <pad> State Capture Inquiry: 25 March 2021</s>

en: Last month Ramaphosa appeared before the commission as the president of the ANC.
tsn: Mo kgweding e e fetileng Ramaphosa o tlhageletse fa pele ga Khomišhene jaaka Moporesidente wa ANC.
mt0: <pad> Last month Ramaphosa appeared before the Commission as ANC President.</s>

en: He is also expected to make closing remarks as the State President.
tsn: Gape o tshwanetse go dira ditshwaelo tsa go tswalela jaaka Moporesidente wa puso.
mt0: <pad> He also has to make final remarks as President of the Republic.</s>

en: On Tuesday, the Commissions Chairperson, Deputy Chief Justice Raymond Zondo said they had hoped to finalise oral evidence at the end of March, and were working around the clock to make this possible.
tsn: Ka labobedi, modulasetulo wa khomišhene, Motlatsa Moatlhodimogolo Raymond Zondo o rile ba ne ba solofetse go feleletsa ka bopaki kwa bokhutlong jwa kgwedi ya Mopitlwe, mme ba ne ba dira ka kelotlhoko go dira gore seno se kgonege.
mt0: <pad> On Tuesday, the chairman of the commission, Deputy Chief Justice Raymond Zondo, said they had hoped to finish with evidence by the end of March, but they had worked hard to make that possible.</s>

en: He said he will make exceptional hearings where possible and will apply to the High Court for a limited extension to finalise the Commissions report.
tsn: O buile gore o tla dira ditheetso ka moo go ka kgonagalang mme o tla dira kopo kwa kgotlatshekelong e e lekanyeditsweng ya go konosetsa Pegelo ya Khomišhene.
mt0: <pad> He said he would make as many allegations as possible and would ask for a limitation of jurisdiction to overturn the Commission Report.</s>

en: Zondo said it was important that high-ranking officials in State-Owned Enterprises (SOEs) where there are serious allegations of corruption and state capture are given the time to complete their evidence.
tsn: Zondo o rile go ne go le botlhokwa gore batlhankedi a maemo a kwa godimo mo ditheong tsa puso (SOEs) fa go na le ditatofatso tsa bobodu le go tshwarwa di neelwa nako ya go fetsa bosupi.
mt0: <pad> Zondo said it was important that senior officials in state enterprises (SOEs) when they are accused of fraud and arrested be given time to complete their evidence.</s>

en: Deputy Chief Justice Zondo said the Commission is mindful of the fact that there are some applications for leave to cross-examine.
tsn: Motlatsa Moatlhodimogolo Zondo o rile Khomišene e tlhaloganya ntlha ya gore go na le dikopo tsa go tlogela go botsolotsa.
mt0: <pad> The Deputy Chief Justice Zondo said the Commission understands that there are requests to stop questioning.</s>

en: He suggested that the Commission can make exceptions and some witnesses may still be called.
tsn: O ne a tshitshinya gore Khomišene e ka dira diphapogo dingwe, mme gape dipaki dingwe di ka bidiwa.
mt0: <pad> He suggested that the Commission might make some changes, and that other witnesses might be called.</s>

en: Legal expert Dr Llewellyn Curlewis says the special plea of former President Jacob Zuma calling for the recusal of State prosecutor, Advocate Billy Downer in his corruption trial at the Pietermaritzburg High Court is a tall mountain to climb.
tsn: Mankge wa semolao Ngaka Llewellyn Curlewis o kaya fa kopo e e kgethegileng ya ga moporesitente wa maloba Jacob Zuma, ya go kopa gore motšhutšhisi, mmueledi Billy Downer a ikgolole mo tshekong ya gagwe ya bobodu kwa kgotlhatsekelong ya kwa Pietermaritzburg,  e le kopo e e boima thata.
mt0: <pad> The lawyer Dr. Llewellyn Curlewis says the special request by former President Jacob Zuma to free the prosecutor, barrister Billy Downer from his rape trial at the Pietermaritzburg Crown Court is a very difficult request.</s>

en: Zuma and French arms company, Thales, have pleaded not guilty to charges of fraud and corruption in the Pietermaritzburg High Court.
tsn: Zuma le komponi ya dibetsa ya kwa Fora, Thales, ba ipoletse go se nne le molato mo ditatofatsong  tsa tsietso le bonweewee kwa kgotlatshekelo e e kwa godimo ya Pietermaritzburg.
mt0: <pad> Zuma and the French arms company Thales have pleaded not guilty in the High Court of Pietermaritzburg on charges of fraud and bribery.</s>

en: The matter has been postponed to July 19 for the arguments to be heard by Judge Piet Koen.
tsn: Kgang e buseditswe morago go Phukwi 19 gore dingangisano do kgone go reediwa ke Moatlhodi Piet Koen.
mt0: <pad> The case was delayed until July 19 so that the arguments could be heard by Judge Piet Koen.</s>

en: Curlewis says the defence will have to bring exceptional arguments to court for the special plea to be successful.
tsn: Curlewis o bua gore lefapha la tshireletso le tlaa tshwanelwa ke go tlhagisa mabaka a a kgethegileng kwa kgotlatshekelo ya boikuelo jo bo kgethegileng gore e atlege.
mt0: <pad> Curlewis says the defence department will have to present special circumstances in the appeal court to succeed.</s>

en: On Wednesday this week, Zuma’s legal team led by Advocate Dali Mpofu presented the court with a statement in terms of the special plea that will be argued on July 19.
tsn: Ka Laboraro wa beke e, setlhopha sa molao sa ga Zuma, se eteletswe pele ke mmueledi Dali Mpofu ba tlhagisitse polelo kwa kgotlhatsekelong ka mabaka a boikuelo jo bo kgethegileng e go tlaa ngangisanwang ka yona ka di 19 tsa Phukwi.
mt0: <pad> On Wednesday this week, the legal team of Zuma, led by his lawyer Dali Mpofu, presented a statement at the court for the purposes of the special appeal to be heard on July 19.</s>

en: The plea deals with section 106 1 H of the Criminal Procedure Act.
tsn: Kopo e mekamekana le karolo 106 H ya Criminal Procedure Act
mt0: <pad> The complaint is based on Article 106 H of the Criminal Procedure Act.</s>

en: While the State will also have a chance to present their case in this regard, Downer told the court that separate counsel was preparing this response because he was in fact the main subject of this special plea.
tsn: Puso le yona e tlaa nna le tšhono ya go tlhagisa kgetse ya bona mo ntlheng eno, Downer o boleletse kgotlatshekelo gore kgakololo e e kwa thoko e ipaakanyetsa karabo eno ka ntlha ya gore e ne e le ntlha ya botlhokwa ya boikuelo jo bo kgethegileng.
mt0: <pad> The government will also have the opportunity to file their own suit on this matter, Downer told the court that the independent advice prepares for this response because it was a key issue in the special appeal.</s>

en: Former President Zuma pleads not guilty:
tsn: Moporesidente wa maloba Zuma ga a ipone molato.
mt0: <pad> President Zuma has not been convicted.</s>

en: Independence and impartiality
tsn: Go ikemela ka nosi le go se tseye letlhakore
mt0: <pad> Self-determination and lack of bias</s>

en: Through the statement read in court, Advocate Mpofu told the court that Zuma believes that Advocate Downer lacks independence and impartiality.
tsn: Ka ntlha ya polelo e e badilweng kwa kgotlhatshekelo, Mmueledi Mpofu o boleletse kantoro gore Zuma o dumela gore Mmueledi Downer o tlhoka go ikemela le tekatekano.
mt0: <pad> Following the statement read at the court, Mr Mpofu told the office that Zuma believes that Attorney Downer needs to be independent and fair.</s>

en: There are facts and circumstances that give me a reasonable impression that Downer had conducted himself in a manner that lacks independence and impartiality that is necessary for a lawful prosecution.
tsn: Go na le mabaka le maemo a a mphang megopolo e e utlwagalang gore Downer o ne a itshwere ka tsela ya go tlhoka go ikemela ka nosi le go sa tseye letlhakore, e e botlhokwa mo tiragatsong ya molao.
mt0: <pad> There are reasons and circumstances that give me the impression that Downer acted in a way that was not consistent with his own impartiality and impartiality, which is important in the legal process.</s>

en: Downer failed to uphold the standard and prosecutorial independence needed to secure that my trial is fair and conducted in accordance with the Constitution.
tsn: Downer o reteletswe ke go tshegetsa maemo a a tlhokegang go sireletsa boikemedi gore tsheko ya me e lolame mme e dirwe go ya ka Molaotheo.
mt0: <pad> Downer refused to support the conditions necessary to protect my rights to ensure that my trial is fair and done according to the Constitution.</s>

en: Downer placed himself as a witness against me when he filed an affidavit in support of the Democratic Alliance application to review and set aside a decision by the NPA to terminate my prosecution
tsn: Downer o ipeile go nna paki kgatlhanong le nna fa a ne a tlatsa afidafiti ka tshegetso ya tshwaragano ya temokerasi, kopo ya go sekaseka le go beela thoko tshwetso e e dirilweng ke NPA go fedisa tsheko ya me.
mt0: <pad> Downer took on the role of witness against me when he filled out an affidavit in support of the Democratic Resistance, a request to review and overturn the decision made by the NPA to end my trial.</s>

en: Curlewis says Judge Piet Koen will be positioned to hear the special plea as the trial Judge, saying it falls within the trial proceedings.
tsn: Curlewis o bolela gore moatlhodi Piet Koen o tla bewa mo maemong a go reetsa kopo e e kgethegileng ya go ikarabela mo tatofatsong le tsheko jaaka moatlhodi, a bua gore e wela mo ditsamaisong tsa tsheko.
mt0: <pad> Curlewis said judge Piet Koen will be put in the position to hear a special request to take over as judge of indictments and trials, saying it fell within the legal process.</s>

en: No, that is not possible.
tsn: Nnyaa, seo ga se kgonege.
mt0: <pad> No, that can't be.</s>

en: The pre-proceedings have already taken place that means that the judge that is currently presiding will see the matter end out unless there is another reason for recusal that might come out later on.
tsn: Dipotso tsa ntlha di simolotse, se sa raya gore moatlhodi yo o tshwereng marapo ga jaana o tla go tla bona kgang e ya kwa bokhutlong, ntle le fa go na le lebaka lengwe la go ikgolola le le tlaa tlang kwa morago.
mt0: <pad> The first questions have begun, which means that the current judge will be going to see the case through to the end, unless there is another reason for disqualification later.</s>

en: But that is not anticipated
tsn: Fela seo ga se a solofelwa.
mt0: <pad> But that wasn't expected.</s>

en: When offered the opportunity to respond on the matter of the special plea, Thales defence led by Advocate Barry Roux, humorously responded that they were merely passengers in the matter.
tsn: Fa a ne a newa tšhono ya go arabela kopo e e kgethegileng, tshireletso ya ga Thale e e eteletsweng pele ke moatlhodi Barry Roux, o arabile ka metlae gore bona e ne e le bapalami fela mo kgannyeng eno
mt0: <pad> When given the chance to respond to a special request, the Thale defence, led by Judge Barry Roux, responded humorously that they were only passengers in this case.</s>

en: But he says the defence has a feat ahead of them to argue the special plea.
tsn: Mme a re go na le phitlhelo e e kwa pele ga bona go ganetsa kopo e.
mt0: <pad> But he said there was a choice before them to reject the request.</s>

en: Once the special plea is determined, only then is the expected of the accused to formally then plea in terms of the lets call it the general type of pleas namely guilty or not guilty.
tsn: Fa boikuelo jo bo kgethegileng bo ka bontsha maikaelelo, ke yona fela nako e ka yona molatofadiwa a ka solofelwang go ikarabela ka semmuso mo tatofatsong ka mabaka, mme e re tla e bitsa ka mofuta wa kopo, e leng molato kgotsa e se molato.
mt0: <pad> If the special defense can show intent, this is the only time the accused can be expected to respond in court to the charge with reasons, and we will call it by type of case, guilty or not guilty.</s>

en: In this instance, not guilty as he has done.
tsn: Mo lebakeng le, ga a ipona molato.
mt0: <pad> At the time, he did not feel guilty.</s>

en: It is not uncommon to enter into a special plea  the one they have raised in section 106.
tsn: Ga go makatse go tsena mo kopong e e kgethegileng, e le nngwe. Yona e e tlhagisitsweng mo karolo 106.
mt0: <pad> It is not surprising to enter a special, one-off course. The one described in section 106.</s>

en: The 1 H to be specific where they actually want to remove the State Prosecutor from the proceedings.
tsn: Tota tota 1 H, kwa ba batlang go tlosa motšhutšhisi wa naga go ditshekong.
mt0: <pad> 1 H, where they want to remove the king from the throne.</s>

en: In this instance advocate Billy Downer, now in very limited circumstances, will a court generally uphold such a special plea?
tsn: Mo lebakeng le mmueledi Billy Downer, jaanong mo maemong a mannye, a mme gona kgotlhatshekelo e tlaa tshola kopo e e kgethegileng?
mt0: <pad> Billy Downer, now in his midst, is a small-time lawyer, but the court will consider a special request.</s>

en: But the grounds that was advanced by Dali Mpofu on behalf of Zuma is that Billy Downer will not be objective and independent in his prosecution of this matter because at one stage filed an affidavit on behalf of the Democratic Alliance in a matter that was before court and based on that they say he is not independent.
tsn: Mme dintlha tse di tlhagisitsweng ke Dali mpofu mo boemong jwa ga Zuma ke gore Billy downer ga a kitla a nna le maikaelelo le go ikemela ka nosi mo tiragatsong ya gagwe mo kgangeng eno, ka gonne o kile a dira maikano mo boemong jwa Democratic Alliance ka morero o o neng o le kwa kgotlatshekelo mme ka ntlha ya seo, ba re ga a ikemela ka nosi.
mt0: <pad> But the facts that Dali Mpofu has raised for Zuma are that Billy Downer will never have any intention and independence in his role in this case, because he has promised to represent the Democratic Alliance in court and therefore, they say he is not independent.</s>

en: Curlewis explains the process that will follow once Judge Koen hands down judgement- possibly not immediately- on the special plea.
tsn: Curlewis o tlhalosa tirelo e e tla latelang morago ga gore moatlhodi Koen a neelane ka katlholo. Gongwe e seng ka yona nako eo ya kopo e e kgethegileng.
mt0: <pad> Curlewis describes the service that will follow after Judge Koen delivers his verdict. Perhaps not at this time for a special request.</s>

en: If the defence is correct in their special plea and if the court upholds it and once again I repeat personally from what I have seen in the case law, and in our law journals and articles and authorities on this issue they will not be successful, but let assume for argument sake they are successful then they will also advance next prey before the court that is to the matter then be struck from the roll which will not happen because they have already pleaded not guilty in all those charges yesterday and if one reads section 106 specifically not talking about 106
tsn: Fa tshireletso e nepile ka kopo ya bona ya go ikarabela, mme kantoro e e tshegetsa, ke a ipoeletsa, go ya ka se ke se boneng mo molaong wa rona wa makwalopaka le diathekele le balaodi ba kgang e,  di ka se atlege, fela a re akanye gore di tlile go atlega ka go tswelela pele batla lebelela kgang nngwe kwa kgotlhatshekelo e e amanang le ntlha, mme morago ba tlhaselwe go tswa go lekwalo le le ka se diregeng ka ntlha ya gore sa molato mo dilatofatsong tsa maabane gape fa mongwe a buisa thata karolo 106 e seng go bua ka 106.
mt0: <pad> If the defense is wrong in its request for self-responsibility, and the office supports it, I predict that they will not succeed, but we should think that they will succeed by continuing to look at another case in court related to the first, and then be attacked from a document that cannot be done because it was wrong in yesterday's indictments and because it is not a part of the 106th Amendment.</s>

en: The 1 H special plea I’m talking about the ordinary pleads of guilty or not guilty and this instance not guilty then the court must make a finding after such a plea only the court can do it, so no the matter will proceed after the 19.
tsn: Kopa ya 1 H, ke bua ka di kopo tsa “ke molato” kgotsa “ga ke molato” mme mo nakong e, “ga ke molato, kgotlhatshekelo e tshwanetse ya tlhagisa phitlhelelo ya yona morago ga kopo e. Ke kgotlhatshekelo fela e e ka kgonang go dira seo, ka jalo, kgang e tlaa tswelela morago ga di 19.
mt0: <pad> Chapter 1 H, I'm talking about the "I am guilty" or "not guilty" motions and in this case, "not guilty, the court must state its right after that motion. It is only the court that can do that, so the case will continue after those two motions.</s>

en: Over the next few days, the National Prosecuting Authority (NPA) will answer the submission by June 2.
tsn: Mo malatsing a le mmalwa a a latelang, bothati jwa Botšhotšhisi jwa Bosetšhaba (NPA) bo tlile go araba ka di 2 tsa Seetebosigo.
mt0: <pad> In the coming days, the National Prosecution Agency (NPA) will respond at 2 pm on Saturday.</s>

en: Zumas legal team is expected to file their heads of argument by July 5, with the NPA following suit by July 12.
tsn: Setlhopa sa molao sa ga Zuma se solefetswe go nnela ditlhogo tsa di ngangiso tsa bona ka la 5 Phukwi, fa NPA yona e tlaa latela ka la 12 Phukwi.
mt0: <pad> The Zuma legal team is scheduled to present their arguments on 5 July, while the NPA will follow on 12 July.</s>

en: The hearing for the special plea is set down for July 19.
tsn: Theetso ya boikopelo jo bo kgethegileng e rulaganyeditswe ka kgwedi ya Phukwi ka la di 19.
mt0: <pad> The special hearing is scheduled for July 19, 2017.</s>

en: Zuma addresses a crowd of supporters after his court appearance on Wednesday.
tsn: Zuma o bua le batho ba gagwe ba ba mo tshegetsang morago ga go tlhagelela kwa kgotlatshekelo ka Laboraro.
mt0: <pad> Zuma talks to his supporters after appearing in court on Wednesday.</s>

en: Cabinet has expressed its concern over the recent increase in the number of COVID-19 infections with fears that the country is on a third wave.
tsn: Kabinete e tlhalositse matshwenyego a yona malebana le koketsego ya palo ya tshwaetso ya COVID-19 ka di poifo tsa gore naga e mo lekhubung la boraro.
mt0: <pad> The Cabinet expressed its concern over the rise in the number of COVID-19 cases with fears that the country is in the third wave.</s>

en: The government is now consulting on the best response to the increasing number of infections with President Cyril Ramaphosa expected to address the nation soon.
tsn: Puso e tlhatlhoba tsibogo e e siameng ya palo ya ditshwaetsego tse di oketsegang le moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa yo o solofetsweng go buisana le setšhaba ka bonako.
mt0: <pad> The government is considering a proper response to the rising number of infections and President Cyril Ramaphosa is expected to speak to the public soon.</s>

en: On Wednesday, the Health department recorded over 4 600 new infections with COVID-19-related deaths surpassing 56 000.
tsn: Ka Laboraro, Lefapha la Pholo e begile ditshwaetso tse dintšhwa tse di fetang 4 600 le dintsho tse di amanang le COVID-19 tse di fetang 56 000 ka palo.
mt0: <pad> On Wednesday, the Department of Health reported more than 4,600 new cases and over 56,000 deaths related to COVID-19.</s>

en: The number of infections has been increasing in the past few days.
tsn: Palo ya ditshwaetso e ntse e oketsega mo malatsing a mmalwa a a fetileng.
mt0: <pad> The number of infections has been rising for several days.</s>

en: Briefing the media on the outcomes of the Cabinet meeting held on Wednesday, Acting Minister in the Presidency Khumbudzo Ntshavheni says they are still consulting on the governments best response to the pandemic.
tsn: Fa a ne a ema bobegakgang ka lefoko ka ga dipoelo tsa kopano  ya kabinete e e neng e tshwerwe ka Laboraro, Tona ya nama o tshwere Khumbudzo Ntshavheni o rile, ba sa ntse ba rerisana ka tsibogo ya puso e e siameng mabapi le leroborobo.
mt0: <pad> When he spoke to the press after the outcome of the cabinet meeting on Thursday, Minister of Food Khumbudzo Ntshavheni said, they are still discussing a government response to the outbreak.</s>

en: The country has also embarked on Phase 2 of vaccine roll-out with people over the age of 60 being prioritised.
tsn: Naga e simolotse ka leano la legato la bobedi la moento mme batho ba dingwaga tse di fetang 60 ke bona ba tlaa neelwang tšhono ya go thusiwa pele.
mt0: <pad> The country has started a second-stage pension plan and people over 60 will be the first to receive help.</s>

en: But with thousands of them already registered, Ntshavheni says they will have to wait a little longer for their jab.
tsn: Mme ka diketekete tsa tsona di setse di kwadisitswe, Ntshavheni a re ba tlaa tshwanelwa ke go ema lobaka nyana pele ba ka tlhaba.
mt0: <pad> And with thousands of them already recorded, Ntshavheni said they'd have to wait a little while before attacking.</s>

en: She says the vaccination of those who have registered depends on the availability of vaccines in their provinces.
tsn: O bua gore moento wa ba ba ikwaditseng o ikaegile ka go nna teng ga meento kwa diporofenseng tsa bone.
mt0: <pad> He says that the number of applicants depends on the number of applicants in their provinces.</s>

en: On the alleged corruption in the R150 million Digital Vibes COVID-19 contract and with pressure mounting for Health Minister Dr Zweli Mkhize to step down, Minister Ntshavheni says in as much as they view any allegation of corruption seriously, the matter was not discussed at the Cabinet level.
tsn: Mo kgannyeng ya tlolomolao ya konteraka ya Digital Vibes ya dimilione di le 150 le kgatelelo e tona ya Pholo Ngaka Zweli Mkhize a leng ka fa tlase ga yona ya gore a role tiro, tona Ntshavheni a re ba tsaya ditatofatso tsa tlolomolao tsia, kgang e ga e a atlhaatlhiwa kwa kabineteng.
mt0: <pad> In the case of Digital Vibes' 150 million contract and the pressure on Chief Prosecutor Dr Zweli Mkhize to resign, Mr Ntshavheni said they take criminal charges seriously, but the matter was not discussed in the cabinet.</s>

en: She also says Cabinet is still considering the possibility of what should happen with the Gauteng e-tolls given the financial commitments made during the provincial road improvement programme.
tsn: A re Kabinete e lebeletse kgonego ya gore go tshwanetse go diragala eng ka di e-tolls tsa kwa Gauteng, re lebile maikano a ditšhelete ka nako ya lenaneo la tokafatso ya porofense.
mt0: <pad> The Cabinet has considered the possibility of what should happen to Gauteng's e-tolls, we have looked at the financial commitments made during the state's economic development program.</s>

en: The Democratic Alliance (DA) in Gauteng has raised concerns over delays in reopening the Charlotte Maxeke Johannesburg Hospital after it was gutted by a fire a month ago.
tsn: Democratic Alliance (DA) mo Gauteng e tlhagisitse dingongorego ka tiego ya go bulwa gape ga bookelo jwa Charlotte Maxeke kwa Johannesburg morago ga gore bo fisiwe ke molelo mo kgweding e e fetileng.
mt0: <pad> The Democratic Alliance (DA) in Gauteng has expressed concern over the delay in reopening the Charlotte Maxeke hospital in Johannesburg after it was burned down last month.</s>

en: The fire started in the storeroom that houses medical supplies and spread to other parts of the hospital.
tsn: Molelo o simolotse kwa bobolokelong jo go bewang kwa go jone ditlamelwana tsa pholo le mme wa anama go ya kwa dikarolong tse dingwe tsa bookelo.
mt0: <pad> The fire started in the shed where the smoke was stored and then spread to other parts of the shed.</s>

en: Gauteng Premier David Makhura speaks to journalists outside the hospital.
tsn: Tonakgolo ya Gauteng David Makhura o bua le babegadikgang kwa ntle ga bookelo.
mt0: <pad> The Gauteng Governor David Makhura talks to journalists outside the office.</s>

en: DA Gauteng Shadow Health MEC Jack Bloom says some patients who were instructed to use nearby hospitals have not yet received medical care due to backlogs.
tsn: MEC ya pholo ya DA kwa Gauteng Jack Bloom, a re balwetse ba bangwe ba ba laetsweng go dirisa maokelo a mangwe a a leng gaufi, ga ba ise ba amogele tlhokomelo ya kalafi ka ntlha ya fa batho ba ba tlhokang thuso ba le bantsi thata.
mt0: <pad> The DA Gauteng Health MEC Jack Bloom said some patients who were directed to use other facilities in the area have not received medical care because the number of people in need is so high.</s>

en: According to the department, there are sections of the hospital that are structurally safe.
tsn: Go ya ka Lefapha go na le di karolo dingwe tse di bolokesegileng.
mt0: <pad> According to the Department there are some safe areas.</s>

en: I think that is very important to know
tsn: Ke akanya gore go botlhokwa thata go itse
mt0: <pad> I think it's very important to know.</s>

en: but the hospital management are awaiting a safety certificate from the JHB city council, says Bloom.
tsn: Mme batsamise ba bookelo ba letile setifikeiti sa pabalesego go tswa kwa lekgotlatoropong la JHB, go bua Bloom.
mt0: <pad> But the bookmakers have been waiting for a security certificate from the JHB City Council, said Bloom.</s>

en: Meanwhile, I am getting the most terrible calls from patients, particularly cancer patients and people on dialysis who are not being accommodated.
